Critical Failure The ritual goes horribly wrong. The souls within the final blade are released in a furious rush as a gray death that does its best to slay the ritual's casters and run amok among the living. The final blade retains it abilities and can continue to store souls.

entries.name: ブラー
entries.description: 対象の姿は揺れ動いているように見える。対象は@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{視認困難}になる。この効果の本質として対象の位置は明白であるため、対象はこの視認困難状態を「隠れる」や「忍び歩き」に利用することは出来ない。

entries.name: Boil Blood
entries.description:
You heat a foe's blood and boil it within its veins. The target takes 10d10 fire damage, with a Fortitude save. A nonliving creature with blood in its body (such as a vampire) can be affected, but a creature with no blood is immune.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target takes half damage.

Failure The target takes full damage and is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 2}.

Critical Failure The target takes double damage and is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 3}.

増強 (+1) The damage increases by 1d10.

entries.name: 幻獣増幅
entries.description:
君は自分と幻獣の間のつながりに深く集中し、幻獣の攻撃の力を増幅させる。幻獣は素手打撃でのダメージ・ロールに+2ステータス・ボーナスを得る。もし、幻獣が2つ以上の武器ダメージダイスを与えるのなら、このステータス・ボーナスは武器ダメージダイスごとに2点増え、最大で4つの武器ダメージダイスの時に+8点になる。

  • @Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.eFxUcQDkxcX9KoE1]{呪文効果: 幻獣増幅 (1ダイス)}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.xFvNsjmhvTkVk59U]{呪文効果: 幻獣増幅 (2ダイス)}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.d0jsFEx8kq9idSlo]{呪文効果: 幻獣増幅 (3ダイス)}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.JJ7HZkXXm8sTapcu]{呪文効果: 幻獣増幅 (4ダイス)}

entries.name: Bottle the Storm
entries.description:
Trigger You would take electricity damage.

When lightning is turned at you, you store the charge safely within yourself, unleashing it when the time is right. You gain electricity resistance 10 against the triggering effect. If you successfully prevent damage in this way, at any time during the spell's duration, you can spend a single action, which has the attack trait, to expend the charge and make a melee spell attack at an adjacent target or a ranged spell attack at a target within 60 feet. This attack deals electricity damage equal to the damage prevented by bottle the storm. If you cast bottle the storm a second time before the original duration elapses, or if you do not make this attack, the stored charge dissipates harmlessly.

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.GlggmEqkGVj1noOD]{Spell Effect: Bottle the Storm}

増強 (7th) The resistance increases to 15, and you can immediately make the spell attack roll granted by bottle the storm as part of the reaction used to cast the spell.

増強 (10th) The resistance increases to 20, and you can immediately make the spell attack roll granted by bottle the storm as part of the reaction used to cast the spell.

entries.name: ボトムレス・ストマック
entries.description:
君は、対象の口から出入り可能なキラキラとした他次元の空間を作り出す。この空間には、物体と装備を合計10バルクまで収納することが出来る。この他次元界の倉庫は対象の飲食、発話（該当するなら）能力、その他の行動をを妨げない。対象が選んだ場合にのみ、開閉するのである。

対象は1バルクまでの物体を呑み込むために「使用」を使うことが出来る。これは、物体あるいは対象を傷つけることはない。もし、他次元界の空間が満杯なら、先に1つ以上の保管されている物体を取り除かない限り、物体をそれ以上、追加することは出来ない。

対象は、選んだ一つの物体を吐き出すために「使用」を使って、その物体を対象の接敵面の地面に落下させることが出来る。対象は、立て続けに3回の「使用」を使うことで、その他次元界の保管庫の中身全てを吐き出すことが出来る。対象はこれらのアクションを同じ手番に行う必要はないが、間に何らかのアクションが挟み込まれたなら、やり直しになる。アイテムは対象の接敵面に吐き出されるが、もしあまりにも多すぎて適切ではない場合は、隣接した接敵面に落ちるかもしれない。

呪文が終了するか、対象が気絶したなら、他次元界の保管庫は騒々しいへどの形で吐き出され、近隣の誰も占領していないマス目に落下する。それらは少し濡れているが、傷ついてはいない。

増強 (5th) 持続時間は8時間に増える

entries.name: 頭脳吸収
entries.description:
君は対象の精神から知識を吸い出すために針を落とす。これは基本意志セーヴを伴う1d8点の精神ダメージを与える。

もし対象がセーヴに失敗したなら、君は盗んだ記憶から検索をするために@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.1OagaWtBpVXExToo]{「知識を思い出す」}の判定を一度、試みる。「知識を思い出す」判定を持つ技能を一つ選び、その判定に対象の技能修正値を用いる。

増強（+1） 精神ダメージは1d8点増える

entries.name: ブランド・ジ・インペニテント
entries.description:
君は、君の神格の宗教的シンボルのエーテル体の写しで対象に目印をつける。この目印は隠すことが出来ず、君の信仰の信者にのみ見ることが出来る。信者には、これは輝く松明のようにはっきりと見える。君の信仰の信者達は、どんなものであれ対象の@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{視認困難}状態を無視し、対象は君の信仰の信者達による攻撃に対して、ACに-1ステータス・ペナルティを負う。もし対象が、君の神格の教義に従っている、君の神格の信者であるなら、この呪文は失敗する。

クリティカル 対象は影響を受けない

成功 呪文は1ラウンド、持続する

失敗 呪文は1分、持続する

ファンブル 呪文は無制限の持続時間を持つ

entries.name: ブレッドクラム
entries.description:
君は対象が敵地で迷子にならないように、対象がすでに行ったことがある場所を追跡し、まだ行く必要がある場所を推測できるようにする。対象は、呪文の持続時間中、きらきらと輝く痕跡を残す。この軌跡は方向や順序を示すものではなく、単に呪文の持続時間中に対象が移動した場所を示すものである。

増強(2レベル) 持続時間は8時間に増加する。

増強 (3レベル) 持続時間が増加し、次の一日の準備まで続く。

entries.name: ブレス・オヴ・ドロート
entries.description:
君は範囲内を圧迫感のある乾燥した蒸し暑さで満たし、クリーチャーを熱中症で圧倒する。物体は影響を受けない。呪文が発動された際に範囲内にいたか、範囲内で後で手番を終了することになった、それぞれのクリーチャーは頑健セーヴを試みなくてはならない。水のクリーチャーと植物のクリーチャーはセーヴィング・スローの結果よりも1段階、悪い結果を用いる。その肉体に明らかに大きな水分を含んでいないクリーチャー（ファイア・エレメンタルなど）はブレス・オヴ・ドロートに完全耐性を持つ。

成功クリーチャーは影響を受けない

失敗 クリーチャーは @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{不調1}になる

ファンブル クリーチャーは@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{不調2}になる

増強 (4th) 1ラウンドに1回、君が「呪文の維持」をした際、君は爆発の中心を距離内の新しい場所に移動させることが出来る

増強 (7th) 4レベルバージョンと同じだが、距離は120フィートで、範囲は20フィート爆発になる

entries.name: Breath of Life
entries.description:
Trigger A living creature within range would die.

Your blessing revives a creature at the moment of its death. You prevent the target from @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.yZRUzMqrMmfLu0V1]{Dying} and restore Hit Points to the target equal to 4d8 plus your spellcasting ability modifier. You can't use breath of life if the triggering effect was disintegrate or a death effect.

entries.name: ブルホーン
entries.description:
君は自らの声を増幅し、遠距離からでも簡単に聞こえるようにする。持続時間の間、君の声は、たとえ他の環境音が音をブロックしているような状況であっても、500フィート以内の全ての聞き手にとって大きく、はっきりと聞こえる。音量にもかかわらず、これによって君の声が耳障りになったり、気が散るようになったりはしない。この呪文は、他の聴覚あるいは言語効果の距離や範囲を増加させることはなく、壁や扉のような物理的な障壁はなおも君の声を通常通りに防ぎ、くぐもらせる。

君の大きな声は他者に「強制」するのを簡単にし、大きな通りでの「芸能」を補助してくれる。君は「強制」と大きな通りでの「芸能」のための聴覚的な〈芸能〉判定に+1ステータス・ボーナスを得る。

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.9yzlmYUdvdQshTDF]{呪文効果：ブルホーン}

増強 (5th) 君の声は1,200フィート先まではっきりと聞こえる

増強 (7th) 君の声は１マイル先まではっきりと聞こえる

entries.name: Burning Blossoms
entries.description:
Area 30-foot radius, 100-foot tall cylinder

An intangible hollow tree sprouts from the ground and grows to towering height, radiating a fiery passion and fascinating viewers. The base of the tree takes up a single square and grows 100 feet upwards, while its branches extend outwards 30 feet, forming the spell's cylindrical area. The tree then blossoms, growing delicate white flowers that burn with white-hot fire. As the tree's branches gently rustle in the wind, flower petals drift to the ground in a shower of flame. Any creature that ends its turn under the tree's branches takes 6d6 fire damage from the burning petals. Any enemy that can see the tree, even if the enemy is outside the spell's area, must attempt a Will save. This is an emotion, mental, and visual effect. Creatures fascinated with the tree must use at least one of their actions on each of their turns to move toward the tree.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected and is temporarily immune for 24 hours.

Success The creature is unaffected, but it must attempt a new save at the end of its turn if it can still see the tree.

Failure The creature is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AdPVz7rbaVSRxHFg]{Fascinated} with the tree until the end of its next turn. If it can still see the tree then, it must attempt a save again.

Critical Failure The creature is fascinated with the tree until the spell ends. The tree's fire damage doesn't end the fascination; other hostile actions end it, as normal. If the fascination ends, the creature must attempt a new save at the end of its turn if it can still see the tree.

増強 (+1) The damage increases by 1d6

entries.name: Buzzing Bites
entries.description:
You evoke buzzing and crawling insects to climb onto a foe's body and bite, dealing 1d4 piercing damage and potentially sickening the foe, depending on its Fortitude save. You deal the piercing damage initially and then again the first time each round you Sustain the Spell, starting on the round after you cast it and rolling the damage based on the target's saving throw result each time. However, the creature only attempts the Fortitude save once, when you first Cast the Spell. Once this spell ends, the target becomes temporarily immune for 1 minute.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target takes half damage.

Failure The target takes full damage.

Critical Failure The target takes double damage and is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 1} by the crawling insects. The sickened value can't be reduced below 1 while the spell is active.

増強 (+1) The damage increases by 1d4.

entries.name: 魔女の嘲笑
entries.description: 急激な笑いの爆発で、君は自分が作り出した魔法の効果を延長する。君は@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.3f5DMFu8fPiqHpRg]{「呪文の維持」}を行う。

entries.name: Call Spirit
entries.description:
You tear the veil to the afterlife and call a spirit from its final resting place. You must call the spirit by name, and you must provide a connection to the spirit, such as a possession, a garment, or a piece of its corpse. A spirit unwilling to heed your call can attempt a Will save to avoid it; on a critical success, a trickster spirit impersonates the spirit you meant to call. The DC of the Will save is 2 lower if you haven't met the spirit in life. Either way, the spirit appears as a wispy form of the creature you meant to call. Each minute of the duration, you can ask the spirit a question. It can answer how it pleases or even refuse to answer. If the spirit isn't in the afterlife (such as if it's an undead), all results other than critical failures use the failure effect.

Critical Success The spirit is particularly cooperative, and even if it has strong reasons to deceive you, it takes a -2 circumstance penalty to its Deception checks.

Success You call the spirit.

Failure You fail to call a spirit.

Critical Failure One or more evil spirits appear and attack.

entries.name: Call The Blood
entries.description:
With a word and gesture, you cause streams of blood to erupt from the target's mouth, nostrils, ears, or other facial openings and come rushing into your mouth. You deal [[/r {8d4}[negative]]]{8d4 negative damage} to the target.

If the target takes damage, its blood flows into your mouth. If you're a living creature and don't have negative healing, you're @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 2}. If you're undead (or living but have negative healing), you can choose to either gain temporary Hit Points equal to half of the negative damage the target takes (after applying resistance and the like) and become @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{Quickened} for 1 round, or forgo the temporary Hit Points and become quickened for 1 minute. You can use this extra action only to Step, Stride, or Strike. You lose any remaining temporary Hit Points after 1 minute.

増強 (+1) The damage increases by [[/r {2d4}[negative]]].

entries.name: 墓地の呼び声
entries.description:
君は不調をもたらすエネルギーの光線を放つ。呪文攻撃ロールを行うこと。

クリティカル 対象は@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{不調2}になり、不調である限り、@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{減速化1}になる。

成功 対象は@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{不調1}になる。The target becomes @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{不調1}.

失敗 対象は影響を受けない。

entries.name: 軍勢への呼び声
entries.description:
トリガー 君がイニシアチブをロールするところである

君は軍勢へ呼びかけ、味方を戦闘状態へと鼓舞する。範囲内のすべての味方はイニシアチブ・ロールに+2ステータス・ボーナスと、呪文レベルに等しい一時的ヒットポイントを得る。

増強（6レベル） ボーナスは+3に増える

増強（9レベル） ボーナスは+4に増える

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.PNEGSVYhMKf6kQZ6]{呪文効果: 軍勢への呼び声}

entries.name: カーム・エモーションズ
entries.description:
君は無理やり、範囲内のクリーチャーを冷静にさせ、彼らを暴力的ではない状態になだめる；それぞれのクリーチャーは意志セーヴを試みなくてはならない。

クリティカル クリーチャーは影響を受けない

成功 冷静化された衝動によってクリーチャーの攻撃ロールに-1ステータス・ペナルティが与えられる

失敗 リーチャーに影響を与えるであろうあらゆる感情効果は抑制され、クリーチャーは敵対的アクションを取ることが出来ない。もし対象が他のクリーチャーの敵意の対象になったなら、カーム・エモーションズの影響下ではなくなる

ファンブル 失敗と同じだが、敵意によって効果が終わることはない

entries.name: Canticle of Everlasting Grief
entries.description:
You create a melody distilled from pure grief, conveying the inevitable loss of everything your target cherishes, audible only to them. The target must attempt a Will save.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target takes [[/r {5d6}[mental]]]{5d6 mental damage}, is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1}, and can't benefit from circumstance or status bonuses for 1 round.

Failure The target takes [[/r {10d6}[mental]]]{10d6 mental damage}, is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 3}, and can't benefit from circumstance or status bonuses for 1 week.

Critical Failure The target takes [[/r {20d6}[mental]]]{20d6 mental damage} and is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 4}. It can't benefit from circumstance or status bonuses until the curse is broken. While the curse remains, the target's allies are also unable to benefit from circumstance or status bonuses while within 15 feet of it.

entries.name: 怒濤の対抗手段
entries.description:
魔法の防御を提供するため、君は素早く@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.HbejhIywqIufrmVM]{「秘術の怒濤」}を調整する。君は呪文からのダメージに対して抵抗5を得る。通常通り、「秘術の怒濤」を再び使うことは、この構えとこの呪文の終了を意味する。

増強(+3) 抵抗が5点、増える

メモ: 混成呪文は「呪文撃」をリチャージする

entries.name: Cast into Time
entries.description:
You release a wave of temporal energy that sends creatures violently tumbling through time, scarring their thoughts with the information flowing around them. Although the journey can feel like it lasts for minutes or even days, the targets reappear instantly. Witnessing this chaotic flow of time and being bashed against objects from different times deals the targets 5d8 mental damage and 5d6 bludgeoning damage, with a Fortitude save. A creature that falls into time disappears until the end of your turn. It then reappears in the same space it left; if that space is occupied, it appears in the nearest empty space, chosen by the GM.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature falls into time. When it returns, it takes half damage.

Failure The creature falls into time. When it returns, it takes full damage and is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 1}.

Critical Failure The creature falls into time. When it returns, it takes double damage and is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 2}.

増強 (+1) The bludgeoning damage increase by 2d6.

entries.name: Cataclysm
entries.description:
You call upon the unimaginable power of world-ending cataclysms, ripping a small piece of each cataclysm and combining them together into one horrifically powerful attack. The following effects come down upon all creatures in the area. Treat the resistances of creatures in the area as if they were 10 lower for the purpose of determining the cataclysm's damage. Each creature attempts one basic Reflex save that applies to all five types of damage.

  • Flesh-dissolving acid rain deals 3d10 acid damage.
  • A roaring earthquake shakes and bludgeons creatures on the ground, dealing 3d10 bludgeoning damage.
  • A blast of freezing wind deals 3d10 cold damage.
  • Incredible lightning lashes the area, dealing 3d10 electricity damage.
  • Beating winds churn across the sky, dealing 3d10 bludgeoning damage to creatures flying in the area.
  • An instant tsunami sweeps over creatures in the area, dealing 3d10 bludgeoning damage with the water trait (doubled for creatures swimming in the area).
  • A massive wildfire burns in a sudden inferno, dealing 3d10 fire damage.

entries.name: Catch Your Name
entries.description:
Trigger A creature on your plane speaks your private or true name;

Requirements You know your own true name.

You learn a private name (but not the true name) of the creature who spoke your name, as well as their precise location, unless they succeed at a Will save to negate the effect. You are aware any time the trigger conditions are met as long as you have the spell prepared or in your repertoire. There is no way to distinguish one trigger of this spell from another without actually casting the spell. This can become a nuisance if you are so famous that your name is regularly on others' lips.

entries.name: 天上の烙印
entries.description:
燃えるシンボルが対象に現れ、神格の裁きのために目印をつける。君と君の味方はそのクリーチャーに対する攻撃ロールと技能判定に対して+1ステータス・ボーナスを得る。

善のクリーチャーがそのクリーチャーにダメージを与える時いつでも、その善のクリーチャーは追加で[[/r {1d4}[good]]]{1d4点の善ダメージ}を与える。対象はそれから1分間、一時的完全耐性を持つ。

増強 (+2) 善ダメージは1点、上昇する。

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.A61eVVVyUuaUl3tz]{呪文効果: 天上の烙印}

entries.name: Chain Lightning
entries.description:
You discharge a powerful bolt of lightning at the target, dealing 8d12 electricity damage. The target must attempt a basic Reflex save. The electricity arcs to another creature within 30 feet of the first target, jumps to another creature within 30 feet of that target, and so on. You can end the chain at any point. You can't target the same creature more than once, and you must have line of effect to all targets. Roll the damage only once, and apply it to each target (halving or doubling as appropriate for its saving throw outcome). The chain ends if any one of the targets critically succeeds at its save.

増強 (+1) The damage increases by 1d12.

entries.name: Chameleon Coat
entries.description:
You shift the colors of the targets' outermost layer of clothing and gear to be closer to their environment when they remain still. Creatures affected by the spell gain a +3 status bonus to Stealth checks to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.XMcnh4cSI32tljXa]{Hide}. The changed color granted by the spell always shifts to match the environment, even if there are drastic changes. If any piece of gear or clothing affected by the spell is removed from a creature, the spell ends for that creature.

増強 (6th) If a creature affected by this spell rolls a critical failure on its Stealth check to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.VMozDqMMuK5kpoX4]{Sneak} within 30 feet of a creature that would spot it, it instead only fails its check, as the spell mildly hypnotizes the spotter.

増強 (8th) As 6th level, and the status bonus is +4.

entries.name: Charged Javelin
entries.description:
You fire a javelin of electricity that leaves a charged field around its target. Make a spell attack roll. The javelin deals 1d6 electricity damage and [[/r {1}[persistent,electricity]]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Electricity Damage}.

As long as the target is taking @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Damage} from this spell, creatures gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls with metal weapons or electricity effects against the target, and the target takes a -1 status penalty to saves against electricity effects.

Critical Success The javelin deals double damage, both initial and persistent.

Success The javelin deals full damage.

増強 (+1) The initial damage increases by 1d6, and the Persistent Damage increases by 1.

entries.name: チャリタブル・アージ
entries.description:
君は慈善の美徳を語り、対象に所有欲を捨て去るように強制する。対象は意志セーヴを試みなくてはならない。もし対象が自分のアイテムを持っていないなら、呪文は失敗する。

クリティカル 対象は影響を受けない

成功 対象は衝動と戦っているため、@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{朦朧1}になる。

失敗 その次の手番に、他の何をするよりも先に、対象は最も近くのクリーチャーに所有物であるアイテムをプレゼントしなくてはならない；対象はどのアイテムをあげるかを選ぶ。そしてもし、そのクリーチャーが持っている唯一のアイテムが、戦闘遭遇の間の武器のように、自分の身を守るために現在、使っているものえだるなら、そのアイテムを渡すのではなく、1ラウンド、朦朧状態になることを選んでもよい。これは対象に、アイテムを外すための@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.pvQ5rY2zrtPI614F]{「使用」}や、最も近くのクリーチャーに到達するための移動をさせる。また、アイテムを対象に手渡すには常に1回の“使用”アクションが必要である。

ファンブル 失敗と同じだが、持続時間は4ラウンドで、対象は手番ごとに失敗時の効果を繰り返さなくてはならない。手番の終了時ごとに、対象は残っている持続時間を1ラウンド減らすために新しい意志セーヴを試みることが出来て、クリティカルしたなら完全に効果を終了させることが出来る。

entries.name: 魅惑の言葉
entries.description:
君は敵の怒りをはね除けるような力ある言葉を囁く。対象は意志セーヴを試みなくてはならない。

クリティカル 対象は影響を受けない

成功 対象は君に対する攻撃ロールとダメージロールに－1状況ペナルティを受ける

失敗 対象は君に対して敵対的な行動を取ることが出来ない

ファンブル 対象は@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{朦朧1}となり、君に対して敵対的な行動を取ることが出来ない

entries.name: チリング・ダークネス
entries.description:
君は、邪悪なエネルギーを帯びた、冷たい闇の光線を放つ。対象に遠隔呪文攻撃を行う。君は5d6点の氷雪ダメージを与え、もし対象がセレスチャルであるなら、5d6点の悪ダメージを与える。

もし、光線が魔法の光の範囲を通り抜けるか、対象が魔法の光に影響を受けているのなら、チリング・ダークネスは光を無効化しようと試みる。もし、光線が光の範囲を通り抜けるかどうか判断する必要がある場合は、君自身と呪文の対象の間に直線を引く。

クリティカル 対象は2倍のダメージを受ける

成功 対象は完全なダメージを受ける

増強 (+1) 氷雪ダメージは2d6点増え、セレスチャルに対する悪のダメージは2d6点増える

entries.name: チリング・スプレー
entries.description:
氷の破片の円錐が君の拡げた両手から飛び出し、対象を霜で覆う。君は範囲内のクリーチャーに2d4の氷雪ダメージを与える；対象は反応セーヴを試みなくてはならない。

クリティカル クリーチャーはダメージを受けない

成功 クリーチャーは半分のダメージを受ける

失敗 クリーチャーは完全なダメージを受け、2ラウンド、速度に－5フィートのステータス・ペナルティを受ける

ファンブル クリーチャーは2倍のダメージを受け、2ラウンド、速度に－10フィートのステータス・ペナルティを受ける

増強 (+1) ダメージは2d4増加する

entries.name: Chroma Leach
entries.description:
Your hand glows with impossible colors from beyond the stars, and your touch saps both color and vitality from the living. The target must attempt a Fortitude save; creatures with the gnome trait take a -2 circumstance penalty to this save.

Critical Success: The target is unaffected.

Success: The target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 2} for 1 round.

Failure: The target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 2} for 1 minute and @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 1}. The target is also filled with listlessness and ennui. For 1 round, if the target tries to use a move action, it must succeed at a Will save against your spell DC or the action is lost; this effect has the mental and emotion traits.

Critical Failure As failure, but the creature is permanently @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 2} and @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 2} (although magic such as @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.SnaLVgxZ9ryUFmUr]{Restoration} can reduce or remove these conditions).

entries.name: Chromatic Armor
entries.description:
You wrap the target in armor made of sheets of colored light. The armor sheds bright light for 20 feet (and dim light for the next 20 feet). Whenever a creature attacks the target and is adjacent to it, the attacker must attempt a Will save at the end of its action. On a failure, it becomes @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Dazzled} until the end of its next turn. Regardless of the result of the save, the attacker is temporarily immune until the end of its next turn. The dazzling effect has the light and visual traits.

When you cast the spell, roll [[/r 2d8]]{1d8 twice} on the table below to see the armor's colors (rerolling any duplicates). Each color grants resistance 5 to the indicated damage type. If you spend three actions to Cast the Spell, roll [[/r 3d8]]{three} times instead.

  1. Red fire
  2. Orange acid
  3. Yellow electricity
  4. Green poison
  5. Blue sonic
  6. Indigo mental
  7. Violet force
  8. Matching Color The armor becomes the color matching the type of damage the target took most recently in the past minute. If it didn't take any of those seven types of damage or the armor is already that color, roll again, rerolling any results of 8.

増強 (+3) The resistance is increased by 5.

entries.name: Chromatic Image
entries.description:
You call forth three illusory images of yourself, and each of the four of you takes on a different color, your colors all shifting each time someone attacks you. This has the effects of @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.j8vIoIEWElvpwkcI]{Mirror Image}, except that whenever a foe destroys one of the images, roll [[/r 1d4]]{1d4} to see which color the image was when it was destroyed. The attacker takes the corresponding effect.

  1. Red [[/r {5}[fire]]]{5 fire damage} and [[/r {5}[mental]]]{5 mental damage}.
  2. Orange [[/r {5}[acid]]]{5 acid damage} and [[/r {5}[mental]]]{5 mental damage}.
  3. Yellow [[/r {5}[electricity]]]{5 electricity damage} and [[/r {5}[mental]]]{5 mental damage}.
  4. Green [[/r 5 #poison]]{5 poison damage} and [[/r {5}[mental]]]{5 mental damage}, plus it's @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1}.

entries.name: Chromatic Ray
entries.description:
You send out a ray of colored light streaming toward your enemy, with a magical effect depending on the ray's color. Make a spell attack roll. If you hit, roll [[/r 1d4]]{1d4} to see which beam you cast. If the ray deals damage, that damage is doubled on a critical hit. Any additional traits that apply to a ray are listed in parentheses just after the name of the color.

  1. Red (fire) The ray deals [[/r {30}[fire]]]{30 fire damage} to the target.
  2. Orange (acid) The ray deals [[/r {40}[acid]]]{40 acid damage} to the target.
  3. Yellow (electricity) The ray deals [[/r {50}[electricity]]]{50 electricity damage} to the target.
  4. Green (poison) The ray deals [[/r 25 #poison]]{25 poison damage} to the target, and the target must succeed at a Fortitude save or be @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 1} for 1 minute (@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 2} on a critical failure).

増強 (6th) The damage for [[/r {40}[fire]]]{Red}, [[/r {50}[acid]]]{Orange}, [[/r {60}[electricity]]]{Yellow}, and [[/r 35 #poison]]{Green} each increase by 10. Roll [[/r 1d8]]{1d8} to determine the ray's color, using the results for 1-4 above and the results for 5-8 below.

  1. Blue The ray has the effect of the @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.znv4ECL7ZtuiagtA]{Flesh to Stone} spell. On a critical hit, the target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1} as long as it's @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed} by the flesh to stone effect.
  2. Indigo (emotion, incapacitation, mental) The ray has the effect of the @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.LiGbewa9pO0yjbsY]{Confusion} spell. On a critical hit, it has the effect of @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.8kJbiBEjMWG4VUjs]{Warp Mind} instead.
  3. Violet The target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed} for 1 minute. It must also succeed at a Will save or be teleported 120 feet directly away from you (if there isn't room for it to appear there, it appears in the nearest open space); this is a teleportation effect.
  4. Intense Color The target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Dazzled} until the end of your next turn, or @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Blinded} if your attack roll was a critical hit. Roll again and add the effects of another color (rerolling results of 8).

entries.name: Chromatic Wall
entries.description:
You create an opaque wall of light in a single vibrant color. The wall is straight and vertical, stretching 60 feet long and 30 feet high. If the wall would pass through a creature, the spell is lost. The wall sheds bright light for 20 feet on each side, and dim light for the next 20 feet. You can ignore the wall's effects.

Roll 1d4 to determine the color of the wall. Each color has a particular effect on items, effects, or creatures that attempt to pass through. Chromatic wall can't be counteracted normally; rather, each color is automatically counteracted when targeted by a specific spell, even if that spell's level is lower than that of chromatic wall.

  1. Red The wall destroys ranged weapon ammunition (such as arrows and crossbow bolts) that would pass through, and it deals 20 fire damage to anyone passing through, with a basic Reflex save. Cone of cold can counteract a red chromatic wall.
  2. Orange The wall destroys thrown weapons that would pass through, and it deals 25 acid damage to anyone passing through, with a basic Reflex save. Gust of wind can counteract an orange chromatic wall.
  3. Yellow The wall stops acid, cold, electricity, fire, force, negative, positive, and sonic effects from passing through, and it deals 30 electricity damage to anyone passing through, with a basic Reflex save. Disintegrate can counteract a yellow chromatic wall.
  4. Green The wall stops toxins, gases, and breath weapons from passing through. It deals 10 poison damage to anyone passing through and makes them @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 1} for 1 minute. A basic Fortitude save reduces the damage and negates the Enfeebled condition on a success. Passwall can counteract a green chromatic wall.

増強 (7th) The spell's duration increases to 1 hour. Roll 1d8 to determine the wall's color; the results for 5-8 are below. A red, orange, yellow, or green wall deals an extra 10 damage.

  1. Blue The wall stops auditory, petrification, and visual effects from passing through, and creatures passing through are subject to the effects of flesh to stone. Magic missile can counteract a blue chromatic wall.
  2. Indigo The wall stops divination and mental effects from passing through, and those passing through are subject to the effects of warp mind. Searing light can counteract an indigo chromatic wall.
  3. Violet The wall prevents spells from targeting the other side (area effects still cross as normal). Creatures passing through must succeed at a Will save or they are @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} for 1 minute; on a critical failure, the creature is instead sent to another plane, with the effect of plane shift. Dispel magic can counteract a violet chromatic wall.
  4. Reroll, and creatures that pass through the wall take a -2 circumstance penalty to their saves.

entries.name: サークル・オヴ・プロテクション
entries.description:
君はクリーチャーと近くに居る者たちを、特定の属性から守る。混沌、悪、善、秩序から1つを選ぶこと；この呪文はその対立属性の特性を得る。範囲内のクリーチャーは選んだ属性のクリーチャーからの攻撃に対するACと、そういったクリーチャーからの効果に対するセーヴに+1ステータス・ボーナスを得る。このボーナスは、対象を直接支配するその属性のクリーチャーと、選んだ属性の招来されたクリーチャーによる攻撃に対して+3に増える。選んだ属性の、招来されたクリーチャー意志セーヴに成功しなければ、範囲内に進んで入ることは出来ない；繰り返し試みても、最初のセーヴの結果を用いることになる。

増強 (4th) 持続時間は1時間になる

entries.name: クレーム・カース
entries.description: 対象の周囲にある運命の糸を燃やし、代わりに自分に結びつけることによって、君は一時的にその呪いを自分に引きつけ、その効果の最悪の部分を一時的に和らげる。君が既に影響を受けているもの以外の、対象に影響を与えている呪いを一つ、選ぶ。5分間、君はその呪いの影響を受ける（もし適用可能なら、対象と同じステージで）。対象は影響を受けない。持続時間が終了した後、通常通りに呪いの効果は対象に戻る。

entries.name: 不死者への呼びかけ
entries.description:
君は対象のアンデッドの制御や、その主人として自分を認識させようと試みる。もし、その対象が別のクリーチャーによって支配されているのなら、支配者は制御を取り戻すための意思セーヴィング・スローを試みる；そうでなければ、対象が意志セーヴを試みなくてはならない。

クリティカル 対象は影響を受けない

成功 対象は君の命令を振り払うために@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{朦朧1}になる

失敗 対象は君による@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.9qGBRpbX9NEwtAAr]{支配}状態になり、君の命令に従う。対象（あるいは以前にそのクリーチャーを支配していたクリーチャー）は対象の手番の終了時ごとに新しい意志セーヴを試みることが出来て、この呪文は成功時に終了する。もし君が明らかに自己破壊をするような命令をしたなら、対象は君が新しい命令をするまで行動することが出来ない

ファンブル 失敗と同じだが、対象（あるいは前に対象を支配していたクリーチャー）は君がその本質に反する新しい命令を与えたときにだけ新しいセーヴをする

entries.name: クレアオーディエンス
entries.description: 君は範囲内のある場所に@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{不可視}の宙に浮かぶ耳を作り出す（たとえ、それが君から視線や効果線が通っていなくても）。それは移動することは出来ないが、君は通常の聴覚を用いているのと同じようにその耳を通して音を耳にすることが出来る。

entries.name: Clairvoyance
entries.description: You create an @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Invisible} floating eye at a location within range (even if it's outside your line of sight or line of effect). The eye can't move, but you can see in all directions from that point as if using your normal visual senses.

entries.name: クロウソング
entries.description:
君は低音で唸るような激しい祈りを歌い上げ、対象の素手による一撃を導き、強化するためにテルワの獣の古代の精神を目覚めさせる。

対象の爪による攻撃は可変（刺突）特性を得て、1d6点の斬撃ダメージを与える。もし、対象の爪攻撃が既に1d6点の斬撃ダメージを与えるのなら、代わりに1d8点を与える。

もし、その爪による攻撃が既に可変（刺突）特性を持っているなら、致命的1d8の特性を得る。

増強 (4th) この呪文は素手の爪「打撃」を持つ6体までの同意するクリーチャーに影響を与えることが出来る

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.CWC2fPmlgixoIKy5]{呪文効果: クロウソング (ダメージ上昇：D6)}

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.afJCG4vC5WF5h5IB]{呪文効果: クロウソング (ダメージ上昇：D8)}

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.g4E9l4uA62LcRBJS]{呪文効果: クロウソング（可変（刺突）)}

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.zdpTPf157rXl3tEJ]{呪文効果: クロウソング（致命的d8)}

entries.name: 浄化の炎
entries.description: 君は対象を、浄化の炎で包み込む。君は、1つの毒、あるいは呪いではない効果で、@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{もたつき}、@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{目の眩んだ状態}、@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{衰弱}、@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{疲労}、@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{怯え}、@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{麻痺}、@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{不調}、@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{知性低下}をもたらす効果を無効化する試みが出来る。対象は、生命力をもって炎に力を与えることを選択でき、そうすると@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{吸精1}になる（あるいは，既にこの状態であるなら吸精値を1増やす）が、君の無効化判定に+1状況ボーナスを与えることが出来る。

entries.name: 氷の抱擁
entries.description:
凍てついたみぞれや大雪が対象の足回りに集まり、[[/r {1d4}[氷雪]]]{1d4点の氷雪ダメージ}と、その反応セーヴに基づいたその他の効果を与える。呪文が終了したなら、対象は1分間、一時的完全耐性を持つ。

クリティカル 対象は影響を受けない

成功 対象は半分のダメージを受ける

失敗 対象は完全なダメージを受け、呪文が終了するまで速度に－5フィートの状況ペナルティを受ける

ファンブル 対象は完全なダメージを受け、呪文が終了するまで速度に－5フィートの状況ペナルティを受ける

増強(+1) ダメージは[[/r {1d4}[氷雪]]]点、増える

entries.name: Clinging Shadows Stance
entries.description:
You adopt the stance of clinging shadows. You can make shadow grasp @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.VjxZFuUXrCU94MWR]{Strikes}. These deal [[/r {1d4}[negative]]]{1d4 negative damage}; are in the brawling group; and have the agile, grapple, reach, and unarmed traits.

While in clinging shadows stance, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Athletics checks to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.PMbdMWc2QroouFGD]{Grapple}, and to the DC for creatures to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escape} from you.

@Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.uFYvW3kFP9iyNfVX]{Stance: Clinging Shadows Stance}

entries.name: Cloak of Colors
entries.description:
A cloak of swirling colors shrouds the target. Creatures are @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Dazzled} while adjacent to it, and attacking the target causes a brilliant flash of light. A creature that hits the target with a melee attack must attempt a Will save.The creature is temporarily immune until the end of its turn; this effect has the incapacitation trait.

Success The attacker is unaffected.

Failure The attacker is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Blinded} for 1 round.

Critical Failure The attacker is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned} for 1 round.

entries.name: Cloak of Light
entries.description:
You surround yourself in holy light that restores the living and rebuffs undead. You glow with bright light in a 30-foot radius and dim light to the next 30 feet.

Living creatures that begin their turn adjacent to you recover 2d4 Hit Points. Undead creatures that begin their turn adjacent to you take [[/r {4d4}[positive]]]{4d4 positive damage}.

増強 (+2) The healing increases by 1d4, and the damage to undead increases by [[/r {2d4}[positive]]]{2d4 positive damage}.

entries.name: Clone
entries.description:
You remove 1 cubic inch of flesh from the target, who must be present throughout the ritual and can be one of the casters. You then use that flesh to grow a duplicate of the target's physical form that will house the target's soul upon death. This duplicate is physically identical to the original creature.

In order to perform the ritual, you need an @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.uhka9LHEP3wDKytG]{Expanded Alchemist's Lab} or a superior set of equipment. Once the ritual is successfully completed, the duplicate grows within the laboratory equipment for [[/r 2d4 #months]]{2d4 months}. While direct involvement isn't required during this period of growth, you must prevent any interference or interruption or the ritual fails. When the duplicate is complete, the original creature's soul enters it as soon as their original body dies, or immediately if the creature died during theintervening months, as long as the soul is free and willing. If Pharasma has decided that the target's time has come or the target's soul is trapped or doesn't wish to return, the duplicate remains empty until the impediment is removed. While unoccupied, the inert duplicate must be preserved in suitable alchemical equipment to prevent it from rotting.

Critical Success The cloning process is successful. When the soul occupies the completed clone, it is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1}, @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 1}, @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv]{Doomed 1}, and @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 1} for 1 week; these conditions can't be removed or reduced by any means until the week has passed.

Success As critical success, but each condition value is 2.

Failure You fail to form the clone.

Critical Failure The clone appears to be successful, but something went horribly wrong. Once it grows to its full size, it can't hold the target's soul and instead houses a malevolent intelligence or an invasive creature such as an @Compendium[pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary-2.M2BkGD9YwEmCvD9D]{Invidiak} Demon.

entries.name: Clone Companion
entries.description:
You create a duplicate of your companion, and the duplicate fights alongside its twin, mirroring the original's actions. The duplicate appears adjacent to your companion and has the same statistics.

Each time you Command your companion, both your companion and its duplicate gain 2 actions. The duplicate always acts immediately after your companion and must use identical actions to the ones your companion used, in exactly the same order. However, it can use the actions differently, such as Striding to a different position or selecting a different target for a Strike. If the duplicate is unable to mimic an action, it performs the action without result and the action is wasted. The duplicate can't use any actions that can be used only a limited number of times per day.

The duplicate isn't truly alive and can't be healed in any way. If the duplicate ever reaches 0 Hit Points, it is instantly destroyed and clone companion immediately ends.

entries.name: Cloudkill
entries.description:
You conjure a poisonous fog. This functions as @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.9XHmC2JgTUIQ1CCm]{Obscuring Mist}, except the area moves 10 feet away from you each round. You deal 6d8 poison damage to each breathing creature that starts its turn in the spell's area. You can Dismiss the spell.

増強 (+1) The damage increases by 1d8.

entries.name: Clownish Curse
entries.description:
You afflict the target with a curse that causes it to emit ridiculous noises as it moves. Furthermore, the target's hands and feet become awkward and uncoordinated, as though it were wearing oversized gloves and shoes.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success For 1 round, the target must roll twice and use the worse result whenever attempting an Acrobatics, Stealth, or Thievery check. If the target rolls a failure at an Acrobatics, Stealth, or Thievery check, it gets a critical failure instead.

Failure As success, but the effect is 1 hour.

Critical Failure As success, except the effect is permanent.

entries.name: Collective Transposition
entries.description:
You teleport the targets to new positions within the area. The creatures must each be able to fit in their new space, and their positions must be unoccupied, entirely within the area, and in your line of sight. Unwilling creatures can attempt a Will save.

Critical Success The target can teleport if it wants, but it chooses the destination within range.

Success The target is unaffected.

Failure You teleport the target and choose its destination.

増強 (+1) The number of targets increases by 1.

entries.name: Combustion
entries.description:
You ignite a creature in lasting flames. The fire deals 4d8 fire damage and [[/r {2d6}[persistent,fire]]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Fire Damage} to the creature, which must attempt a Fortitude save.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature takes half damage and takes no persistent damage.

Failure The creature takes full damage, as well as full persistent damage.

Critical Failure The creature takes double damage, as well as double persistent damage.

増強 (+1) Increase the initial damage by 1d8 and the persistent damage by [[/r {1d6}[fire]]].

entries.name: Commune
entries.description:
You call upon an unknown planar entity to answer questions; this is a servitor of your deity if you have one and use Religion. You can ask up to seven questions that could be answered with "Yes" or "No." The entity is likely to know answers related to its purview; a servitor of @Compendium[pf2e.deities.swwwP7eVmlNuWTb7]{Gozreh} would likely know about unnatural weather patterns and a servitor of @Compendium[pf2e.deities.JgqH3BhuEuA4Zyqs]{Desna} would likely know someone's travel route. The entity answers with one word answers such as "Yes," "No," "Likely," and "Unknown," though its answers always reflect its own agenda and could be deceptive.

Critical Success You contact a more powerful entity aligned strongly with your interests, possibly even your deity. The entity won't attempt to deceive you, though it still might not know the answers. When it's important to provide clarity, the entity will answer your questions with up to five words, such as "If you leave immediately" or "That was true once."

Success You can ask your questions and receive answers.

Failure You fail to contact a planar entity.

Critical Failure You are exposed to the enormity of the cosmos and are @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 4} for 1 week (can't remove by any means).

entries.name: Commune with Nature
entries.description: As @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.7DN13ILADW2N9Z1t]{Commune}, except you contact the primal spirits of nature, which know about animals, beasts, fey, plants, topography, and natural resources within a 3-mile radius of the ritual's location.

entries.name: Community Repair
entries.description:
You lead your community in repairing a public work, such as a bridge, well, or mural, through the power of memory and art. The primary caster serves as an emcee or leader, while each secondary caster provides a heartfelt anecdote that somehow involves the public work; for instance, recounting a story of playing at a fountain each summer. The anecdotes don't need to be firsthand accounts-a community member might sing of how their grandparents fell in love crossing a bridge every day-but they must be directly connected in some way. The GM can offer a +1 circumstance bonus to the secondary caster whose anecdote seems most moving.

If the public work was destroyed intentionally by one of the casters, the ritual automatically critically fails.

Critical Success The public work is restored to its prior construction, and it takes on further qualities, encouraged by the thoughts of the community. For the next week, while a caster is within 60 feet of the site of the ritual, they receive a +1 status bonus to Will saves against emotion effects and a +10-foot status bonus to their Speeds. @Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.R3j6song8sYLY5vG]{Spell Effect: Community Repair (Critical Success)}

Success The public work is restored to its prior construction and function.

Failure The ritual has no effect.

Critical Failure The public work refuses to repair itself, and the memories of the community members are soured in response to the botched ritual. For the next week, while a caster is within 60 feet of the site of the ritual, they cannot receive any benefit from beneficial emotion effects, and they take a -10-foot status penalty to their Speeds as their movement slows to a morose crawl. @Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.6qvLnIkWAoGvTIWy]{Spell Effect: Community Repair (Critical Failure)}

entries.name: Compel True Name
entries.description:
You instruct the target to do something, compelling obedience by calling it by its true name. Your instructions can't be self-destructive. Though this spell has the linguistic trait, this applies only to the instructions; the creature doesn't need to know its own true name to be affected. The target must attempt a Will saving throw.

Critical Success The target is unaffected, is temporarily immune to further castings of this spell by you for 1 week, and learns your true name.

Success The target is unaffected, is temporarily immune to further castings of this spell by you for 1 day, and learns a fragment of your true name.

Failure The target does as you command. The spell has a duration of 10 minutes, or until the target has completed a finite instruction or the instructions become selfdestructive. The creature is temporarily immune to further castings of this spell by you for 1 hour.

Critical Failure As failure, but the spell's duration is 8 hours, and the creature is not temporarily immune.

entries.name: コンプリヘンド・ランゲージ
entries.description:
対象は、君が呪文を発動している際に聞くか読むかしている一つの言語の意味を理解することが出来る。これは暗号の理解や暗喩にまみれた言語といったもの（GMの裁量次第）を理解させることはない。もし対象が複数の言語を耳にすることが出来て、それを知っているなら、どの言語を理解するか選ぶことが出来る；そうでなければ、ランダムに一つの言語を選ぶこと。

増強 (3rd) 対象は言語を話すことも出来る

増強 (4th) 君は10体までのクリーチャーを対象にすることが出来て、対象は言語を話すことも出来る

entries.name: Concealment's Curtain
entries.description:
At twilight for 5 days, you line the fruit in front of the mirror, chanting the name of the target, and envisioning its eyes in your mind. At exactly midnight on the last day, you drive the pins through the fruits, miming the action of methodically blinding the target to you and your companions. The target is immediately affected and can't visually detect any of the casters involved in the ritual-provided that the ritual was successful, the target is unaware of the effects. Since the ritual affects the target's ability to see the casters, rather than make the casters @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Invisible}, effects like true seeing are ineffective against concealment's curtain; instead, the target would need to remove the curse with effects like remove curse. To perform this ritual, you must have been within 5 feet of the target at least once, close enough to get a good look at its eyes. The target is temporarily immune to further castings of concealment's curtain for 1 year.

Critical Success The target is unable to visually detect the casters for the duration, and the target's detection spells don't detect the targets.

Success The target is unable to visually detect the casters for the duration, but it's detection spells function normally.

Failure The ritual has no effect.

Critical Failure The ritual backfires and all casters participating in it are @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Blinded} for the next 24 hours.

増強 (8th) You aren't satisfied with simply concealing yourself from the target. The cost of the ritual mirror increases to 1,000 gp, and a personal effect of the target is required. After completing the ritual, the target takes 6d6 mental damage and is blinded for 1 week, requiring both a remove curse and a restore senses to end the effect early. The target is aware that the ritual was cast on them; however, it doesn't have any additional information.

entries.name: コンコーダント・クワイア
entries.description:
君は反響する音で構成された危険な調和音を解き放ち、それを1体の対象に集中させるか、多くの敵にダメージを与えるために広める。君が「呪文の発動」の際に消費したアクション数が対象、距離、範囲、その他の変数を決定する。

1 (音声) の呪文は基本頑健セーヴを伴う[[/r {1d4}[音波]]]{1d4点の音波ダメージ}を単体の対象に与える

2 (動作、音声) この呪文は10フィート爆発内の全てのクリーチャーに基本頑健セーヴを伴う[[/r {2d4}[音波]]]{2d4点の音波ダメージ}を与える

3 (物質、動作、音声) 呪文は30フィート拡散内の全てのクリーチャーに基本頑健セーヴを伴う[[/r {2d4}[音波]]]{2d4点の音波ダメージ}を与える

増強 (+1) 1アクションバージョンなら1d4点、他のバージョンなら2d4点、ダメージが上昇する

entries.name: Cone of Cold
entries.description:
Icy cold rushes forth from your hands. You deal 12d6 cold damage to creatures in the area.

増強 (+1) The damage increases by 2d6.

entries.name: Confusion
entries.description:
You befuddle your target with strange impulses, causing it to act randomly. The effects are determined by the target's Will save. You can Dismiss the spell.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target babbles incoherently and is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 1}.

Failure The target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{Confused} for 1 minute. It can attempt a new save at the end of each of its turns to end the confusion.

Critical Failure The target is Confused for 1 minute, with no save to end early.

増強 (8th) You can target up to 10 creatures.

entries.name: Consecrate
entries.description:
You consecrate a site to your deity, chanting praises and creating a sacred space. While within the area, worshippers of your deity gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls, skill checks, saving throws, and Perception checks, and creatures anathema to your deity (such as undead for @Compendium[pf2e.deities.QZD0u1jxwz0kj8uI]{Pharasma} or @Compendium[pf2e.deities.BNycwu3I21dTh4D9]{Sarenrae}) take a -1 status penalty to those checks. Attacks made by worshippers of your deity within the area deal 1 damage of one of your deity's alignment types (your choice); if your deity is true neutral, you don't gain this benefit.

Critical Success The consecration succeeds, and it either lasts for 10 years instead of 1 or covers an area with twice the radius. Occasionally, with your deity's favor, this might produce an even more amazing effect, such as a permanently consecrated area or the effect covering an entire cathedral.

Success The consecration succeeds.

Failure The consecration fails.

Critical Failure The consecration fails spectacularly and angers your deity, who sends a sign of displeasure. For at least 1 year, further attempts to consecrate the site fail.

増強 (7th) The consecrated area also gains the effects of the @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.XZE4BawIlTf88Yl9]{Dimensional Lock} spell, but the effect doesn't attempt to counteract teleportation by worshippers of your deity. The cost increases to 200 gp × the spell level.

entries.name: 闇食らい
entries.description:
君から広がる前にその影が蠢き、別次元の怪物がかろうじて見えるような、影を食らう、まとわりつくような門を形成する。君がこの@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.3f5DMFu8fPiqHpRg]{「呪文の維持」}をする、手番ごとの最初の時に、この半径は5フィートずつ増える。範囲に入ったか、手番を範囲内で開始した敵はそれぞれ、[[/r {2d6}[負のエネルギー]]]{2d6点の負のエネルギーダメージ}を受け、反応セーヴを試みなくてはならない。

クリティカル クリーチャーは影響を受けない

成功 クリーチャーは部分的に影に沈み、半分のダメージを受け、範囲内に留まっている限り、速度に－5フィートの状況ペナルティを受ける

失敗 成功と同じだが、全てのダメージを受け、速度に－10フィートの状況ペナルティを受ける

ファンブル クリーチャーは地面の下にあるように見える影の中に呑み込まれる；2倍のダメージを受け、1ラウンドか@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{「脱出」}するまで@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{動けない状態}になる

増強 (+1) ダメージは[[/r {1d6}[負のエネルギー]]]、上昇する

entries.name: Contingency
entries.description:
You prepare a spell that will trigger later. While casting contingency, you also cast another spell of 4th level or lower with a casting time of no more than 3 actions. This companion spell must be one that can affect you. You must make any decisions for the spell when you cast contingency, such as choosing a damage type for resist energy. During the casting, choose a trigger under which the spell will be cast, using the same restrictions as for the trigger of a Ready action. Once contingency is cast, you can cause the companion spell to come into effect as a reaction with that trigger. It affects only you, even if it would affect more creatures. If you define complicated conditions, as determined by the GM, the trigger might fail. If you cast contingency again, the newer casting supersedes the older.

増強 (8th) You can choose a spell of 5th level or lower.

増強 (9th) You can choose a spell of 6th level or lower.

増強 (10th) You can choose a spell of 7th level or lower.

entries.name: コンティニュアル・フレイム
entries.description:
松明と同じくらいの輝いている魔法の炎が物体から放たれる。この炎は酸素を必要とせず、水に反応せず、熱を生むこともない。

増強 (+1) ストは下記の通りに増えていく:

  • 3rd：16gp
  • 4th：30gp
  • 5th：60gp
  • 6th：120gp
  • 7th：270
  • 8th：540
  • 9th：1,350
  • 10th：3,350 gp

entries.name: Control Sand
entries.description:
You whip up a small sandstorm around your body. When a creature starts its turn in the area or moves into the area, it must succeed at a Fortitude save or become dazzled for as long as it remains in the area; it is then temporarily immune to this dazzling effect for 10 minutes.

Choose one of the following additional effects when you cast this spell. On subsequent rounds, you can switch to a different effect once per round as a free action triggered by sustaining the spell.

  • Sand Shield You create a magical shield made of sand. The sand shield provides no benefit to AC, but it does allow you to use the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.jM72TjJ965jocBV8]{Shield Block} reaction and acts as a shield for this purpose. The sand shield has Hardness 14, 21 Hit Points, and no Broken Threshold; when the shield's HP are reduced to 0, you can't use its Shield Block reaction again until the next time you Sustain the Spell and choose the sand shield effect.
  • Sandblast You direct a jet of sand at a single target. One creature of your choice within 30 feet takes 8d6 slashing damage (basic Reflex save). On a critical failure, the creature is also @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Dazzled} for 1 minute.
  • Sandstorm The area of the spell expands to a 30-foot emanation, and any creature that starts its turn in the area or moves into the area takes 6d4 slashing damage (basic Reflex save) and must hold its breath or begin suffocating.

entries.name: Control Water
entries.description:
By imposing your will upon the water, you can raise or lower the level of water in the chosen area by 10 feet. Water creatures in the area are subjected to the effects of @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.WsUwpfmhKrKwoIe3]{Slow}.

Area: 50 ft long by 50 ft wide

entries.name: Control Weather
entries.description:
You alter the weather, making it calm and normal for the season or choosing up to two effects based on the season.

You can't specifically control the manifestations, such as the exact path of a tornado or the targets of lightning strikes.

  • Autumn cold weather, fog, mild heat, sleet
  • Spring drizzle, heat, hurricane, sleet, thunderstorm, tornado
  • Summer drizzle, downpour, extreme heat, hail, heat
  • Winter blizzard, mild cold, extreme cold, thaw

Critical Success You change the weather as desired and can affect a larger area (up to a 5-mile-radius circle), or a longer duration (any number of additional d12 hours, up to 16d12).

Success You change the weather as desired.

Failure You fail to change the weather as desired.

Critical Failure The weather changes in an unanticipated way, determined by the GM but generally as contradictory to your true desires as possible (for instance, a terrible storm emerges when you would prefer good weather).

増強 (9th) You can create unseasonable weather and contradictory weather effects, such as extreme cold and a hurricane. You can make the weather calm and normal weather for a different season or choose weather effects from any season's list.

entries.name: Coral Eruption
entries.description:
Razor sharp coral growths erupt from the ground, transforming the landscape into a dangerous coral reef. You can create a third nonoverlapping burst if the centers of all three bursts are underwater. Creatures in the area when the spell is cast take 6d6 piercing damage and must attempt a basic Reflex save. A creature that critically fails its saving throw also takes [[/r {1d6}[persistent,bleed]]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Bleed Damage}. The area becomes difficult terrain and hazardous terrain. A creature that moves through the area takes [[/r {3}[piercing]]]{3 piercing damage} for every square of that area it moves into.

増強 (+2) The initial piercing damage increases by 3d6, and the hazardous terrain damage increases by [[/r {1}[piercing]]].

entries.name: Corrosive Body
entries.description:
You exhale corrosive gas, and acidic secretions coat your skin as you transform into a being of living acid. You gain acid immunity. Any creature that touches you or damages you with an unarmed melee attack or non-reach melee weapon takes [[/r {3d6}[acid]]]{3d6 acid damage}, and your unarmed attacks deal 1d4 additional acid damage. The first time each round that you deal acid damage to a creature in this way, you gain [[/r 3d6 #temporary HP]]{3d6 temporary HP} as your body digests the eroded material and transforms it into a protective acid. When the spell ends, any remaining temporary HP expires as well. Your acid spells deal one additional die of acid damage (of the same damage die the spell uses). You can cast acid splash as an innate spell; the splash damage affects all creatures within 15 feet instead of the normal 5 feet.

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.LT5AV9vSN3T9x3J9]{Spell Effect: Corrosive Body}

増強 (9th) Creatures touching you take [[/r {4d6}[acid]]]{4d6 acid damage} instead of 3d6, your unarmed attacks deal 2d4 additional acid damage, and you gain [[/r 5d6 #temporary HP]]{5d6 temporary HP}. @Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.xKJVqN1ETnNH3tFg]{Spell Effect: Corrosive Body (増強 9th)}

entries.name: Cosmic Form
entries.description:
You recreate your form entirely out of cosmic energy, transforming into a Large battle form. You must have enough space to expand into, or the spell is lost. When you cast this spell, choose to take on the powers of the moon or the sun. You have hands in this battle form and can use manipulate actions. You can Dismiss the spell.

You gain the following statistics and abilities regardless of the form that you choose:

  • AC = 21 + your level. Ignore your armor check's penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 20 temporary Hit Points.
  • Darkvision.
  • One or more attacks specific to the battle form you use. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +25, and you use the listed damage. The melee attacks are Strength based (for the purpose of the enfeebled condition, for example), and the ranged attacks are Dexterity based. If your unarmed attack modifier is higher, you can use it instead.
  • Athletics modifier of +25, unless your own is higher.

You also gain specific abilities based on the stellar body:

  • Moon Speed 30 feet, fly 50 feet;
    • Melee 1 fist (agile, reach 10 feet), Damage 2d4+10 bludgeoning plus 1d6 fire;
    • Ranged 1 moonbeam (range 90 feet), Damage 2d4+10 fire; this form's fire damage is silver for resistances, weaknesses, and the like;
    • On a critical hit with either Strike, the target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 2} for 1 round.

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.tfdDpf9xSWgQer5g]{Spell Effect: Cosmic Form (Moon)}

  • Sun Speed 30 feet, fly 50 feet;
    • Melee 1 fist (agile, reach 10 feet), Damage 2d6+10 fire plus 1d6 persistent fire;
    • Ranged 1 sunbeam (range 90 feet), Damage 1d6+10 fire plus 1d6 persistent fire;
    • On a critical hit with either Strike, the target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Dazzled} for 1 round.

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.2Ss5VblfZNHg1HjN]{Spell Effect: Cosmic Form (Sun)}

entries.name: Countless Eyes
entries.description: Eyes form across the touched creature's body, allowing it to see in all directions at once. The subject can't be flanked for the spell's duration. In addition, when the subject @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{Seeks}, it can Seek in a 30-foot burst centered on itself or up to four 15-foot bursts within line of sight.

entries.name: コージィ・キャビン
entries.description:
君は20フィート四方で高さ10フィートのキャビンを作る。このキャビンは構造物の特性を持ち、構造物の作成と同じ魔法のアイテムの制約を受ける。この小屋の壁は素朴で木製であり、小さな、四角形のガラス窓があり、一枚の木製の扉を持つ。この小屋にや独自の@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.q2TYVAMaK6UfenbV]{錠前}はないが、錠前をつけることが出来るような留め具が一つある。

T内部には3つの寝床、1つのトイレ、そして魔法の炎がついた小さな暖炉がある。屋内は、君が精神集中の特性を持つ単発アクションを使うことによって無制限に点灯することも消すことも出来る小さな魔法の明かりがある。小屋の中の気候は快適で、その中にいるクリーチャー達は最も敵対的な天候にも耐えることが出来るが、異例の暑さや寒さ、強力な嵐、ハリケーンの風といったもの以上の力は小屋を破壊する。その他のクリーチャー達は、ダメージを与えることなく自由に小屋に出入りすることが出来るが、君が小屋を出たなら呪文は終了する。君はこの呪文を@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.AjLSHZSWQ90exdLo]{「解除」}することが出来る。

entries.name: クラッシング・ウェイヴ
entries.description:
君は君から遠くへと押し寄せていく、砕ける波を召喚する。君は範囲内のクリーチャーに 6d6点の殴打ダメージを与える。水はまた、範囲内の魔法のものではない火を消火する。

増強 (+1) ダメージは 2d6点、増える

entries.name: Create Demiplane
entries.description:
Few incantations are as renowned as the power to create worlds. To cast this ritual, you must be on the Astral Plane, the Ethereal Plane, or a plane that connects to one of the two.

A demiplane created with this ritual exists on the Astral or Ethereal Plane. It can have the appearance of any mundane environment or structure, such as a glorious cathedral, a clearing in a forest, a comfortably furnished cavern, or anything else one can imagine. All demiplanes have finite, unbreachable boundaries, which might resemble stone, wood, or something more unnatural, such as a wall of mist or unceasing void.

Demiplanes have environmental conditions as appropriate for the Material Plane, though the primary caster can dictate a general climate or light level, as well as whether the demiplane experiences seasons or a day-night cycle. The demiplane has no native plants or animals, but they can be introduced, and plants will grow in a demiplane's light.

When you first cast create demiplane, the casters are teleported to the demiplane. The demiplane has no direct access to other worlds, so @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.5bTt2CvYHPvaR7QQ]{Plane Shift} or similar abilities are necessary to access it. As part of casting the ritual to create a new demiplane, you create a key to the demiplane which serves as a plane shift tuning fork for that demiplane. Most resemble ornate keys, but some take the forms of maps, compasses, or dowsing rods.

If you have the original key to an existing demiplane and are on that demiplane, you can instead use this ritual to either expand the demiplane or add special traits or features.

  • Alignment The demiplane gains one alignment trait, such as lawful or good.
  • Bounteous The demiplane has a functional ecosystem, with plants and animals appropriate to the environment. This ecosystem doesn't require any additional effort on your part to maintain.
  • Elemental The demiplane gains the air, earth, fire, or water planar essence trait.
  • Gravity The demiplane gains a gravity trait of your choice.
  • Key You create an additional key that can be used to access the demiplane with plane shift and improve it with create demiplane.
  • Portal You create a permanent gateway between the demiplane and a single other location. You must spend the ritual's casting time constructing the gateway on the external side, which typically resembles an arch or doorway of some sort. The gate is always active, but it can be secured as you would any door.
  • Scope The demiplane can be unbounded instead of finite, though still with the same size.

Critical Success You create a new demiplane whose area consists of two contiguous squares, each 100 feet on a side. The ceiling is 20 feet high. If modifying an existing demiplane, you can instead either add this area to the demiplane's size or add two special traits or features.

Success As critical success, but the demiplane's area is a single square, 100 feet on a side and a ceiling 20 feet high. If modifying an existing demiplane, you can add one special trait or feature.

Failure The ritual has no effect.

Critical Failure Something goes horribly wrong, and all casters are teleported to an unknown but likely hostile plane.

増強 (10th) The ritual creates a square area 1,000 feet on a side, with a ceiling 20 feet high (two contiguous areas of this size on a critical success). The cost of the ritual increases to 20,000 gp

entries.name: クリエイト・フード
entries.description:
君は6体の中型クリーチャーを1日、養うのに十分な食料を作り出す。この食料は味気なく、魅力的ではないものの、栄養にとんでいる。1日後に、もし誰もその食料を食べなかったのなら、腐って食べられなくなる。ほとんどの小型のクリーチャーは中型クリーチャーの1/4しか食べない（ほとんどの超小型クリーチャーは1/16しか食べない）。また、ほとんどの大型クリーチャーは中型クリーチャーの10倍食べる（超大型クリーチャーは100倍といった具合で続いていく）。

増強 (4th) 君は12体の中型クリーチャーを養うことが出来る

増強 (6th) 君は50体の中型クリーチャーを養うことが出来る

増強 (8th) 君は200体の中型クリーチャーを養うことが出来る

entries.name: Create Skinstitch
entries.description:
You transform the target into a skinstitch, a hideous construct covered in the flesh of sentient humanoids.

Critical Success The target becomes a skinstitch. If it's at least 4 levels lower than you, you can make it a minion which gives it the minion trait. You can have a maximum of four minions under your control. If it doesn't become a minion, you can give it one simple command that it pursues single-mindedly. If you aren't a follower of @Compendium[pf2e.deities.GX6PF9ifR47Xyjg9]{Norgorber}, it ignores any of your subsequent commands. A follower of Norgorber can give the skinstitch simple commands by presenting a @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.upzjwQ96cZG0Xlmx]{Religious Symbol} of the deity and commanding it with a single action that has the auditory and concentrate traits.

Success As critical success, except a skinstitch that doesn't become your minion stays in place and attacks anyone that attacks or tries to move it, rather than following your command.

Failure You fail to create the skinstitch.

Critical Failure You create the skinstitch, but it goes berserk and attempts to kill you, ignoring your commands even if you are a follower of Norgorber.

entries.name: Create Undead
entries.description:
You transform the target into an undead creature with a level up to that allowed in Table 7-1. There are many versions of this ritual, each specific to a particular type of undead (one ritual for all zombies, one for skeletons, one for ghouls, and so on), and the rituals that create rare undead are also rare. Some forms of undead, such as liches, form using their own unique methods and can't be created with a version of create undead.

Table 7-1: Creatures Creation Rituals

Creature Level Spell Level Required Cost
-1 or 0 2 15 gp
1 2 60 gp
2 3 105 gp
3 3 180 gp
4 4 300 gp
5 4 480 gp
6 5 750 gp
7 5 1,080 gp
8 6 1,500 gp
9 6 2,100 gp
10 7 3,000 gp
11 7 4,200 gp
12 8 6,000 gp
13 8 9,000 gp
14 9 13,500 gp
15 9 19,500 gp
16 10 30,000 gp
17 10 45,000 gp

Critical Success The target becomes an undead creature of the appropriate type. If it's at least 4 levels lower than you, you can make it a minion. This gives it the minion trait, meaning it can use 2 actions when you command it, and commanding it is a single action that has the auditory and concentrate traits. You can have a maximum of four minions under your control. If it's intelligent and doesn't become a minion, the undead is helpful to you for awakening it, though it's still a horrid and evil creature. If it's unintelligent and doesn't become a minion, you can give it one simple command. It pursues that goal single-mindedly, ignoring any of your subsequent commands.

Success As critical success, except an intelligent undead that doesn't become your minion is only friendly to you, and an unintelligent undead that doesn't become your minion leaves you alone unless you attack it. It marauds the local area rather than following your command.

Failure You fail to create the undead.

Critical Failure You create the undead, but its soul, tortured by your foul necromancy, is full of nothing but hatred for you. It attempts to destroy you.

entries.name: Creation
entries.description:
You conjure a temporary object from eldritch energy. It must be of vegetable matter (such as wood or paper) and 5 cubic feet or smaller. It can't rely on intricate artistry or complex moving parts, never fulfills a cost or the like, and can't be made of precious materials or materials with a rarity of uncommon or higher. It is obviously temporarily conjured, and thus can't be sold or passed off as a genuine item.

増強 (5th) The item is metal and can include common minerals, like feldspar or quartz.

entries.name: クライシス・オヴ・フェイス
entries.description:
君は対象の信仰を攻撃し、クリーチャーを疑心暗鬼と精神的混乱に陥れて6d6点の精神ダメージか、対象が信仰呪文を発動することが出来るなら、6d8点の精神ダメージを与える。効果は意志セーヴによって決定される。

多くの神格にとって、自分の信じる神格の信者に重大な理由なくこの呪文を発動することは、破戒行為である。

クリティカル 対象は影響を受けない

成功 対象は半分のダメージを受ける

失敗 T対象は完全なダメージを受ける；もし、対象が信仰呪文を発動することが出来るなら、1ラウンド、@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{知性低下1}になる

ファンブル 対象は2倍のダメージを受け、1ラウンド、@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{知性低下1}になる。そして、1ラウンド、信仰呪文を発動することが出来なくなる

増強 (+1) ダメージは2d6点（対象が信仰術者であるなら2d8点）上昇する

entries.name: Crusade
entries.description:
You issue a divine mandate or proclaim a cause to the targets. It can be to attain an item, claim a patch of land, slay a creature, war with a group, or be entirely peaceful. Your cause can't force the targets to harm one another or themselves. The targets become completely dedicated to that cause, depending on their levels. They choose their own actions, but they favor direct action over inaction or indirect action.

  • 13th or Lower The target is so dedicated to the cause that it pursues the cause to the death (unless you say otherwise).
  • 14th The target is dedicated to the cause, but the spell ends for the target if it's reduced to half its maximum Hit Points or fewer.
  • 15th As 14th, plus the target can attempt a Will save at the end of each of its turns to end the spell for itself.

The spell ends for all creatures if you or one of your allies uses a hostile action against a target, or when the cause is completed. The GM might determine this spell has alignment traits befitting the cause.

増強 (10th) The level for each category increases by 2.

entries.name: Crushing Despair
entries.description:
You inflict despair on creatures in the area. The effects for each creature are determined by its Will save.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success For 1 round, the creature can't use reactions and must attempt another save at the start of its turn; on a failure, it is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} for that turn as it sobs uncontrollably.

Failure As success, but the duration is 1 minute.

Critical Failure As failure, and the creature is automatically @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} for 1 minute.

増強 (7th) The area increases to a 60-foot cone.

entries.name: Crushing Ground
entries.description:
You tear open the ground then slam it shut. The target creature takes 2d6 bludgeoning damage with a Reflex save.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target takes half damage.

Failure The target takes full damage, is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed}, and takes a -10-foot circumstance penalty to Speed.

Critical Failure The target takes double damage and is flat-footed and @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized}. It can attempt to Escape against your spell DC. If it doesn't Escape, the target takes an additional 2d6 bludgeoning damage when the spell ends.

増強 (+1) Increase the initial damage and additional damage by 2d6.

entries.name: カップ・オヴ・ダスト
entries.description:
君は対象に、いかなる飲み物でも癒すことの出来ない渇きという呪いをかける。君はこの呪文を「解除」することが出来る。対象は頑健セーヴを試みなくてはならない。

クリティカル クリーチャーは影響を受けず、1時間、一時的完全耐性を得る

成功 クリーチャーは1ラウンド、@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{疲労状態}になる

失敗 クリーチャーは即座に、何日も飲んでいなかったかのように渇きに影響を受ける。対象は疲労状態となり、渇きを癒すまで治癒することの出来ない1d4点のダメージを毎時間、受ける。飲み物を口にしても、この呪文の持続時間の間、クリーチャーの渇きは癒されることはない。

ファンブル 失敗と同じだが、クリーチャーは毎時間、2d4点のダメージを受ける。これは、渇きの通常のルールの2倍である。

増強 (+3) 渇きは、より耐えがたいものになり、毎時間受けるダメージは1d4点、ファンブル時のダメージは2d4点ずつ増える。

entries.name: カース・オヴ・ロスト・タイム
entries.description:
君は対象の老化あるいは風化の過程を真似る。この効果は、対象が物体であるのか、人造であるか、生きているクリーチャーであるかによって異なる。アーティファクト、稀少素材で作られた物体や人造はGMの裁量によるが、完全耐性を持つ。

• 物体 もし、物体が誰かに所有されているのなら、その着用者は頑健セーヴを試みることが出来る。もし、着用者が失敗するか、物体が誰にも所有されていないのなら、その物体は即座に[[/r 4d6]]点のダメージを受け（通常通りに硬度を適用すること）、そのアイテムは無期限の持続時間で呪われる。呪いが終了するまで、そのアイテムは粗悪品となり、@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.bT3skovyLUtP22ME]{修理}することが出来ず、呪いはその物体のヒットポイントを回復するであろう全ての呪文を無効化しようとする。@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.OyFCwQuw8XRazsNr]{リムーヴ・カース}はこの呪文によって影響を受けているアイテムを対象に取ることが出来る。

• 人造 人造は[[/r 4d6]]点のダメージを受ける（基本頑健セーヴ）。失敗時に、1時間の間、人造は@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{もたつき1}、@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{衰弱1}になり、「修理」することは出来ず、この呪いは人造のヒットポイントを回復しようとするあらゆる呪文を無効化しようとする。ファンブル時、これらの効果は無期限の持続時間を持つ。

• 生きているクリーチャー 生きているクリーチャーは頑健セーヴを試みなくてはならない。加齢しないクリーチャーは完全耐性を持つ。

クリティカル 生きているクリーチャーは影響を受けない。

成功 生きているクリーチャーは少しだけ老化し、1ラウンド、@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{もたつき1}かつ@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{衰弱1}になる。

失敗 成功と同じだが、無期限の持続時間を持つ。

増強 (+1) ダメージは[[/r 1d6]]点上昇する。

entries.name: 死の呪い
entries.description:
君は悪意の視線を対象に集中させ、その心臓を恐怖ですくみ上らせる。対象は、頑健セーヴィング・スローを試みなくてはならない。この結果によらず、対象は更なる死の呪いの発動に対して1日、一時的完全耐性を得る。

クリティカル 対象は影響を受けない

成功 対象はステージ1の死の呪いに苦しめられ、呪いのステージは1より上に上がることはない

失敗 対象はステージ1の死の呪いに苦しめられる

ファンブル 対象はステージ2の死の呪いに苦しめられる

死の呪い（呪い）この呪いは、呪文の終了時に即座に終了する；

ステージ1: [[/r {4d6}[負のエネルギー]]]{4d6点の負のエネルギー・ダメージ}と@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{疲労} (1ラウンド);

ステージ2: [[/r {8d6}[負のエネルギー]]]{8d6点の負のエネルギー・ダメージ}と疲労(1ラウンド);

ステージ3: [[/r {12d6}[負のエネルギー]]]{12d6点の負のエネルギー・ダメージ}と疲労(1ラウンド);

ステージ4: 死亡

増強(+1) 成功時の負のエネルギーダメージと、呪いの最初の3段階のダメージを[[/r {1d6}[負のエネルギー]]]点、増やす

entries.name: Daemon Form
entries.description:
You infuse yourself with the corrupting death and pure malevolence of Abaddon, transforming into a Large daemon battle form. You must have enough space to expand into or the spell is lost. When you cast this spell you choose either ceustodaemon, leukodaemon, meladaemon, or piscodaemon. The battle form is Medium if you choose ceustodaemon. While in this form, you gain the daemon and fiend traits. You have hands in this battle form and can use manipulate actions. You can Dismiss the spell.

You gain the following statistics and abilities regardless of the form that you choose:

  • AC = 21 + your level. Ignore your armor check's penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 15 temporary Hit Points and weakness 5 to good.
  • A +2 status bonus to all saving throws against death effects.
  • Resistance 10 to poison.
  • Darkvision.
  • One or more attacks specific to the battle form you use. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +21, and you use the listed damage. These attacks are Strength based (for the purpose of the enfeebled condition, for example). If your unarmed attack modifier is higher, you can use it instead.
  • Athletics modifier of +23, unless your own modifier is higher.

You also gain specific abilities based on the type of Daemon you choose:

  • Ceustodaemon Speed 25 feet;
    • Melee 1 jaws (reach 10 feet), Damage 2d10+10 piercing plus 1d6 evil;
    • Melee 1 claw (agile, reach 10 feet), Damage 2d6 slashing plus 1d6 evil;
    • Any successful jaws or claw Strike deals an additional 1d6 damage, and you take the same amount of damage.

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.1n84AqLtsdT8I64W]{Spell Effect: Daemon Form (Ceustodaemon)}

  • Leukodaemon Speed 25 feet, fly 40 feet; +2 status bonus to saves against diseases;
    • Melee 1 jaws (reach 10 feet), Damage 2d10+10 piercing plus 1d6 evil;
    • Melee 1 claw (agile, reach 10 feet), Damage 2d6 slashing plus 1d6 evil;
    • Ranged 1 composite longbow (deadly d10, range increment 100 feet, volley), Damage 2d8 piercing plus 1d6 evil.

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.ScF0ECWnfXMHYLDL]{Spell Effect: Daemon Form (Leukodaemon)}

  • Meladaemon Speed 25 feet, fly 40 feet;
    • Melee1 jaws (reach 10 feet), Damage 2d10+10 piercing plus 1d6 evil;
    • Melee 1 claw (agile, reach 10 feet), Damage 1d8 slashing plus 1d6 evil and 1d6 negative, and you can spend an action after a hit to Grab the target.

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.zIRnnuj4lARq43DA]{Spell Effect: Daemon Form (Meladaemon)}

  • Piscodaemon Speed 25 feet, swim 40 feet;
    • Melee 1 claw, Damage 2d10+10 piercing plus 1d6 evil and 1d6 persistent bleed, and you can spend an action after a hit to Grab the target;
    • Melee 1 tentacle (agile), Damage 2d6 bludgeoning plus 1d6 evil and 1d6 poison.

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.0W87OkYi3qCwNGSj]{Spell Effect: Daemon Form (Piscodaemon)}

entries.name: Daemonic Pact
entries.description:
You call upon the powers of Abaddon to grant you the assistance of a daemon. You call upon a daemon whose level can be no more than double daemonic pact's spell level, two daemons whose levels are each at least 2 less than double the spell level, or three daemons whose levels are each at least 3 less than double the spell level.

Critical Success You conjure the daemon or daemons, and they require nothing in return for their service.

Success You conjure the daemon or daemons, who serve you willingly, but require a sacrifice in the form of spilled blood (either another creature's or your own).

Failure You don't conjure any daemons.

Critical Failure You don't conjure any daemons, and the self-sacrifice required to perform the ritual leaves you @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 1} (or @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 2} if the spell level is 5 or higher).

entries.name: Dance of Darkness
entries.description:
You dance, @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Bcxarzksqt9ezrs6]{Striding} up to half your Speed. At either the start or end of your Stride, you create an area of magical darkness in a 10-foot burst centered on your location. This area is filled with magical darkness that works the same way as that created by a @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.4GE2ZdODgIQtg51c]{Darkness} spell of the same level. When you create the darkness, attempt a Performance check to dance, with a standard DC for your level, to determine the duration of the darkness.

Critical Success: 1 minute

Success: 2 rounds

Failure: 1 round

entries.name: Darklight
entries.description:
Shadows pour forth from your eyes, creating a field of darkness that prevents light from emanating within the area. Light doesn't enter the area; any non-magical light sources, such as a torches or lanterns, don't emanate any light while inside the area, even if their light radius would extend beyond the darkness. The spell similarly suppresses magical light of the spell's level or lower.

Light can't pass through, so creatures in the area can't see outside. Even creatures with darkvision (but not greater darkvision) can barely see through the darkness; any creatures seen through the darkness are @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} to them. Creatures with greater darkvision can see through the darkness normally.

Creatures who move into the field or start their turn within the field have some of the life and light sucked out of them, taking 2d6 bludgeoning damage and 2d6 negative damage, with a basic Fortitude save.

When you cast this spell, choose up to four allies in the area to spare from darklight's effects. Until the spell ends, they're immune to damage from darklight spells and can see through darklight (but not other darkness) as though they had greater darkvision.

増強 (10th) The bludgeoning and negative damage both increase to 3d6.

entries.name: ダークネス
entries.description:
君は範囲を光が貫通出来ず、範囲内に拡散も出来ない暗闇の覆いを作り出す。光やは範囲に入ることがなく、たいまつやランタンといった魔法のものでない光源は、たとえもしその光の半径が暗闇を外に広がるはずであったとしても、範囲内で光を放つことはない。これはまた、君のダークネス呪文以下のレベルの魔法の光をも抑制する。光は通り抜けることが出来ないため、範囲内のクリーチャーは外側を見ることが出来ない。外側からは、純粋な暗闇の球体に見える。

増強 (4th) 暗視（優れた暗視ではない）を持っているクリーチャーですら、ただ暗闇の中を見通すことが出来るのみである。彼らは暗闇を通して見た対象を@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{視認困難}状態として扱う。

entries.name: ダークヴィジョン
entries.description:
君は自分自身に、暗闇に覆われた範囲での超自然的な視覚を与える。君は暗視を得る。

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.IXS15IQXYCZ8vsmX]{呪文効果: ダークヴィジョン}

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.inNfTmtWpsxeGBI9]{呪文効果: ダークヴィジョン (24時間)}

増強 (3rd) 呪文の距離は接触になり、対象は1体の同意するクリーチャーになる

増強 (5th) 呪文の距離は接触になり、対象は1体の同意するクリーチャーになる。この持続時間は、君が次に一日の準備をする時までである。

entries.name: デイズ・ウェイト
entries.description:
君は、1体のクリーチャーの時間を早め、丸1日分の痛みと苦痛を背負わせ、一時的に疲れさせ、弱くさせることが出来る。そのクリーチャーは頑健セーヴを試みなくてはならない。

クリティカル 対象は影響を受けない

成功 対象は 1ラウンド、@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{疲労状態} かつ @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{衰弱1}になる

失敗 対象は持続時間の間、疲労かつ衰弱1になる

ファンブル 対象は持続時間の間、疲労かつ@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{衰弱2}になる。疲労状態は、呪文の持続時間が終了しても終了しない（一晩の休息か、似たような手段で取り除くことは出来る）

増強 (6th) 君は10体までのクリーチャーを対象にすることが出来る

entries.name: Daydreamer's Curse
entries.description:
You impose a curse upon the target that renders it easily distracted and unable to focus its thoughts on tasks that demand insight or discernment. The target must attempt a Will save.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success For 10 minutes, the target must roll twice and use the worse result whenever attempting a Medicine, Nature, Perception, or Survival check. If the target critically succeeds at a Perception check or skill check to perform an action with the concentrate trait, the target gets a success instead.

Failure As success, but the effect is permanent.

Critical Failure As failure, except the target treats the outcomes of all checks with the concentrate trait as one degree of success worse than the result it rolled (a critical success becomes a success, a success becomes a failure, and a failure becomes a critical failure).

entries.name: デフネス
entries.description:
