対象は聴覚を失う；対象は頑健セーヴを試みなくてはならない。対象はそれから、1分間、一時的耐性を得る。

クリティカル 対象は影響を受けない

成功 対象は1ラウンド、@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.9PR9y0bi4JPKnHPR]{聴覚喪失}になる

失敗 対象は10分間、@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.9PR9y0bi4JPKnHPR]{聴覚喪失}になる

ファンブル 対象は永久に聴覚喪失になる

entries.name: デス・ネル
entries.description:
君は死の瞬間に、クリーチャーから命を奪う。対象は意志セーヴを試みなくてはならない。もしこの呪文が対象を殺すなら、君は10分間、10点の一時的ヒットポイントと、攻撃ロール及びダメージロールへの+1ステータス・ボーナスを得る。

クリティカル 対象は影響を受けない

成功 対象の@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.yZRUzMqrMmfLu0V1]{瀕死}値は1上昇する

失敗 対象は死亡する

entries.name: Death Ward
entries.description:
You shield a creature from the ravages of negative energy.

It receives a +4 status bonus to saves against death and negative effects, gains negative resistance 10, and suppresses the effects of the @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv]{Doomed} condition.

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.s6CwkSsMDGfUmotn]{Spell Effect: Death Ward}

entries.name: 二項対立の痛み
entries.description:
君は呪いの背後にある信仰の禁忌の間にある不可能な矛盾の一瞥を明らかにし、他者の矛盾をも認識する。

君と対象はそれぞれ、基本意志セーヴを伴う9d6点の精神ダメージを受け、対象はセーヴにファンブルしたなら@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{朦朧1}になる。君はセーヴィング・スローのロール結果よりも1段階良い結果を得る。

増強（+1） ダメージは3d6点、増える

entries.name: 騙し手の外套
entries.description:
君は自分自身を幻影の外套で包み、概ね似たような身長と体重の体型をした別のクリーチャーであるように見せかける。これは、3レベルの@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.i35dpZFI7jZcRoBo]{イリュージョリィ・ディスガイズ}の効果を持つ。

増強（6レベル） 君は、たとえ完全に違う体型だったとしても、同じサイズのあらゆるクリーチャーの見た目を取ることが出来る

entries.name: Deity's Strike
entries.description:
A manifested version of your deity's favored weapon appears in the air above and attacks the target, using your spell attack roll. On a hit, the weapon deals 7d12 force damage, or double damage on a critical hit.

After the attack, whether it succeeds or fails, divine energy bursts from the weapon in a shock wave. It emits in a 10-foot-wide, 30-foot-long line starting from the target and continuing in a direction you choose. Choose an alignment your deity has (chaotic, evil, good, or lawful). Your target and any other creatures within the area of the spell take [[/r 5d6]] damage of the chosen alignment type, with a basic Reflex save. The spell gains the trait of the alignment you choose. If your deity is true neutral, the weapon doesn't create a shock wave.

増強 (9th) The force damage increases by 1d12 and the alignment damage increases by 1d6. ([[/r 6d6]])

entries.name: 苦難遅延
entries.description:
治癒エネルギーを急増させることによって、君は対象を脅かしている苦難を押し戻し、ちょっとした治癒を与える。対象は3d8点のヒットポイントを回復する。

君は対象が持っていると君が知っている苦難をどれでも一つ、無効化する試みが出来る。それによって、苦難の効果を取り除くのではなく、1時間、その効果を抑制することが出来る。

対象はそれから、1日、苦難遅延に対して一時的な完全耐性を得る。君は特定の苦難の名称を識別する必要はなく、君が毒に気づいていないのなら、潜伏期間に摂取毒を遅延することは出来ない。

増強（+1） 対象は1d8点のヒットポイントを追加で回復し、君は追加の苦難を一つ、抑制する試みが出来る。

entries.name: Delay Consequence
entries.description:
Trigger A creature or object within range is hit by an attack.

You transpose the moment that the target would be injured to later in its timestream. Roll damage normally, but do not reduce Hit Points or apply any other effects of the attack until the spell's duration has elapsed. When the spell ends, the target is immediately affected by the attack, taking damage and being affected by any additional effects. You can Dismiss this spell.

entries.name: Deluge
entries.description:
You unleash a catastrophic downpour in the area that vanishes an instant later. All flying creatures in the area descend 50 feet or until blocked by the ground or firm surface. Each creature whose descent was blocked by the ground or firm surface takes bludgeoning damage equal to the number of feet it fell (the creature does not also take falling damage) and is knocked @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone}. Creatures on the ground, including flying creatures forced to the ground by the spell, must succeed at a Reflex save or be pushed 50 feet away from the center of the area.

Flimsy structures in the area collapse. The GM can determine other large-scale effects that result from the deluge.

増強 (+1) The area increases by 10 feet, and flying creatures fall an additional 10 feet.

entries.name: Demon Form
entries.description:
You corrupt yourself with the sin of the Abyss, transforming into a Medium demon battle form. When you cast this spell, choose babau, hezrou, nabasu, or vrock. If you choose hezrou, the battle form is Large and you must have enough space to expand into or the spell is lost. While in this form, you gain the demon and fiend traits. You have hands in this battle form and can use manipulate actions. You can Dismiss the spell.

You gain the following statistics and abilities regardless of the form that you choose:

  • AC = 20 + your level. Ignore your armor check's penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 30 temporary Hit Points, weakness 5 to cold iron, and weakness 5 to good.
  • Darkvision.
  • One or more attacks specific to the battle form you use. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +22, and you use the listed damage. These attacks are Strength based (for the purpose of the enfeebled condition, for example). If your attack modifier is higher for the given unarmed attack or weapon, you can use it instead.
  • Athletics modifier of +23, unless your own modifier is higher.

You also gain specific abilities based on the type of demon you choose:

  • Babau Speed 25 feet;
    • Melee 1 longspear (reach 10 feet), Damage 2d8+10 piercing plus 1d6 evil;
    • Melee 1 jaws, Damage 2d10 piercing plus 1d6 evil;
    • Melee 1 claw (agile), Damage 2d4 slashing plus 1d6 evil;
    • all Strikes deal 2d6 additional precision damage to @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} creatures.

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.X1kkbRrh4zJuDGjl]{Spell Effect: Demon Form (Babau)}

  • Hezrou Speed 30 feet, swim 30 feet;
    • Melee 1 jaws (reach 10 feet), Damage 2d12+10 piercing plus 1d6 evil, and you can spend an action after a hit to Grab the target;
    • Melee 1 claw (agile, reach 10 feet), Damage 2d8 slashing plus 1d6 evil.

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.sXe7cPazOJbX41GU]{Spell Effect: Demon Form (Hezrou)}

  • Nabasu Speed 25 feet, fly 40 feet;
    • Melee 1 jaws, Damage 2d10+10 piercing plus 1d6 evil;
    • Melee 1 claw (agile), Damage 2d6 slashing plus 1d6 evil.

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.hnfQyf05IIa7WPBB]{Spell Effect: Demon Form (Nabasu)}

  • Vrock Speed 25 feet, fly 35 feet; resistance 10 to electricity;
    • Melee 1 beak, Damage 2d8+10 piercing plus 1d6 evil;
    • Melee 1 claw (agile), Damage 2d6 slashing plus 1d6 evil;
    • Melee 1 talon (agile), Damage 2d6 slashing plus 1d6 evil.

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.20egTKICPMhibqgn]{Spell Effect: Demon Form (Vrock)}

entries.name: Detect Scrying
entries.description:
By tapping into trace divinatory auras, you detect the presence of scrying effects in the area. If detect scrying is higher level than a scrying effect, you gain a glimpse of the scrying creature and learn its approximate distance and direction.

増強 (6th) The duration is until the next time you make your daily preparations.

entries.name: Devil Form
entries.description:
You bind yourself to the power of Hell, transforming into a Medium devil battle form. When you cast this spell, choose barbazu, erinys, osyluth, or sarglagon. If you choose osyluth or sarglagon, the battle form is Large and you must have enough space to expand into or the spell is lost. While in this form you gain the devil and fiend traits. You have hands in this battle form and can use manipulate actions. You can Dismiss the spell.

You gain the following statistics and abilities regardless of the form that you choose:

  • AC = 22 + your level. Ignore your armor check's penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 5 temporary Hit Points, resistance 5 to physical damage (except silver), and weakness 5 to good.
  • Resistance 10 to fire.
  • Darkvision.
  • One or more attacks specific to the battle form you use. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +20, and you use the listed damage. These attacks are Strength based (for the purpose of the enfeebled condition, for example). If your attack modifier is higher for the given unarmed attack or weapon, you can use it instead.
  • Athletics modifier of +23, unless your own modifier is higher.

You also gain specific abilities based on the type of devil you choose:

  • Barbazu Speed 35 feet;
    • Melee 1 glaive (deadly d8, forceful, reach 10 feet), Damage 2d8+10 slashing plus 1d6 evil and 1d6 persistent bleed;
    • Melee 1 beard, Damage 3d8 piercing plus 1d6 evil;
    • Melee 1 claw (agile), Damage 3d6 slashing plus 1d6 evil.

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.0yy4t4UY1HqrEo70]{Spell Effect: Devil Form (Barbazu)}

  • Erinys Speed 25 feet, fly 40 feet;
    • Melee 1 longsword (versatile P), Damage 1d8+10 slashing plus 1d6 evil and 1d6 fire;
    • Ranged 1 composite longbow (deadly d10, range increment 100 feet, volley), Damage 1d8 piercing plus 1d6 evil and 1d6 fire.

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.BDMEqBsumguTrMXa]{Spell Effect: Devil Form (Erinys)}

  • Osyluth Speed 35 feet, fly 30 feet;
    • Melee 1 jaws, Damage 2d10+10 piercing plus 1d6 evil;
    • Melee 1 claw (agile, reach 10 feet), Damage 2d6 slashing plus 1d6 evil;
    • Melee 1 stinger (reach 15 feet), Damage 1d10 piercing plus 1d6 evil and 1d6 poison;
    • Ranged 1 bone shard (range increment 30 feet), Damage 2d6 piercing plus 1d6 evil.

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.HEbbxKtBzsLhFead]{Spell Effect: Devil Form (Osyluth)}

  • Sarglagon Speed 25 feet, fly 25 feet, swim 30 feet;
    • Melee 1 fangs, Damage 2d10+10 piercing plus 1d6 evil;
    • Melee 1 tentacle arm (agile), Damage 1d8 bludgeoning plus 1d6 evil and 1d6 poison.

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.fKeZDm8kpDFK5HWp]{Spell Effect: Devil Form (Sarglagon)}

entries.name: Devour Life
entries.description: You attempt to utterly consume the target's life force. The target takes 60 negative damage with a basic Fortitude save. If this damage reduces the target to 0 Hit Points, it dies immediately. You regain Hit Points equal to half the negative damage the target takes (after applying resistance and the like). Any excess healing is gained as temporary Hit Points, which you lose after 1 minute.

entries.name: 悪魔の布告
entries.description:
君は悪魔の布告を持ち出し、対象に特定を作業をし、それを満たせば報酬を与えることを申し出る。対象はその作業を行うことに関連した攻撃ロールと技能判定に+1ステータス・ボーナスを得る。もし君が布告した作業を行うことを相手が拒絶したなら、代わりに対象は全ての攻撃ロールと技能判定に-1ステータス・ペナルティを受ける。

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.1kelGCsoXyGRqMd9]{呪文効果: 悪魔の布告}

entries.name: Diamond Dust
entries.description:
You supercool the nearby air, forming a cloud of dancing ice crystals in an emanation around you. A creature other than you that enters the area or ends its turn within the area takes 2d6 cold damage. A creature can take this damage only once per turn. The crystals scatter and refract light; if a light effect enters diamond dust's area, any creatures that effect goes on to affect gain a +2 status bonus to AC and saves against it. While the spell persists, you can activate or deactivate this aura by using a single action, which has the concentrate trait. You can Dismiss this spell.

増強 (+2) The damage increases by 1d6.

entries.name: 薄明かり
entries.description:
トリガー 君が暗闇か影の呪文を発動する

君はトリガーとなった効果による暗闇を拡大し、周囲の明るさを一時的に点滅させることで、視界から逃れることが出来る。君は即座に@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.XMcnh4cSI32tljXa]{「隠れる」}ための〈隠密〉判定を試みることが出来る。君は、たとえ遮蔽を持っておらず、かつ、そのクリーチャーから視認困難状態となっていなかったとしても、クリーチャーから@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{隠れた状態}になることが出来る。君は遮蔽に移動するか、@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{視認困難}にならなければ、手番の終了時に隠れた状態でなくなる。

entries.name: Dimension Door
entries.description:
Opening a door that bypasses normal space, you instantly transport yourself and any items you're wearing and holding from your current space to a clear space within range you can see. If this would bring another creature with you-even if you're carrying it in an extradimensional container-the spell is lost.

増強 (5th) The range increases to 1 mile. You don't need to be able to see your destination, as long as you have been there in the past and know its relative location and distance from you. You are temporarily immune for 1 hour.

entries.name: Dimensional Anchor
entries.description:
You interfere with the target's ability to teleport and travel between dimensions. Dimensional anchor attempts to counteract any teleportation effect, or any effect that would move the target to a different plane. The duration is determined by the target's Will save.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The effect's duration is 1 minute.

Failure The effect's duration is 10 minutes.

Critical Failure The effect's duration is 1 hour.

entries.name: 次元を跳ぶ強襲
entries.description:
君は空間を飛び抜けて、攻撃のためのより良い位置取りをするために短い次元跳躍をする。クリーチャーの間合い内にある、距離内の任意のマス目にテレポートし、それから、間合い内に居る1体のクリーチャーに対して「打撃」をする。

メモ: 混成呪文は「呪文撃」をリチャージする

entries.name: Dimensional Lock
entries.description: You create a shimmering barrier that attempts to counteract teleportation effects and planar travel into or out of the area, including items that allow access to extradimensional spaces (such as a bag of holding). Dimensional lock tries to counteract any attempt to summon a creature into the area but doesn't stop the creature from departing when the summoning ends.

entries.name: 次元渡り
entries.description:
君は自分の視線が通る範囲で20フィートまで位置をテレポートすることが出来る。

増強（+1） 君がテレポートすることが出来る距離は5フィート増加する

entries.name: Dinosaur Form
entries.description:
You channel the primal forces of nature to transform into a Large animal battle form, specifically that of a powerful and terrifying dinosaur. You must have space to expand or the spell is lost. When you cast this spell, choose ankylosaurus, brontosaurus, deinonychus, stegosaurus, triceratops, or tyrannosaurus. You can decide the specific type of animal, but this has no effect on the form's Size or statistics. While in this form, you gain the animal and dinosaur traits. You can Dismiss the spell.

You gain the following statistics and abilities regardless of which battle form you choose:

  • AC = 18 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 15 temporary Hit Points.
  • Low-light vision and imprecise scent 30 feet.
  • One or more unarmed melee attacks specific to the battle form you choose, which are the only attacks you can use. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +16, and your damage bonus is +9. These attacks are Strength based (for the purpose of the @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled} condition, for example). If your unarmed attack modifier is higher, you can use it instead.
  • Athletics modifier of +18, unless your own is higher.

You also gain specific abilities based on the form you choose:

  • @Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.0Cyf07wboRp4CmcQ]{Ankylosaurus}
    • Speed 25 feet;
    • Melee 1 tail (backswing, reach 10 feet), Damage 2d6 bludgeoning;
    • Melee 1 foot, Damage 2d6 bludgeoning.
  • @Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.KkDRRDuycXwKPa6n]{Brontosaurus}
    • Speed 25 feet;
    • Melee 1 tail (reach 15 feet), Damage 2d6 bludgeoning;
    • Melee 1 foot, Damage 2d8 bludgeoning.
  • @Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.oJbcmpBSHwmx6FD4]{Deinonychus}
    • Speed 40 feet;
    • Melee 1 talon (agile), Damage 2d4 piercing plus [[/r {1}[persistent,bleed]]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Bleed Damage};
    • Melee 1 jaws, Damage 1d10 piercing.
  • @Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.T6XnxvsgvvOrpien]{Stegosaurus}
    • Speed 30 feet;
    • Melee 1 tail (reach 10 feet), Damage 2d8 piercing.
  • @Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.iOKhr2El8R6cz6YI]{Triceratops}
    • Speed 30 feet;
    • Melee 1 horn, Damage 2d8 piercing, plus [[/r {1d6}[persistent,bleed]]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Bleed Damage} on a critical hit;
    • Melee 1 foot, Damage 2d6 bludgeoning.
  • @Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.542Keo6txtq7uvqe]{Tyrannosaurus}
    • Speed 30 feet;
    • Melee 1 jaws (deadly, reach 10 feet), Damage 1d12 piercing;
    • Melee 1 tail (reach 10 feet), Damage 1d10 bludgeoning.

増強 (5th) Your battle form is Huge and your attacks have 15-foot reach, or 20-foot reach if they started with 15-foot reach. You instead gain 20 temporary HP, an attack modifier of +18, a damage bonus of +6, double the damage dice, and Athletics +21.

増強 (7th) Your battle form is Gargantuan and your attacks have 20-foot reach, or 25-foot reach if they started with 15-foot reach. You instead gain AC = 21 + your level, 25 temporary HP, an attack modifier of +25, a damage bonus of +15, double the damage dice, and Athletics +25.

entries.name: Disappearance
entries.description: You shroud a creature from others' senses. The target becomes @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{Undetected}, not just to sight but to all senses, allowing the target to count as @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Invisible} no matter what precise and imprecise senses an observer might have. It's still possible for a creature to find the target by Seeking, looking for disturbed dust, hearing gaps in the sound spectrum, or finding some other way to discover the presence of an otherwise-undetectable creature.

entries.name: Discern Lies
entries.description: Falsehoods ring in your ears like discordant notes. You gain a +4 status bonus to Perception checks when someone Lies.

entries.name: Discern Location
entries.description: You learn the name of the target's exact location (including the building, community, and country) and plane of existence. You can target a creature only if you've seen it in person, have one of its significant belongings, or have a piece of its body. To target an object, you must have touched it or have a fragment of it. Discern location automatically overcomes protections against detection and divination of lower level than this spell, even if they would normally have a chance to block it.

entries.name: 神秘開陳
entries.description:
君はより上手に秘密を暴くために守護霊の力に頼る。

君が「呪文の発動」をした際、対象は@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.1OagaWtBpVXExToo]{「知識を思い出す」}、 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{「捜す」}、 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.1xRFPTFtWtGJ9ELw]{「真意看破」}をすることが出来る。対象はこのロールに使う技能や知覚ロールに+1ステータス・ボーナスを得て、このボーナスは君が@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.3f5DMFu8fPiqHpRg]{「呪文の維持」}をする限り残る。W

対象は、1分間、神秘開陳に一時的完全耐性を得る。

増強 (5レベル) 君は1体ではなく、2体のクリーチャーを対象にすることが出来る。

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.hdOb5Iu6Zd3pHoGI]{呪文効果: 神秘開陳 (知識を思い出す)}

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.m1tQTBrolf7uZBW0]{呪文効果: 神秘開陳 (捜す)}

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.dEsaufFnfYihu5Ex]{呪文効果: 神秘開陳 (真意看破)}

entries.name: Disintegrate
entries.description:
You fire a green ray at your target. Make a spell attack. You deal 12d10 damage, and the target must attempt a basic Fortitude save. On a critical hit, treat the save result as one degree worse. A creature reduced to 0 HP is reduced to fine powder; its gear remains. An object you hit is destroyed (no save), regardless of Hardness, unless it's an artifact or similarly hard to destroy. A single casting can destroy no more than a 10-foot cube of matter. This automatically destroys any force construct, such as a wall of force.

増強 (+1) The damage increases by 2d10.

entries.name: Disjunction
entries.description: Crackling energy disjoins the target. You attempt to counteract it. If you succeed, it's deactivated for 1 week. On a critical success, it's destroyed. If it's an artifact or similar item, you automatically fail.

entries.name: ディスマントル
entries.description:
君は物体に触れる。その物体は即座に、自ら構成していた物体の破片に分解される。この呪文は、もし対象に構成していた物体の破片というものが存在しないなら失敗する（例えば、一つの石の塊から切り出された像など）。そして罠のような危険な物体にこの呪文を使うことによって、一般的に、そのトリガーを満たす。この物体は@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.6dNUvdb1dhToNDj3]{破損状態}を得て、構成していた物体の破片は通常の衣類や防具の下に@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{隠れた状態}にするのに十分な小ささになる。君はこの呪文を@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.AjLSHZSWQ90exdLo]{「解除」}することが出来る。この呪文の終了時、物体は自ら元々の形に組みあがり、もし君の手が空いているなら君の手の中に、あるはそうでなければ君の真正面の地面に現れる。ひとたび組みあがったなら、物体は破損状態を失い、君が@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]{「呪文の発動」}をした時点のヒット・ポイントに戻る。

増強 (4th) 呪文は10分間、持続する

増強 (6th) 呪文は君の次の一日の準備まで持続する

entries.name: ディスペル・マジック
entries.description: 君は、ある呪文か固化の背後にある魔法を解き明かす。対象に対して無効化判定を一回、試みる。もし君が一つの呪文効果に対して成功したなら、君はそれを無効化する。もし君がある魔法のアイテムに対して成功したなら、そのアイテムは10分間、その種別の通常のアイテムとなる。これによって魔法のものでないそのアイテムの特徴が変更されることはない。もしその対象がアーティファクトあるいは似たようなアイテムであるなら、君は自動的に失敗する。

entries.name: ディストラクティング・チャッター
entries.description:
君は対象に気が散るような幻聴を浴びせ、重なり合う話し声、ささやき声、叫び声、つぶやきなどの騒々しい不協和音でターゲットを取り囲む。対象は@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{立ちすくみ}となり、純粋に聴覚による知覚判定に-2のステータス・ペナルティを受け、聴覚による能力や呪文の言語要素を使用するのに、DC 5の平目判定に成功しなければならない。同様に、聴覚的な効果で対象に影響を与えようとするクリーチャーは、DC 5の平目判定に成功しなければその試みは失敗する。持続時間は対象の意志セーヴによって異なる。/p>

クリティカル クリーチャーは影響を受けない

成功 持続時間は1ラウンドである

失敗 持続時間は3ラウンドである

ファンブル 持続時間は1分である

増強 (7th) 君は5体までのクリーチャーを対象にすることが出来る

entries.name: Div Pact
entries.description:
You call upon the powers of Abaddon to grant you the assistance of a div. You call upon a div whose level can be no more than double div pact's spell level, two divs whose levels are each at least 2 less than double the spell level, or three divs whose levels are each at least 3 less than double the spell level.

Critical Success You conjure the div or divs, and they require nothing in return for their service.

Success You conjure the div or divs. They are not eager to pursue the task, so they require a favor in return.

Failure you don't conjure any divs.

Critical Failure You don't conjure any divs, and they send a spiritual backlash that denies your use of any of your innate divine spells for 24 hours. If you are under the effect of any of your innate divine spells, the durations end.

entries.name: Divine Armageddon
entries.description:
You call forth a divine cataclysm from your deity, destroying living and undead creatures in the area alike. Creatures in the area take 10d6 Negative Damage and [[/r 10d6]] alignment damage (good, evil, lawful, or chaotic), chosen from among the alignments your deity has. If your deity is true neutral, increase the negative damage by [[/r {4d6}[negative]]]{4d6 Negative Damage} instead of dealing alignment damage. A creature harmed by positive damage, such as one with negative healing, takes positive damage instead of negative damage from this spell.

You can't cast this spell if you don't have a deity. This spell gains the trait corresponding to the alignment damage dealt.

増強 (+1) The damage increases by 1d6 negative damage, [[/r 1d6]] alignment damage, and 1d6 additional negative and positive damage for a true neutral deity.

entries.name: Divine Aura
entries.description:
Divine power wards the targets, granting each a +1 status bonus to AC and saves while in the area.

Choose an alignment your deity has (chaotic, evil, good, or lawful). You can't cast this spell if you don't have a deity or your deity is true neutral. This spell gains the trait of the alignment you chose. The bonuses granted by the spell increase to +2 against attacks by-and effects created by-creatures with an alignment opposite to the spell (lawful if you chose chaotic, evil if you chose good). These bonuses increase to +4 against effects created by such creatures that attempt to impose the @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.9qGBRpbX9NEwtAAr]{Controlled} condition on a target of your divine aura, as well as against attacks made by creatures summoned by anything opposite in alignment to your divine aura.

When a creature of opposite alignment hits a target with a melee attack, the creature must succeed at a Will save or be @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Blinded} for 1 minute. It's then temporarily immune for 1 minute.

The first time you Sustain the Spell each round, the divine aura's radius grows 10 feet.

entries.name: Divine Decree
entries.description:
You utter a potent litany from your faith, a mandate that harms those who oppose your ideals. Choose an alignment your deity has (chaotic, evil, good, or lawful). You can't cast this spell if you don't have a deity or your deity is true neutral. This spell gains the trait of the alignment you chose. You deal 7d10 damage to creatures in the area; each creature must attempt a Fortitude save. Creatures with an alignment that matches the one you chose are unaffected by the spell. Those that neither match nor oppose it treat the result of their saving throw as one degree better and don't suffer effects other than damage.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature takes half damage.

Failure The creature takes full damage and is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 2} for 1 minute.

Critical Failure The creature takes double damage and is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 2} for 1 minute. On your home plane, a creature that critically fails is banished with the effect of a failed @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.bay4AfSu2iIozNNW]{Banishment} save. A 10th-level creature or lower must attempt a Will save. On a failure, it's @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{Paralyzed} for 1 minute; on a critical failure, it dies.

entries.name: Divine Inspiration
entries.description: You infuse a target with spiritual energy, refreshing its magic. If it prepares spells, it recovers one 6th-level or lower spell it previously cast today and can cast that spell again. If it spontaneously casts spells, it recovers one of its 6th-level or lower spell slots. If it has a focus pool, it regains its Focus Points, as if it had Refocused.

entries.name: Divine Plagues
entries.description:
Your deity sends wracking plagues. The target must attempt a Fortitude save. When you Cast the Spell, decide whether the disease inflicts the Clumsy, Enfeebled, or Stupefied condition.

Divine Plague (disease) Level 1;

Stage 1 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1}, @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 1}, or @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 1} (1 round);

Stage 2 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1}, and Clumsy 1, Enfeebled 1, or Stupefied 1 (1 round);

Stage 3 Clumsy 1, Enfeebled 1, or Stupefied 1 and the target can't recover from the condition until they are cured (1 day)

Success The target is unaffected.

Failure The target is afflicted with divine plague at stage 1.

Critical Failure The target is afflicted with divine plague at stage 2.

増強 (5th) The divine plague disease gains the virulent trait. The condition value for the Clumsy, Enfeebled, or Stupefied condition is 2 instead of 1.

entries.name: Divine Vessel
entries.description:
You accept otherworldly energies into your body; while you are still recognizably yourself, you gain the features of one of your deity's servitors. Choose an alignment your deity has (chaotic, evil, good, or lawful). You can't cast this spell if you don't have a deity or your deity is true neutral. This spell gains the trait of the alignment you chose.

If you were Medium or smaller, you become Large, as the effects of @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.wzctak6BxOW8xvFV]{Enlarge}. You must have space to expand into, or the spell is lost. You also gain the following benefits.

  • 40 temporary Hit Points.
  • A fly Speed equal to your Speed.
  • Weakness 10 to the alignment opposite the one you chose.
  • A +1 status bonus to saves against spells.
  • Darkvision.
  • Your unarmed attacks and weapons deal 1 additional damage of the chosen alignment type.
  • One or more unarmed melee attacks. If you chose good or lawful, your fist attacks deal 2d8 damage. If you chose chaotic, you gain a bite unarmed attack that deals 2d10 piercing damage. If you chose evil, you gain a claws unarmed attack that deals 2d8 slashing damage and has the agile and finesse traits.

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.GDzn5DToE62ZOTrP]{Spell Effect: Divine Vessel (Chaotic)}

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.evK8JR3j2iWGWaug]{Spell Effect: Divine Vessel (Evil)}

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.KMF2t3qqzyFP0rxL]{Spell Effect: Divine Vessel (Good)}

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.tBgwWblDp1xdxN4D]{Spell Effect: Divine Vessel (Lawful)}

増強 (9th) The temporary Hit Points increase to 60, the weakness increases to 15, and the duration increases to 10 minutes.

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.dIftJU6Ki2QSLCOD]{Spell Effect: Divine Vessel 9th level (Chaotic)}

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.AnawxScxqUiRuGTm]{Spell Effect: Divine Vessel 9th level (Evil)}

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.OxJEUhim6xzsHIyi]{Spell Effect: Divine Vessel 9th level (Good)}

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.wKdIf5x7zztiFHpL]{Spell Effect: Divine Vessel 9th level (Lawful)}

entries.name: Divine Wrath
entries.description:
You can channel the fury of your deity against foes of opposed alignment. Choose an alignment your deity has (chaotic, evil, good, or lawful). You can't cast this spell if you don't have a deity or your deity is true neutral. This spell gains the trait of the alignment you chose. You deal 4d10 damage of the alignment you chose; each creature in the area must attempt a Fortitude save. Creatures that match the alignment you chose are unaffected. Those that neither match nor oppose it treat the result of their saving throw as one degree better.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature takes half damage.

Failure The creature takes full damage and is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 1}.

Critical Failure The creature takes full damage and is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 2}; while it is sickened, it is also @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1}.

増強 (+1) The damage increases by 1d10.

entries.name: 占術の先見
entries.description: 君は対象の未来を覗き込む。ｄ20をロールすること；対象が公開のセーヴィング・スローか技能判定を試みる際、ロールせずに君がロールした数字を使い、呪文を終了させることが出来る。代わりに、君は持続時間の間、対象の非公開判定の一つのロール結果を明らかにし、呪文を終了させることが出来る。再び発動すると、君がそれまでに発動していた起動中の占術の先見およびその対象に起動している占術の先見は全て終了する。

entries.name: Divinity Leech
entries.description:
You disrupt the connection between a divine caster or deific servitor and their deity, blocking their use of divine power. If the target fails its save, it is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{Fatigued}.

For the spell's duration, whenever the target casts a divine spell, you regain [[/r {6d6}[healing]]]{6d6 Hit Points} and the target must attempt another Will save with the following effects.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success Each target of the divine spell has an outcome one degree of success better than the result it rolled.

Failure The divine spell is lost and target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 1}.

Critical Failure As failure, but the target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned} for 1 round.

entries.name: Dominate
entries.description:
You take command of the target, forcing it to obey your orders. If you issue an obviously self-destructive order, the target doesn't act until you issue a new order. The effect depends on its Will save.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 1} as it fights off your commands.

Failure You control the target. It gains the @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.9qGBRpbX9NEwtAAr]{Controlled} condition, but it can attempt a Will save at the end of each of its turns. On a success, the spell ends.

Critical Failure As a failure, but the target receives a new save only if you give it a new order that is against its nature, such as killing its allies.

増強 (10th) The duration is unlimited.

entries.name: Door to Beyond
entries.description:
Striking at thin air, you create hairline cracks in an unoccupied adjacent space that lead somewhere outside reality. Air rushes through the cracks, drawing Large or smaller creatures and objects of light Bulk or less toward the center. Large or smaller creatures in the area must attempt a Fortitude save at the start of their turn; creatures that move into the area must attempt the save on entering.

The cracks of the door to beyond are too thin for anything to fully slip through, but decompressive effects deal 4d6 slashing damage to any creature or object that ends its turn in the door's space. You are unaffected by your own door to beyond. You can Dismiss the spell.

Success The creature is unaffected.

Failure The creature is pulled 10 feet toward the door.

Critical Failure The creature is pulled 20 feet toward the door.

増強 (+1) The damage increases by 1d6.

entries.name: Draconic Barrage
entries.description:
You shape energy into one incorporeal tiny dragon (or serpentine creature) that flits around you. The specific dragon is random; roll [[/r 1d6 #dragon]] on the table below for each dragon evoked to determine which type of dragon you create. While the spell persists, you can command one of your dragons to spit a missile of energy at a creature within 60 feet by using a single action, which has the concentrate trait. This is a ranged Strike that uses your spell attack bonus and deals 1d6 damage plus your spellcasting ability modifier, with the damage type depending on the dragon. A dragon's breath Strike uses and contributes to your multiple attack penalty. Once a dragon has used its breath Strike, it winks out of existence; when you have no dragons remaining, the spell ends.

Draconic Barrage

d6 Dragon Breath Strike type
1 Copper or Black Acid
2 Silver or White Cold
3 Bronze or Blue Electricity
4 Brass, Gold, or Red Fire
5 Green Poison
6 Your choice of dragon As the dragon

増強 (+1) You shape 1 additional dragon, and the Strike damage increases by 1d6.

entries.name: ドラゴンのブレス
entries.description:
君は口からエネルギーを吐き出し、[[/r 5d6]]のダメージを与える。範囲、ダメージ種別、セーヴは君の血脈のドラゴンの種別による。

ドラゴンのブレス

ドラゴンの種別 範囲とダメージ種別 セーヴィング・スロー
ブラック、ブライン、カッパー 60フィート直線の強酸 反応
ブルーあるいはブロンズ 60フィート直線の電撃 反応
ブラス 60フィート直線の火炎 反応
クラウド 30フィート円錐の電撃 反応
クリスタルあるいはフォレスト 30フィート円錐の刺突 反応
グリーン 30フィート円錐の毒 頑健
ゴールド、マグマ、レッド 30フィート円錐の火炎 Reflex
シー 30フィート以内の10フィート爆発の殴打 反応
シルヴァーあるいはホワイト 30フィート円錐の氷雪 反応
Sky 30フィート以内の10フィート爆発の電撃 Reflex
Sovereign 30-foot cone of mental Will
Umbral 30-foot cone of negative Reflex
Underworld 10-foot burst within 30 feet of fire Reflex

増強 (+1) ダメージは2d6上昇する

entries.description:
君は口からエネルギーを吐き出し、5d6点の負のエネルギーダメージを30フィート円錐にいるクリーチャーに与える。影響を受けるクリーチャーは基本反応セーヴを行うことが出来る。

増強 (+1) ダメージは2d6上昇する

entries.name: ドラゴンのブレス (アンダーワールド)
entries.description:
君は口からエネルギーを吐き出し、5d6点の火炎ダメージを30フィート以内の10フィート爆発にいるクリーチャーに与える。影響を受けるクリーチャーは基本反応セーヴを行うことが出来る。

増強 (+1) ダメージは2d6上昇する

entries.name: ドラゴンの爪
entries.description:
獰猛な爪が君の指から伸びる。これらは1d4の斬撃ダメージと君の血脈の竜によって決まるダメージ種別の（ドラゴンのブレス参照）追加の1d6ダメージを与える巧技の素手打撃である。

ドラゴンの爪

ドラゴンの種別 ダメージ種別
カッパーあるいはブラック @Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.KNWXmArZ82el4VUv]{強酸}
ブルー、ブロンズ、クラウド @Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.MKOg6feUPgCHyBja]{電撃}
ブラス、ゴールド、レッド @Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.QrULQZsSRGSa6qOt]{火炎}
グリーン @Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.ccrcaKIRxiCnnRPT]{毒}
シルヴァーあるいはホワイト @Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.pUYL0ILL3r8VBFm0]{氷雪}

血脈魔法による君の鱗はかすかなエネルギーで輝き、同じダメージ種別への抵抗5を君に与える。

増強 (5th) 追加ダメージは2d6に上昇し、抵抗は10に増加する

増強 (9th) 追加ダメージは3d6に上昇し、抵抗は15に増加する

entries.name: Dragon Form
entries.description:
Calling upon powerful transformative magic, you gain a Large dragon battle form. You must have space to expand or the spell is lost. When you cast this spell, choose one type of chromatic or metallic dragon. While in this form, you gain the dragon trait. You have hands in this battle form and can take manipulate actions. You can Dismiss the spell.

You gain the following statistics and abilities regardless of which battle form you choose:

  • AC = 18 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 10 temporary Hit Points.
  • Speed 40 feet, fly Speed 100 feet.
  • Resistance 10 against the damage type of your breath weapon (see below).
  • Darkvision and imprecise scent 60 feet.
  • One or more unarmed melee attacks specific to the battle form you choose, which are the only attacks you can use. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +22, and your damage bonus is +6. These attacks are Strength based (for the purpose of the @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled} condition, for example). If your unarmed attack modifier is higher, you can use it instead. See below for more on these attacks.
  • Athletics modifier of +23, unless your own modifier is higher.
  • Breath Weapon 2 (arcane, evocation) The shape, damage, and damage type of your breath weapon depend on your specific dragon form (see below). A creature in the area attempts a basic save against your spell DC. This is a Reflex save unless stated otherwise in the special ability description for your specific dragon form. Once activated, your breath weapon can't be used again for [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 rounds}. Your breath weapon has the trait corresponding to the type of damage it deals.

You also gain specific abilities based on the type of dragon:

  • @Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.rHXOZAFBdRXIlxt5]{Black}
    • swim Speed 60 feet;
    • Melee 1 jaws, Damage 2d12 piercing plus 2d6 acid;
    • Melee 1 claw (agile), Damage 3d10 slashing;
    • Melee 1 tail (reach 10 feet), Damage 3d10 bludgeoning;
    • Melee 1 horns (reach 10 feet), Damage 3d8 piercing;
    • breath weapon 60-foot line, [[/r {11d6}[acid]]]{11d6 acid}.
  • @Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.ETgzIIv3M2zvclAR]{Blue}
    • burrow Speed 20 feet;
    • Melee 1 jaws, Damage 2d10 piercing plus 1d12 electricity;
    • Melee 1 claw (agile), Damage 3d10 slashing;
    • Melee 1 tail (reach 10 feet), Damage 3d10 bludgeoning;
    • Melee 1 horns (reach 10 feet), Damage 3d8 piercing;
    • breath weapon 80-foot line, [[/r {6d12}[electricity]]]{6d12 electricity}.
  • @Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.OeCn76SB92GPOZwr]{Brass}
    • burrow Speed 20 feet;
    • Melee 1 jaws, Damage 3d8 piercing plus 2d4 fire;
    • Melee 1 claw (agile), 3d10 slashing;
    • Melee 1 tail (reach 10 feet), Damage 3d10 bludgeoning;
    • Melee 1 spikes (reach 10 feet), Damage 3d8 piercing;
    • breath weapon 60-foot line, [[/r {15d4}[fire]]]{15d4 fire}.
  • @Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.jtW3VfI5Kktuy3GH]{Bronze}
    • swim Speed 40 feet;
    • Melee 1 jaws, Damage 2d10 piercing plus 1d12 electricity;
    • Melee 1 claw (agile), Damage 3d10 slashing;
    • Melee 1 tail (reach 10 feet), Damage 3d10 bludgeoning;
    • Melee 1 wing (reach 10 feet), Damage 3d8 slashing;
    • breath weapon 80-foot line, [[/r {6d12}[electricity]]]{6d12 electricity}.
  • @Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.DrNpuMj14wVj4bWF]{Copper}
    • climb Speed 25 feet on stone only;
    • Melee 1 jaws, Damage 2d12 piercing plus 2d6 acid;
    • Melee 1 claw (agile), Damage 3d10 slashing;
    • Melee 1 tail (reach 10 feet), Damage 3d10 bludgeoning;
    • Melee 1 wing (reach 10 feet), Damage 3d8 bludgeoning;
    • breath weapon 60-foot line, [[/r {10d6}[acid]]]{10d6 acid}.
  • @Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.8aNZhlkzRTRKlKag]{Gold}
    • swim Speed 40 feet;
    • Melee 1 jaws, Damage 2d12 piercing plus 2d6 fire;
    • Melee 1 claw (agile), Damage 4d6 slashing;
    • Melee 1 tail (reach 10 feet), Damage 3d10 bludgeoning;
    • Melee 1 horns (reach 10 feet), Damage 3d8 piercing;
    • breath weapon 30-foot cone, [[/r {6d10}[fire]]]{6d10 fire}.
  • @Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.nWEx5kpkE8YlBZvy]{Green}
    • swim Speed 40 feet, ignores difficult terrain from non-magical foliage;
    • Melee 1 jaws, Damage 2d12 piercing plus 2d6 poison;
    • Melee 1 claw (agile), Damage 3d10 slashing;
    • Melee 1 tail (reach 10 feet), Damage 3d10 bludgeoning;
    • Melee 1 horns (reach 10 feet), Damage 3d8 piercing;
    • breath weapon 30-foot cone, [[/r {10d6}[poison]]]{10d6 poison} (Fortitude save instead of Reflex).
  • @Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.V4a9pZHNUlddAwTA]{Red}
    • ignore @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} from smoke;
    • Melee 1 jaws, Damage 2d12 piercing plus 2d6 fire;
    • Melee 1 claw ( agile), Damage 4d6 slashing;
    • Melee 1 tail (reach 10 feet), Damage 3d10 bludgeoning;
    • Melee 1 wing (reach 10 feet), Damage 3d8 bludgeoning;
    • breath weapon 30-foot cone, [[/r {10d6}[fire]]]{10d6 fire}.
  • @Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.TUyEeLyqdJL6PwbH]{Silver}
    • cloud walk;
    • Melee 1 jaws, Damage 2d12 piercing plus 2d6 cold;
    • Melee 1 claw (agile), Damage 3d10 slashing;
    • Melee 1 tail (reach 10), Damage 3d10 bludgeoning;
    • breath weapon 30-foot cone, [[/r {8d8}[cold]]]{8d8 cold}.
  • @Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.H6ndYYYlADWwqVQb]{White}
    • climb Speed 25 feet on ice only;
    • Melee 1 jaws, Damage 3d6 piercing plus 2d6 cold;
    • Melee 1 claw (agile), Damage 3d10 slashing;
    • Melee 1 tail (reach 10 feet), Damage 3d10 bludgeoning;
    • breath weapon 30-foot cone, [[/r {10d6}[cold]]]{10d6 cold}.

増強 (8th) Your battle form is Huge, you gain a +20-foot status bonus to your fly Speed, and your attacks have 10-foot reach (or 15-foot reach if they previously had 10-foot reach). You instead gain AC = 21 + your level, 15 temporary HP, an attack modifier of +28, a damage bonus of +12, Athletics +28, and a [[/r +14]] status bonus to breath weapon damage.

entries.name: ドラゴンの翼
entries.description:
革めいた翼が君の背中から広がり、君の速度に等しいか60フィートかどちらか早いほうの飛行速度を与える。この呪文の持続時間が終わる際に君がまだ飛行しているのなら、@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.TTwOKGqmZeKSyNMH]{フェザー・フォール}のように地面に漂うように着陸する。

君は翼が持続する間、@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.K8vvrOgW4bGakXxm]{ドラゴンの爪}の効果を得るために集中点のコストを1上昇させることが出来る。

増強 (8th) 持続時間は10分に上昇する

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.V7jAnItnVqtfCAKt]{呪文効果: ドラゴンの翼 (60フィート)}

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.jy4edd6pvJvJgOSP]{呪文効果: ドラゴンの翼 (自分の速度)}

entries.name: 生命吸収
entries.description:
君は拳を閉じて別のクリーチャーから生命エネルギーを引き出し、自分のものにする。これは3d4の負のエネルギーのダメージを与える；対象は基本頑健セーヴを試みなくてはならない。

君は対象が受けるダメージに等しい一時的ヒット・ポイントを得る。このダメージはセーヴの解決と、適用可能であれば君の血脈魔法の適用後のものである。もし、対象のヒット・ポイントが君の与えるダメージ未満であるなら、代わりに君は残っているヒット・ポイントに等しい一時的ヒット・ポイントを得る。この一時的ヒット・ポイントは1分間持続する。

増強 (+1) ダメージは1d4上昇する

entries.name: ドロウ・アイア
entries.description:
君はクリーチャーに精神的苦痛を与え、自分に反撃するように仕向ける。そのクリーチャーに1d10点の精神ダメージを与え、君以外のクリーチャーに対する攻撃ロールに-1のステータス・ペナルティを与える。クリーチャーは意志セーヴィング・スローを試みなければならない。

クリティカル 対象は影響を受けない

成功 対象は半分のダメージとペナルティを受け、この呪文は対象の次の手番の終了時に終了する。@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.PDoTV4EhJp63FEaG]{呪文効果: ドロウ・アイア (成功)}

失敗 対象は完全なダメージとペナルティを受ける。 @Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.BsGZdgiEElNlgZVv]{呪文効果: ドロウ・アイア (失敗)}

ファンブル 対象は2倍のダメージを受け、ペナルティは-2になる。@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.4VOZP2ArmS12nvz8]{呪文効果: ドロウ・アイア (ファンブル)}

増強 (+1) ダメージは1d10点上昇する

entries.name: Draw the Lightning
entries.description:
Calling out to the skies, you summon a bolt of lightning to strike through a foe above you and down into your weapon or your body, charging it with electrical power. You must hold your weapon or an empty hand aloft as part of this spell's somatic component. When you do, a bolt of lightning descends from a storm cloud in the air above your and through the target, dealing 3d12 electricity damage with a basic Reflex save. For the rest of the spell's duration, your first Strike each round with the weapon you held aloft (or with your unarmed attacks if you held an empty hand aloft) deals an additional 1d12 electricity damage.

The spell creates its own storm cloud if necessary, so you can cast draw the lightning anywhere, even underground. If draw the lightning is cast outside under a cloudy or stormy sky, increase the bolt's damage by [[/r {2d12}[electricity]]].

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.fCIT9YgGUwIc3Z9G]{Spell Effect: Draw the Lightning}

増強 (8th) The damage dealt to the initial target increases by 4d12, and the additional damage dealt on the first Strike each turn increases by 1d12.

entries.name: Dread Ambience
entries.description:
In some places, it always feels like something is observing you, as if the very land doesn't want you there. Hostile creatures skitter about in the underbrush. Tendrils of mist try to lead you stray. Even the scent of the place is unwelcoming. Sometimes, this eerie atmosphere is a natural occurrence. Other times, it's the result of the dread ambience ritual.

To create this unwelcoming, intimidating aura, you must prepare the area with salts and herbs, traveling the entire edge of the area throughout the casting.

After you complete your ritual, anyone who enters the area receives a status penalty to saving throws against fear effects within the dread ambience.

Critical Success The sense of dread is particularly powerful. Every creature in an area takes a -2 status penalty to saving throws against fear effects. @Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.FT5Tt2DKBRutDqbV]{Spell Effect: Dread Ambience (Critical Success)}

Success The dread ambience succeeds. Every creature in the area takes a -1 status penalty to saving throws against fear effects. @Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.1gTnFmfLUQnCo3TK]{Spell Effect: Dread Ambience (Success)}

Failure The dread ambience fails.

Critical Failure The dread ambience fails, and the casters take a -1 status penalty to all Will saves for the next week. @Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.4Lt69zSeYElEfDrZ]{Spell Effect: Dread Ambience (Critical Failure)}

増強 (7th) The dread ambience costs 750 gp and remains in place for 10 years.

増強 (9th) The dread ambience costs 5,000 gp and remains in place for an unlimited duration.

entries.name: 恐怖のオーラ
entries.description: 君は恐るべきオーラを発する。範囲内の敵は@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{恐れ1}になり、この状態値を減らすことが出来ない。

entries.name: 恐るべき秘密
entries.description:
君は対象のクリーチャーの基本的な本質について、強力な秘密と思しきことを口に出す。君が、対象の1体以上のが@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.1OagaWtBpVXExToo]{「知識を思い出す」} や以前のその対象との経験に基づいて、持っていると思っている特定の抵抗や弱点を選ぶ。例えば、火炎への抵抗や銀への弱点といったように。もし、その情報が、ある対象について間違っているなら、その対象に何の効果もない。影響されている対象は意志セーヴィング・スローを試みなくてはならない。

クリティカル クリーチャーは影響されない

成功 クリーチャーは君が選んだ弱点の種別について1点のダメージを受ける（このようにしてクリーチャーの弱点のトリガーを突く）か、抵抗を選んだのなら、君の次の手番の終了時まで抵抗を失う

失敗 成功と同じだが、クリーチャーは恐るべき秘密の暴露によって@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{恐れ1}になる

ファンブル 失敗と同じだが、クリーチャーは@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{恐れ3}になる

entries.name: Dream Council
entries.description: When you Cast this Spell, any targets-including you-can choose to immediately fall asleep. The spell ends for any creatures that don't choose to fall asleep. Sleepers join a shared dream, where they can communicate with one another as though they were in the same room. Individual targets leave this shared dream upon awakening, and if all the targets awaken, the spell ends.

entries.name: ドリーム・メッセージ
entries.description:
君は対象の夢にメッセージを送る。メッセージは一方通行で、1分間までの発話形式である（おおむね150ワード）。もし対象が眠っているなら、対象はメッセージを即座に受け取る。もしそうでないなら、対象は次に眠ったときにメッセージを受け取る。メッセージを受け取ったらすぐに呪文は終了し、君はメッセージが送信されたことを知る。

増強 (4th) 君は名前を知っており、個人的に会ったことがあるクリーチャーを10体まで対象にすることが出来る。君は彼ら全員に同じメッセージを送らなくてはならない。呪文はそれぞれのクリーチャーに対して個別に終了する。

entries.name: Dreaming Potential
entries.description: You draw the target into a lucid dream where it can explore the endless possibilities of its own potential within the ever-changing backdrop of its dreamscape. If it sleeps the full 8 hours uninterrupted, when it wakes, it counts as having spent a day of downtime retraining, though it can't use dreaming potential for any retraining that would require either an instructor or specialized knowledge it can't access within the dream.

entries.name: Drop Dead
entries.description:
Trigger A creature within range is hit by an attack from an enemy.

The target appears to fall down dead, though it actually turns @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Invisible}. Its illusory corpse remains where it fell, complete with a believable fatal wound. This illusion looks and feels like a dead body. If the target's death seems absurd-for instance, a barbarian at full health appears to be slain by 2 damage-the GM can grant the attacker an immediate Perception check to disbelieve the illusion. If the target uses hostile actions, the spell ends. This ends the entire spell, so the illusory corpse disappears too.

増強 (7th) The spell doesn't end if the target uses hostile actions.

entries.name: Dull Ambition
entries.description:
You curse the target to fail in all avenues of its life that require drive and ambition, as it inadvertently undermines its own goals at every turn. The effect is based on the target's Will save.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success For 1 hour, the target rolls twice and uses the lower result on initiative rolls.

Failure For 1 day, the target rolls twice and uses the lower result on initiative rolls and any check to determine the success of a downtime activity.

Critical Failure As failure, but the duration is unlimited.

entries.name: Duplicate Foe
entries.description:
You try to create a temporary duplicate of an enemy to fight on your behalf. The target can attempt a Fortitude save to disrupt the spell. The duplicate appears in an unoccupied space adjacent to the target and has the target's attack modifier, AC, saving throw modifiers, Perception, and skill modifiers, but it has only 70 Hit Points and lacks the target's special abilities, including immunities, resistances, and weaknesses. It has no magic items except weapon potency runes. The duplicate gains the minion trait, and it can only Stride and Strike. Its Strikes deal the target's normal damage but don't apply added effects, since it doesn't have special abilities. The spell automatically ends if the duplicate's Hit Points drop to 0. The duplicate attacks your enemies to the best of its abilities. You can also try to give it additional instructions; when you Sustain the Spell, you can also Command a Minion as part of your action, but the GM determines whether the duplicate follows your command. The duplicate is unstable, so each turn after it takes its actions, it loses 4d6 Hit Points. It's not a living creature, and it can never regain its lost Hit Points in any way.

Critical Success You fail to create a duplicate.

Success The duplicate deals half damage with its Strikes and the duration is reduced to a maximum of 2 rounds.

Failure The duplicate works as described.

増強 (+1) The level of creature you can target increases by 2. The duplicate has 10 more HP.

entries.name: Dust Storm
entries.description:
You call forth a swirling storm of dust. The dust storm obscures vision, with the effect of @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.9XHmC2JgTUIQ1CCm]{Obscuring Mist}. The dust also makes the air unbreathable; creatures in the area must hold their breath, though wearing a scarf or similar clothing over the mouth increases the time the creature can hold its breath to 5 rounds. Creatures entering or starting their turn in the dust storm take 1d6 slashing damage. Creatures that have the water trait or that are made primarily of liquid take double damage.

増強 (+2) The damage increases by 1d6.

entries.name: Dutiful Challenge
entries.description:
As you challenge an enemy, you take some of its attention away from your allies. The target takes a -1 status penalty to attack rolls, damage rolls, and skill checks against creatures other than you, and you take a -1 status penalty to attack rolls, damage rolls, and skill checks against creatures other than the target.

Each time a creature other than you uses a hostile action that affects the challenged enemy, the enemy can attempt a Will save. On a success, the enemy no longer takes the penalty against that creature. You can Dismiss the spell, and it ends automatically if you or the target is defeated.

増強 (+3) The status penalties increase by 1.

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.UH2sT6eW5e31Xytd]{Spell Effect: Dutiful Challenge}

entries.name: デジャ＝ヴュ
entries.description:
君は対象の精神に思考過程をループさせ、同じアクションを再び繰り返させる。対象は意志セーヴを試みなくてはならない。もし対象がしっ端板なら、次の手番に対象が使ったアクションを、次の手番に繰り返さなくてはならない。アクションは同じ順番で、そして、可能な限り同じやり方で繰り返さなくてはならない。例えば、もし対象が攻撃をしたなら、次の手番には可能ならば同じクリーチャーに対して攻撃を繰り返さなければならず、対象が移動したなら、次の手番には可能ならば同じ方向と距離に移動しなければならない。

もし、消費してしまった、あるいは死んでしまったクリーチャーを対象にする必要がある@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]{「呪文の発動」}など、対象がアクションを繰り返すことが出来ないなら、そのアクションの代わりに選んだとおりの行動をすることが出来るが、手番の終了時まで@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{知性低下1}になる。

entries.name: アースバインド
entries.description:
大地の重さを利用し、君は対象の飛行を阻害する。その効果は頑健セーヴに基づく。もしクリーチャーが地面に安全に到着したなら、落下のダメージを受けない。

クリティカル 対象は影響を受けない

成功 対象は120フィートまで安全に落下する。

失敗 対象は120フィートまで安全に落下する。もし地面に当たったなら、そのクリーチャーは1ラウンド、「飛行」、浮遊、その他の手段によって地面を離れることが出来ない。

ファンブル 対象は120フィートまで安全に落下する。もし地面に当たったなら、そのクリーチャーは1分間、「飛行」、浮遊、その他の手段によって地面を離れることが出来ない。

entries.name: Earthquake
entries.description:
You shake the ground, topple creatures into fissures, and collapse structures. The GM might add additional effects in certain areas. Cliffs might collapse, causing creatures to fall, or a lake might drain as fissures open up below its surface, leaving a morass of quicksand.

  • Shaking Ground The ground is difficult terrain, and creatures on it take a -2 circumstance penalty to attack rolls, AC, and skill checks.
  • Fissures Each creature on the ground must attempt a Reflex save at the start of its turn to keep its footing and avoid falling into 40-foot-deep fissures that open beneath it. The fissures are permanent, and their sides require successful DC 15 Athletics to Climb.
  • Collapse Structures and ceilings might collapse. The GM rolls a flat check for each (DC 16 for a sturdy structure, DC 14 for an average structure and most natural formations, DC 9 for a shoddy structure, all adjusted higher or lower as the GM sees fit). A collapse deals 11d6 bludgeoning damage; each creature caught in a collapse must attempt a Reflex save to avoid it.

Critical Success The creature takes half the collapse damage.

Success The creature takes half the collapse damage and falls @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone}.

Failure The creature takes the full collapse damage and falls Prone.

Critical Failure The creature takes the full collapse damage and falls into a fissure.

増強 (10th) You create a massive earthquake that can devastate a settlement. The range increases to half a mile and the area to a quarter-mile burst.

entries.name: エコーイング・ウェポン
entries.description:
対象となった武器に君は魔法のエネルギーを流す。その周囲の空気は、君が一撃を繰り出すたびに微かにうなりをあげ、その衝撃は武器に吸収される。もし、手番の終了時にクリーチャーがその武器を使っているなら、武器は使用者に隣接するクリーチャー1体（いるなら）を対象にした音の爆発を解放する。この音波ダメージはその手番に対象となった武器で使用者が行った「打撃」の成功回数に等しい（もし、使用者が4回の「打撃」を成功させたなら、最大値が4点の音波ダメージとなる）。

増強 (+2) 「打撃」ごとの音波ダメージは1点、上昇する（最大ダメージは4点、増える）

entries.name: Eclipse Burst
entries.description:
A globe of freezing darkness explodes in the area, dealing 8d10 cold damage to creatures in the area, plus 8d4 additional negative damage to living creatures. Each creature in the area must attempt a Reflex save. If the globe overlaps with an area of magical light or affects a creature affected by magical light, eclipse burst attempts to counteract the light effect.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature takes half damage.

Failure The creature takes full damage.

Critical Failure The creature takes double damage and becomes @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Blinded} by the darkness for an unlimited duration.

増強 (+1) The cold damage increases by 1d10 and the negative damage against the living increases by 1d4.

entries.name: Ectoplasmic Expulsion
entries.description: You call upon tendrils of ephemeral ectoplasm to pass through the target and carry away a harmful psychic affliction. You immediately attempt to counteract a single effect on the target with the emotion or possession trait, or an effect giving the target the @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.9qGBRpbX9NEwtAAr]{Controlled} or @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AdPVz7rbaVSRxHFg]{Fascinated} condition. If you fail to counteract the effect, you nevertheless set up a resonance that allows the target to more ably escape the effect on its own; for the next hour, the target gains a +2 status bonus to Will saves to shrug off the effect you failed to counteract (such as Will saves to shake off control by the @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.wU6hNzK8Yfqdmc8m]{Possession} spell).

entries.name: Ectoplasmic Interstice
entries.description: You force the Material and Ethereal Planes to partially overlap, creating a zone that causes incorporeal and spiritual entities to take on many of the aspects of corporeal creatures. Within the ectoplasmic interstice, incorporeal creatures cannot pass through solid objects or corporeal creatures, and they can manipulate and attempt Strength-based checks against physical creatures and objects. An incorporeal PC or other creature with a normal Strength modifier simply uses that modifier, but if the creature had a Strength modifier of -5, like most incorporeal monsters, it uses a +4 modifier instead, increasing its Athletics modifier by 9 accordingly. Attacks against creatures that are within the interstice overcome resistances as if they were by @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.JQdwHECogcTzdd8R]{Ghost Touch} weapons.

entries.name: Efficient Apport
entries.description:
Walking over to an item to pick it up is so much effort. Whether it's your spellbook, a reagent, or a glass of wine, it's simply more efficient to call it to your hand. You teleport the target into your open hand. If you don't have a hand free, it falls to the ground at your feet.

増強 (3rd) You can target an unattended object with a Bulk of 1 or less

増強 (5th) The range increases to 120 feet, and you can target an unattended object with a Bulk of 1 or less.

増強 (7th) The range increases to 120 feet, and you can target an unattended object with a Bulk of 2 or less.

entries.name: 幻獣の怒り
entries.description:
幻獣は君が「幻獣の怒り」特技を使った際に選んだダメージ種別のダメージ5d6点を、基本反応セーヴに基づいて与える強力なエネルギー攻撃を放つ。

増強(+1) ダメージが2d6点上昇する

entries.name: Eject Soul
entries.description:
Your touch disrupts the connection between body and soul, possibly forcing the soul out of the body altogether. The target must attempt a Fortitude save. You can allow allies to choose the degree of success instead of rolling a saving throw.

Success The target is unaffected.

Failure The target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 1} as its soul briefly loses its connection to its body.

Critical Failure The target's soul exits its body for 1 round. The target's body becomes Stunned. While its body is stunned in this way, the target remains fully aware in soul form; it simply can't consciously move its body (though the body makes basic instinctual defensive movements). The target's soul has the incorporeal trait, is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Invisible}, and has a fly Speed of 60 feet. It can't attack, cast spells, or attempt any skill checks that require a physical body, and it must always maintain line of effect to its body. When the target's body ceases being stunned, the target's soul instantly returns to its body as the target wakes.

増強 (+3) If a willing ally chooses to critically fail, it can stay in soul form for 1 additional round.

entries.name: Electrified Crystal Ward
entries.description:
You create an @Compendium[pf2e.hazards.491qhVbjsHnOuMZW]{Electric Latch Rune} hazard on the target, creating a special crystalline lock on the object. You can also substitute your spell DC for any of the hazard's listed DCs. You can have only one such hazard active at a time, and if you cast this spell while a previous electric latch rune is active, the older hazard discharges harmlessly.

増強 (+2) The hazard's damage increases by 1d12.

entries.name: Element Embodied
entries.description:
Drawing upon the deepest wells of magic in an elemental plane, you transform into a spectacular elemental. You can choose between an air elemental, earth elemental, fire elemental, or water elemental. Your battle form is Gargantuan, and you must have enough space to expand into or the spell is lost. While in this form, you gain the elemental trait and the trait for the element you choose. You can Dismiss the spell.

You gain the following statistics and abilities regardless of which battle form you choose:

  • AC = 25 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 30 temporary Hit Points.
  • Darkvision.
  • One or more attacks specific to the battle form you choose, which are the only attacks you can use. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +34, and you use the listed damage. These attacks are Dexterity based if you choose an air or fire elemental, or Strength based if you choose an earth or water elemental. (This distinction doesn't change the statistics, but matters for the enfeebled and clumsy conditions, for example). If your unarmed attack modifier is higher, you can use it instead.
  • Acrobatics modifier of +36 for air or fire elemental or Athletics modifier of +36 for earth or water elemental, unless your own modifier is higher.

You also gain specific abilities based on the type of elemental you choose:

  • Air Elemental fly Speed 80 feet;
    • High Winds (air, aura) 30 feet. Air within the emanation is difficult terrain for flying creatures that don't have the air trait;
    • Swiftness Your movement doesn't trigger reactions;
    • Melee 1 gust (reach 25 feet), Damage 3d12+11 bludgeoning plus Push 10 feet;
    • Ranged 1 lightning lash (range increment 80 feet), Damage 3d12+4 electricity.

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.J60rN48XzBGHmR6m]{Spell Effect: Element Embodied (Air)}

  • Earth Elemental 30 feet, burrow 20 feet; resistance 5 to physical;
    • Spike Stones (aura, earth) 30 feet. The area is difficult terrain and hazardous terrain. A creature without the earth trait that moves on the ground in the area takes 5 piercing damage for every square of that area it moves into;
    • Rocky Toughness You gain 40 temporary Hit Points when you choose this form instead of 30;
    • Melee 1 fist (reach 25 feet), Damage 3d12+15 bludgeoning;
    • Ranged 1 rock (range increment 40 feet), Damage 4d8+6 bludgeoning.

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.jp88SCE3VCRAyE6x]{Spell Effect: Element Embodied (Earth)}

  • Fire Elemental 50 feet; immunity to fire; weakness to cold 10;
    • Intense Heat (aura, fire) 30 feet. A creature that enters the aura or starts its turn in the aura takes 5d6 fire damage with a basic Reflex save against your spell DC. A creature can take damage from the aura only once per round;
    • Melee 1 tendril (reach 25 feet), Damage 3d10+12 fire plus 2d6 persistent fire;
    • Ranged 1 fire mote (range increment 60 feet), Damage 4d8+6 bludgeoning.

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.lmAwCy7isFvLYdGd]{Spell Effect: Element Embodied (Fire)}

  • Water Elemental 40 feet, swim 80 feet; resistance 10 to fire;
    • Vortex (aura, water) 30 feet. Water within the aura that is part of the same body of water you occupy is difficult terrain for Swimming creatures that don't have the water trait;
    • Melee 1 wave (reach 25 feet), Damage 3d12+18 bludgeoning plus Push or Pull 10 feet;
    • Ranged 1 water spout (range increment 60 feet), Damage 4d8+6 bludgeoning.

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.w1HwO7huxJoK0gHY]{Spell Effect: Element Embodied (Water)}

entries.name: エレメンタル・アブソープション
entries.description:
君は元素のエネルギーを吸収し、それを強力な反撃として解き放つことが出来る。風、地、火、水から1つを選ぶこと。君は選んだエレメンタルの特性を持つ効果によって与えられたダメージに、抵抗5を得る；もし、水を選んだなら、君は氷雪ダメージへの抵抗をも得る。通常通り、もし、ある呪文が複数の効果を持つなら、例えば、過剰に熱せられた岩石によって火炎ダメージと打撃ダメージを与える呪文については、君は選んだ元素に関連する効果に対してのみ、抵抗を得る。君がこの呪文で幾つのダメージを防いだのかを、記録しておくこと。

精神集中の特性と、君が選んだ元素に応じた特性を持つ2アクションの連続行動として、君は保存したエネルギーを放つことが出来る。これは、君が保存したエネルギーの等しい（最大値で30点のダメージ）に等しいダメージを、基本反応セーヴを伴って60フィート以内の敵に与える。ダメージ種別は、君が選んだ元素の種別によって異なる；火なら火炎ダメージ；水なら殴打ダメージあるいは氷雪ダメージ；風なら殴打ダメージあるいは斬撃ダメージ；地なら殴打ダメージ、刺突ダメージあるいは斬撃ダメージ。エネルギーを解放した後、呪文は終了する。もし、呪文が終了する前に保存したエネルギーを使わないなら、エネルギーは失われる。
@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.nfQAqTSVHcA2JSyI]{呪文効果: エレメンタル・アブソープション (風)}
@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.E6HPkpvzvkaJ49c0]{呪文効果: エレメンタル・アブソープション (地)}
@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.VAJMojQATvpAcpQW]{呪文効果: エレメンタル・アブソープション (火)}
@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.n3gkkiOcLcSHxAah]{呪文効果: エレメンタル・アブソープション (水)}

増強 (+3) 抵抗は5点増え、最大ダメージは30点増える

entries.name: エレメンタル・アニヒレーション・ウェイヴ
entries.description:
君は周囲から元素の力を引き出し、それを自分自身の魔法のエネルギーと組み合わせて、完全な破壊と波と渦巻く色彩を解き放ち、基本反応セーヴを伴う1d6点の火炎ダメージと3d6点の殴打ダメージを与える。君が「呪文の発動」の際に消費したアクション数が、範囲とそのほかのパラメータを決定する。

2 (動作、音声) この呪文は30フィート円錐である

3 (物質、動作、音声) この呪文は30フィート円錐である。セーヴィング・スロー失敗時、クリーチャーは君から5フィート押しやられ、ファンブル時、クリーチャーは君から10フィート押しやられて伏せ状態になる

2ラウンド 君が3アクションの「呪文の発動」を使ったなら、君は呪文を完了させずに、次の手番に追加で3アクション消費して更に呪文に力を与えることが出来る。もしそうしたなら、この呪文は3アクションと同じだが、範囲は60フィート円錐になり、1ラウンドの間、元素は円錐内に留まり、遠くに向かって駆け抜け、君に近づくことを困難にする。これは、ガスト・オヴ・ウィンドの効果である。

増強 (+2) ダメージは2d6点上昇し、3アクションあるいは2ラウンドを消費した際に敵が押しやられる距離は失敗時に5フィート、ファンブル時に10フィート増える

entries.name: 元素の裏切り
entries.description:
君は自分の敵を陥れるために元素の力を頼りにする。君がこの「呪文の発動」をした際、風、地、火炎、水から1つを選ぶ。対象は、選択した特性を持つ呪文からダメージを受けるか、効果を受けるたびに、呪文あるいは効果によって与えられるダメージ種別のダメージに、追加で2点のダメージを受ける。もし、君が火炎か水を選んだなら、対象はこの追加ダメージを、選択した特性を持たない効果や呪文からの火炎や氷雪ダメージを受ける際にも受ける。

増強（+2） 追加ダメージを1点増やす

entries.name: 元素の爆発
entries.description:
範囲 0フィート半径の爆発、30フィートの円錐あるいは60フィートの直線

君は元素のエネルギーを集め、様々な記載された形状から君が選んだものの形で敵にそれをぶつけ、8d6の殴打ダメージを与える（あるいは、もし君の元素が炎なら火炎ダメージである）。この呪文は君の元素の特性を持つ。

増強 (+1) ダメージは2d6上昇する

entries.name: Elemental Confluence
entries.description:
You conjure four types of elementals who combine forces to form into a chaotic storm. The confluence has AC 28 and 120 Hit Points, weakness 10 to area effects, and immunity to bleed and poison. Creatures can move through the confluence; creatures within the confluence are concealed, and all creatures outside the confluence are concealed to creatures within it. When you Cast or Sustain this Spell, you choose up to two different types of elementals to act.

  • Air (air, electricity) The elemental looses a bolt of electricity from the confluence, dealing [[/r {4d4}[electricity]]]{4d4 electricity damage} to creatures within 20 feet of the confluence, with a basic Reflex save. This doesn't affect creatures that are completely inside of the confluence.
  • Earth (earth) The confluence gains a +2 circumstance bonus to AC and resistance 10 to all physical damage (except adamantine) for 1 round.
  • Fire (fire) Flames roar through the confluence, dealing [[/r {1d6}[persistent,fire]]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Fire Damage} to those partially or entirely inside the confluence.
  • Water (attack, water) The elemental expels a powerful jet of water. Attempt a ranged spell attack against a target within 60 feet of the confluence, using your spell attack roll modifier. This attack ignores concealment granted by the confluence, and the elemental gets a +2 circumstance bonus on the spell attack roll against a target inside the confluence. The water deals [[/r {4d6}[bludgeoning]]]{4d6 bludgeoning damage} on a hit (doubled on a critical hit). This attack doesn't count toward your multiple attack penalty.

entries.name: Elemental Form
entries.description:
You call upon the power of the planes to transform into a Medium elemental battle form. When you cast this spell, choose air, earth, fire, or water. While in this form, you gain the corresponding trait and the elemental trait. You have hands in this battle form and can take manipulate actions. You can Dismiss the spell.

You gain the following statistics and abilities regardless of which battle form you choose:

  • AC = 19 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 10 temporary Hit Points.
  • Darkvision.
  • One or more unarmed melee attacks specific to the battle form you choose, which are the only attacks you can use. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +18, and your damage bonus is +9. These are Dexterity based (air or fire) or Strength based (earth or water). If your corresponding unarmed attack modifier is higher, you can use it instead.
  • Acrobatics (air or fire) or Athletics (earth or water) modifier of +20; ignore this change if your own modifier is higher.

You also gain specific abilities based on the type of elemental you choose:

  • @Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.DliizYpHcmBG130w]{Air}
    • fly Speed 80 feet, movement doesn't trigger reactions;
    • Melee 1 gust, Damage 1d4 bludgeoning.
  • @Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.8eWLR0WCf5258z8X]{Earth}
    • Speed 20 feet, burrow Speed 20 feet;
    • Melee 1 fist, Damage 2d10 bludgeoning.
  • @Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.phIoucsDa3iplMm2]{Fire}
    • Speed 50 feet; fire resistance 10, weakness 5 to cold and 5 to water;
    • Melee 1 tendril , Damage 1d8 fire plus [[/r {1d4}[persistent,fire]]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Fire Damage}.
  • @Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.kxMBdANwCcF841uA]{Water}
    • Speed 20 feet, swim Speed 60 feet; fire resistance 5;
    • Melee 1 wave, Damage 1d12 bludgeoning, and you can spend an action immediately after a hit to push the target 5 feet with the effects of a successful @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{Shove}.

増強 (6th) Your battle form is Large and your attacks have 10-foot reach. You must have space to expand or the spell is lost. You instead gain AC = 22 + your level, 15 temporary HP, an attack modifier of +23, a damage bonus of +13, and Acrobatics or Athletics +23.

増強 (7th) Your battle form is Huge and your attacks have 15-foot reach. You must have space to expand or the spell is lost. You instead gain AC = 22 + your level, 20 temporary HP, an attack modifier of +25, a damage bonus of +11, double the number of damage dice (including @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Damage}), and Acrobatics or Athletics +25.

entries.name: Elemental Gift
entries.description:
An elemental force fills your target, granting the target the swiftness of air, the ruggedness of earth, the sting of fire, or the flexibility of water, depending on which element you choose. Choose an element when you Cast the Spell. The target gains the benefit of that element as described below, and this spell gains that trait's element.

  • Air The target gains a +30-foot status bonus to its land Speed and gains a fly Speed equal to its land Speed without the status bonus. @Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.yke7fAUDxUNzouQc]{Spell Effect: Elemental Gift (Air)}
  • Earth While on the ground, the target gets a +2 status bonus to Fortitude and Reflex saves against effects that would Shove or Trip it, and to saves against effects that would attempt to knock it prone. In addition, the ground adjacent to the target is difficult terrain, and the difficult terrain moves with the target, though the target ignores this difficult terrain with its own movement. @Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.fLOQMycP5tmXgPv9]{Spell Effect: Elemental Gift (Earth)}
  • Fire The target's melee unarmed Strikes and melee weapon Strikes deal 1d6 persistent fire damage on a hit. @Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.5R3ewWLFkgqTvZsc]{Spell Effect: Elemental Gift (Fire)}
  • Water The target takes on a watery sheen, gaining resistance 5 to fire and a swim Speed equal to its land Speed. @Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.yq6iu0Qxg3YEbb6s]{Spell Effect: Elemental Gift (Water)}

増強 (8th) You can target up to 5 willing creatures.

entries.name: 元素の動き
entries.description:
君は自分に動力を与えてくれる元素の力によって、元素によって異なるやり方で速度を改善する。この呪文は君の元素の特性を持つ。

  • @Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.iqtjMVl6rGQhX2k8]{風}　君は速度に等しい飛行速度を得る
  • @Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.qbOpis7pIkXJbM2B]{地}　君は10フィートの掘り進み速度を得る
  • @Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.q4EEYltjqpRGiLsP]{火}　君は速度に等しい飛行速度を得る
  • @Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.D0Qj5tC1hGUjzQc4]{水}　君は速度に等しい水泳速度を得て水中で呼吸が出来る

増強 (6th) 君はまた、移動速度及び得た速度（訳注：原語はSpeeds)に+10フィートのステータス・ボーナスを得る

増強 (9th) ステータス・ボーナスは+20フィートに増加する

entries.name: Elemental Sentinel
entries.description:
You place a tiny elemental wisp within a single object, usually a mirror, statue, or other mundane-looking item, to serve as an alarm. Shattering or otherwise destroying the object frees the wisp and ends the ritual's effect even if the object is magically restored.

Critical Success The elemental wisps inhabits the object and willingly serves you to the best of its ability. The wisp becomes aware of the target object's surroundings and can telepathically contact you with a range of 500 feet. It reports to you about intruders or other changes to the room in which it's located. You must tell the wisp what the criteria for the reports will be-for instance, when anyone not openly wearing a certain symbol enters the room or when an item is removed. The wisp has a +5 Perception modifier and observes the room using normal vision, normal hearing, and touch.

Success As critical success, but the range of the telepathy is 100 feet and the wisp's Perception modifier is +3.

Failure You're unable to harness the spirit. The ritual fails.

Critical Failure The elemental wisp is trapped in the object as with a success, but it refuses or is somehow unable to help you. The elemental might have extremely low Intelligence or simply be spiteful. Regardless, the object's reports are always misleading.

増強 (4th) The range of the telepathic link increases, allowing the wisp to contact you anywhere on the same planet. Its Perception modifier increases to +10, or +12 on a critical success.

増強 (6th) As 4th level, except the wisp can see invisibility, and its Perception modifier increases to +15, or +17 on a critical success.

entries.name: 元素の嵐
entries.description:
呪文発動によって君は元素のエネルギーの嵐に囲まれる。

もし君の次のアクションが、ウィザード呪文スロットからの強酸、氷雪、電撃、火炎ダメージを与える力術呪文であるなら、君が呪文の発動をするときに10フィート拡散のエネルギーが君を囲む。

範囲内の敵は君がちょうど発動したばかりの呪文の呪文レベルごとに1d6の、その呪文が与えるのと同じ種別のダメージを与える（複数の種別があるなら一つを選ぶ）。ボーナス、ペナルティ、抵抗、弱点といったものを適用する前に、敵に対して使われた呪文と元素の嵐のダメージを合算すること。

entries.name: 元素の放物
entries.description:
手首を動かすことで、君は敵に自分の元素の物質の塊を飛ばす。呪文攻撃ロールを行い、成功時に1d8の殴打ダメージ（もし君の元素が火なら火炎ダメージ）を、クリティカルなら2倍のダメージを与えること。この呪文は君の元素の特性を持つ。

増強 (+1) ダメージは1d8上昇する

entries.name: エレメンタル・ゾーン
entries.description:
エレメンタルの特性を1つ、選ぶ：風、地、火、水。エレメンタル・ゾーンは君が選んだ特性を得る。君はそのエレメントの生のエネルギーを範囲に注ぎ込み、その種別の魔法を放出し、強化するゾーンを作り出す。気温が唐突に上下したり、嵐の雲が出てきたりといったことが起こるだろう。選んだエレメンタルの特性を持つ呪文がクリーチャーに対してゾーン内で発動された場合、選んだ特性に基づいて、その呪文が与える1種類のダメージ種別に+2ステータス・ボーナスがつく。風ならば殴打あるいは電撃、地ならば殴打、火ならば火炎、そして水ならば殴打あるいは氷雪である。術者は、その呪文が2つ以上の有効な特性を持つなら、1種類を選ばなければならない。このボーナスは、もし、その呪文が呪文スロットを使わないなら半分になる（キャントリップ、集中呪文、あるいは生来の呪文など）

このゾーンは、もし、その呪文が適用可能な種別のダメージを与えないなら何の効果もない。

増強 (+2) ステータス・ボーナスは1点、上昇する

entries.name: 奈落の抱擁
entries.description:
悪魔の角が君の頭蓋骨から生えて、君の皮膚が悪魔の血脈を君にもたらしたデヴィルの特徴を持つ。君は悪、火炎、毒に抵抗5を持ち、物理ダメージ（銀を除く）に抵抗1を持つ。君はたとえ自分自身が悪でなくとも善ダメージを受け、善ダメージへの弱点5を持つ。

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.gX8O0ArQXbEVDUbW]{呪文効果: 奈落の抱擁}

増強 (+2) 悪、火炎、毒への抵抗は5、物理ダメージ（銀を除く）への抵抗は2上昇し、善ダメージへの弱点は5上昇する。

entries.name: Empower Ley Line
entries.description:
You draw upon surrounding magical energy to empower a ley line, enhancing both its positive and negative effects.

The duration of an empowered ley line's benefits increases: when you successfully @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.gxtq81VAhpmNvEgA]{Tap Ley Line} that's empowered, you gain its benefits until the end of your next turn on a success (1 minute on a critical success).

You take double the damage if you fail to Tap a Ley Line that's empowered and double the damage from the ley line's backlash effects (if any). If a backlash effect has a duration, that duration increases: a backlash effect that would ordinarily last until the end of your next turn now lasts for 1 minute, effects that last for 1 minute now last for 10 minutes, effects that last for 10 minutes now last for 1 hour, and effects that last for 1 hour now last for 1 day.

Critical Success You empower the ley line until the next turning of the season.

Success You empower the ley line for 1 week.

Failure You fail to empower the ley line.

Critical Failure All casters take damage and suffer the ley line's backlash as if they had critically failed to Tap the Ley Line. This damage and backlash is enhanced as if the ley line were successfully empowered, leading to increased damage and longer backlash effects.

entries.name: 虚ろなる肉体
entries.description: 君は@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.D2nPKbIS67m9199U]{イセリアル・ジョーント}の効果でエーテルとなるが、精神集中する必要はない。

entries.name: Empty Inside
entries.description:
You inject a sliver of the void into your mind, momentarily remaking it into a bleak and empty place. Attempt a counteract check against one emotion effect affecting you.

増強 (5th) You can attempt counteract checks against any number of emotion effects affecting you.

entries.name: エンデュア
entries.description:
君は接触したクリーチャーの精神を高め、士気を上げる。君は接触したクリーチャーに5点の一時的ヒットポイントを与える。

増強 (+1) 一時的ヒットポイントを5点、増やす

entries.name: エンデュア・エレメンツ
entries.description:
君は危険な気候から対象を守る。深刻な寒さか深刻な暑さから一つを選ぶ。対象は君が選んだ気候から守られる（だが極限の寒さや極限の暑さからは守られない）

増強 (3rd) 対象は深刻な冷気と深刻な暑さから守られる

増強 (5th) 対象は深刻な冷気、深刻な暑さ、極限の冷気、極限の暑さから守られる

entries.name: 耐え忍ぶ筋力
entries.description:
トリガー 攻撃あるいは効果によって君がダメージを受けるところである

君を守るため、君自身の筋力が信仰の力と交じり合う。君はトリガーとなった攻撃あるいは効果からの全てのダメージに対して、8+筋力修正値に等しい抵抗を得る。

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.ZHVtJKnur9PAF5TO]{呪文効果: 耐え忍ぶ筋力}

増強 (+1) 抵抗は2増加する

entries.name: エネルギー吸収
entries.description:
トリガー ある効果によって君が強酸、氷雪、電撃、火炎ダメージを受けるところである

君はトリガーとなった効果による強酸、氷雪、電撃、火炎ダメージ（君の選んだ一つの種別）に対して抵抗15を得る。抵抗はトリガーとなった効果の最初のダメージにのみ適用される。

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.cNZRAPd2kVrM3Iuo]{呪文効果: エネルギー吸収 (強酸)}
@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.WquoEAIT621zDLpY]{呪文効果: エネルギー吸収 (氷雪)}
@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.0IxfOSTMen1GKQUW]{呪文効果: エネルギー吸収 (電撃)}
@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.db9lXpF4OsPz9cXL]{呪文効果: エネルギー吸収 (火炎)}

増強(+1) 抵抗は5上昇する

entries.name: Energy Aegis
entries.description:
You protect the target with a powerful, long-lasting energy barrier. The target gains resistance 5 to acid, cold, electricity, fire, force, negative, positive, and sonic damage.

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.4Lo2qb5PmavSsLNk]{Spell Effect: Energy Aegis}

増強 (9th) The resistances increase to 10.

entries.name: Enervation
entries.description:
Extending a finger, you fire a beam of negative energy that weakens the life force of any creature it touches. Each living creature in the line must attempt a Fortitude save.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature takes [[/r {2d8}[persistent,negative]]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Negative Damage}.

Failure The creature takes [[/r {4d8}[persistent,negative]]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Negative Damage} and becomes @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 1}.

Critical Failure The creature takes [[/r {4d8}[persistent,negative]]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Negative Damage} and becomes @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 2} and @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv]{Doomed 1}.

増強 (+2) The persistent negative damage increases by [[/r {1d8}[persistent,negative]]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Negative Damage} on a success, or by [[/r {2d8}[persistent,negative]]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Negative Damage} on a failure or critical failure.

entries.name: エンハンス・ヴィクチュアル
entries.description:
君は、水をワインや別の上等な飲み物に変え、食べ物の味と材料を強化して、対象を美味なものに変えることでおいしい食事に対象を変化させる。変化させるのに先だって、呪文は食べ物や水にあるあらゆる毒を無効化しようとする。

もし、持続時間が切れるまでに食べなければ食べ物は通常のものに戻るが、無効化されたあらゆる毒はなくなったままである。

増強 (+1) 君が対象に取ることの出来る水のガロン数が1上昇するか、君が対象に取ることの出来る食べ物のポンド数が5上昇する。

entries.name: エンラージ
entries.description:
魔法の力によって強化され、対象は大型になる。対象の装備は一緒に大きくなるが、もし手から離れれば元のサイズに戻る。クリーチャーは、@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{もたつき1}である。間合いは5フィート増加し（あるいは最初に超小型だったなら10フィートになる）、近接ダメージに+2のステータス・ボーナスを得る。この呪文は大型以上のクリーチャーには効果が無い。

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.sPCWrhUHqlbGhYSD]{呪文効果: エンラージ}

増強 (4th) クリーチャーは代わりに超大型になる。近接ダメージへのステータス・ボーナスは+4になり、クリーチャーの間合いが10フィート増加する（あるいは最初に超小型だったなら15フィート増加する）。この呪文は超大型以上のクリーチャーには効果が無い @Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.41WThj17MZBXTO2X]{呪文効果: エンラージ (増強 4th)}

増強 (6th) 2レベルか4レベルのバージョンのこの呪文のどちらかを選び、その効果を10体の同意するクリーチャーに適用する

entries.name: エンタングル
entries.description: 範囲内の植物がクリーチャーに絡みつく。範囲は移動困難な地形とみなされる。クリーチャーは範囲内で手番を開始したラウンドごとに、反応セーヴを試みなくてはならない。失敗時、クリーチャーは範囲を去るまで速度に－10フィートの状況ペナルティを受ける。ファンブルしたなら、1ラウンド、@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{動けない状態}になる。クリーチャーはこれらの効果を取り除くため、「脱出」を試みることが出来る。

entries.name: エンスロール
entries.description:
君の言葉は対象を魅了する。君は発動時間と持続時間の間中、阻まれることなく話すか、あるいは歌う。君の話か歌に気付いた対象は、一心の注意を君に注ぐかも知れない；それぞれの対象は意志セーヴを試みなくてはならない。GMは、もし対象が対立する宗教、祖先、政治的な学び、あるいは君が言っていることに同意しないであろう何かを持っているのなら、状況ボーナス（最大で+4）を与えるかもしれない。

距離内に入ってきたそれぞれのクリーチャーは君が「呪文の維持」をした際にセーヴを試みなくてはならない。もし、君が話をしているなら、エンスロールは言語の特性を得る。
