Any of your enemies that Casts a Spell within 60 feet of Vorgozen must attempt a Fortitude save with the same effects unless it's already sickened; Depart (acid, evocation) Beam of Purest Vitriol Each creature in a 1,200-foot line takes [[/r {10d6}[acid]]]{10d6 acid damage} and [[/r {10d6}[bludgeoning]]]{10d6 bludgeoning damage} with a basic Fortitude save.
  • Yarthoon, the Moon Grub Speed 60 feet, burrow 100 feet, fly 100 feet, swim 100 feet; Arrive (cold, evocation) Algid Beam Barrage Yarthoon fires countless beams, targeting each of your enemies within 200 feet of it. The beams deal [[/r {10d6}[cold]]]{10d6 cold damage} with a basic Reflex save; Depart (cold, conjuration, water) Frostbite Mist Chilling mist surges out in a 100‑foot burst centered on Yarthoon and remains for 1 minute. This mist has the effects of @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.9XHmC2JgTUIQ1CCm]{Obscuring Mist}, plus any creature within the area at the end of its turn take [[/r {5d6}[cold]]]{5d6 cold damage} with a basic Fortitude save.

entries.name: サモン・レッサ－・サーヴィター
entries.description:
神格は必死になって、最も強力な従僕を信仰を持たない者の召喚呪文から守ろうとするが、この呪文は君が、神格の許可無く外方次元界の住民を呼び出すことを可能にする。

君は自分の代わりに戦ってくれる、レベルが－1のセレスチャル、モニター、フィーンドを呼び出す。代わりに、君は自分のレッサー・サーヴィターとして外方次元界から魔法の動物を呼び出すことを選んでもよい。この動物は@Compendium[pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary.8r8Ar08ojdJuPeiH]{イーグル}、@Compendium[pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary.QRRX82FIjBKd8pzs]{ガード・ドッグ}、@Compendium[pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary-2.hFbfXmjMkGEzMkQ1]{レイヴン}から君が選んだものである。この動物は君の神格に合致する属性を得て（あるいは、君が神格を持っていないなら君の属性）、得る属性に応じた下記の特性を得る：秩序ならばセレスチャル、中立ならばモニター、悪ならばフィーンド。君は、神格の属性が反対であるようなクリーチャーを召喚することが出来ない（あるいは、君が神格を信奉していないなら、君の属性と対立するクリーチャー）。例えば、もし君の神格が秩序にして善なら、君は混沌や悪のクリーチャーを召喚することが出来ない。ＧＭは、その属性が完全に反対ではなかったとしても、神格が特定の種別のクリーチャーを許可しないと判断することがある。例えば、ファラズマはサーキルの召喚を禁じるだろう。

呪文を増強することによって、君が召喚できるクリーチャーの最大レベルが増加し、イーグル、ガード・ドッグ、レイヴンのように働く追加の動物のサーヴィターを追加するかもしれない。

増強 (2nd) レベル1

増強 (3rd) レベル2、 君は@Compendium[pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary-2.xxP5FJotshmUQNtY]{ブラック・ベア}、@Compendium[pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary.C9s5tBxVValC2HTE]{ジャイアント・バット}、@Compendium[pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary.wqPYzMNgYvrO6oEP]{レオパード}を召喚することが出来る

増強 (4th) レベル3、君は@Compendium[pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary.WNiNj0Brn2LCYmwd]{グレート・ホワイト・シャーク}、@Compendium[pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary.ypLkUfuHHfNDsVUQ]{タイガー}を召喚することが出来る

entries.name: サモナーズ・プレコーション
entries.description: 君は自分と幻獣の間の絆にバッファを作り、絆のある味方と一緒に倒れてしまうのを防ぐ。君は@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.VCUz5EnBUJF07j1a]{導管切断}のリアクションを得る；それを使った後、この呪文は終了する。

entries.name: サモナーズ・ヴィザージュ
entries.description:
対象　君の幻獣

君は自分の幻獣を、自分の双子のように変身させる。君が人型生物であるとすると、幻獣はその姿でいる間、人型生物に加えてその他の、君の姿に関連する特性（例えばエルフやノーム）を得る。君の幻獣は君に「なりすます」ための〈欺瞞〉判定に+4ステータス・ボーナスを得て、未修得であってもそういった判定にレベルを加えることが出来る。

君の幻獣は君に見た目が似ているが、新しい能力を得ることはなく、あらゆる意味でステータスを変更しない――変身は純粋に見た目のものである。もし、この変身によって幻獣のサイズが小さくなるのなら、幻獣は、たとえ間合いの増加といったような、大きなサイズによるその他の効果を失う。君の幻獣はそれでもなお、幻獣の特性を持つ場合にのみ装備を使うことが出来る。幻獣の特性は、幻獣がその装備を使うことが出来ることを示している。このような、幻獣が着用している幻獣の特性を持つアイテムは、必要ならサイズと形状を変更し、その効果は発揮されたままである。

君はこの呪文を「解除」することが出来る。

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.0OC945wcZ4H4akLz]{呪文効果: サモナーズ・ヴィザージュ}

増強 (4th) 持続時間は1時間になる

entries.name: Sun Blade
entries.description:
You fire a ray of burning sunlight from your weapon. You must be wielding a sword or spear to cast sun blade, and you perform this spell's somatic component with the weapon. Make a spell attack roll. The ray deals 1d4 fire damage. If the target is evil, the ray deals an additional 1d4 good damage, and if the target is undead, the ray deals an additional 1d4 positive damage (both effects apply against creatures that are both evil and undead). If you are in an area of bright natural sunlight, increase the die size of each damage die by one step (from d4 to d6).

Critical Success The ray deals double damage.

Success The ray deals full damage.

増強 (+1) The damage increases by 1d4 fire, 1d4 good, and 1d4 positive (or 1d6 of each type of damage in bright natural sunlight).

entries.name: Sun's Fury
entries.description: The target weapon becomes wreathed in a glowing flame. The weapon deals an additional [[/r {1d4}[fire]]]{1d4 fire damage} and [[/r {1}[good]]]{1 good damage} on a successful @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.VjxZFuUXrCU94MWR]{Strike}. In addition, the flame causes the weapon to glow as bright as a torch. You can @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.AjLSHZSWQ90exdLo]{Dismiss} the spell.

entries.name: Sunburst
entries.description:
A powerful globe of searing sunlight explodes in the area, dealing 8d10 fire damage to all creatures in the area, plus 8d10 additional positive damage to undead creatures. Each creature and object in the area must attempt a Reflex save. If the globe overlaps with an area of magical darkness, sunburst attempts to counteract the darkness effect.

Critical Success The creature or object is unaffected.

Success The creature takes half damage.

Failure The creature takes full damage.

Critical Failure The creature takes full damage. If it's a creature, it becomes @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Blinded} permanently.

増強 (+1) The fire damage increases by 1d10, and the positive damage against undead increases by 1d10.

entries.name: 怠惰の沼
entries.description:
範囲内の地面が沼地になり悪臭を放つ。この範囲は移動困難な地形である。沼地の底の汚泥がデーモンめいた外見を持つ微少の泥の獣になって動き出す。これは通常のクリーチャーのようには機能しないが、沼地にいるクリーチャーに群がり、酷い悪臭を放つ。この沼は1d6の毒ダメージを与える；範囲内で手番を終了したクリーチャーは基本頑健セーヴを試みなくてはならない。君は“呪文の発動”にかかるアクションの数を増加させることが出来る。追加のアクションを一つ追加するごとに爆発の半径を5フィート増やす。

増強 (+2) ダメージは1d6増加し、開始時半径は5フィート増加する。

entries.name: スワンプコール
entries.description:
君はその土地の精霊を呼び寄せ、ねじり、かきまわし、対象となった範囲の地形をぐちゃぐちゃに変化させる。その範囲は移動困難な地形になる。君が「呪文の発動」をした際に範囲内にいたクリーチャーは反応セーヴィング・スローを試みなくてはならない。

成功 クリーチャーは影響を受けない

失敗 Tクリーチャーは部分的に泥の中に沈み込む。クリーチャーは速度に－10フィートの状況ペナルティを受け（水泳速度以外のものすべて）、@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{立ちすくみ状態}になる。これらの効果は、クリーチャーが範囲を離れるか、次の手番の終了時か、最初に来た方まで続く

ファンブル 失敗と同じだが、速度へのペナルティ（水泳速度を除く）は－15フィートになる

増強 (3rd) 距離は60フィートに増え、範囲は20フィート爆発になる

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.ROuGwXEvFznzGE9k]{呪文効果: スワンプコール (失敗)}

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.otK6eG3b3FV7n2xP]{呪文効果: スワンプコール (ファンブル)}

entries.name: Swarm Form
entries.description:
You discorporate into a swarm of Tiny creatures. While in swarm form, you have the swarm trait and you gain resistance 5 to slashing and piercing damage and weakness 5 to area and splash damage. You can fit into spaces only a few inches wide, moving your constituent creatures through the gap. You don't gain the swarm mind ability, so you are still affected normally by mental effects. As a swarm, you can't speak, cast spells, use manipulate actions requiring your hands, activate your magic items, or make any of your Strikes with your normal body. You can Dismiss the Spell.

増強 (+2) Increase your resistances and weaknesses each by 5.

entries.name: Swarming Wasp Stings
entries.description:
You manifest a swarm of disembodied wasp stingers that stab creatures in the area, possibly poisoning them. Creatures in the affected area take [[/r {1d6}[piercing]]]{1d6 piercing damage}. Each creature that takes piercing damage must attempt a Fortitude save.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target takes [[/r {2d6}[poison]]]{2d6 poison damage}.

Failure The target is afflicted with Swarming Wasp Venom at stage 1.

Critical Failure The target is afflicted with swarming wasp venom at stage 2.

Swarming Wasp Venom (poison)

Level 7

Maximum Duration 6 rounds

Stage 1 [[/r {2d6}[poison]]]{2d6 poison damage} and @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1} (1 round)

Stage 2 [[/r {3d6}[poison]]]{3d6 poison damage} and @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 2} (1 round)

entries.name: Swarmsense
entries.description:
You extend your senses through a multitude of crawling and flying creatures. You create a crawling swarm in your square. You can hear through the swarm as if using your normal auditory senses. The first time you Sustain the Spell each round, you can move the swarm 10 feet along the ground in any direction. The swarm has AC 15 and a +0 bonus to its saves. Any damage dealt to the swarm destroys it and ends the spell.

増強 (3rd) The swarm has the benefits of spider climb.

増強 (5th) The swarm has a fly Speed of 10 feet. You can see through the swarm using your visual senses.

増強 (7th) The swarm gains a 10-foot status bonus to its Speeds.

entries.name: 甘き夢
entries.description:
慰めるような歌や物語で、君は対象を魔法めいた夢に引っ張り込む。君がこの呪文を発動した際、対象は既にそうでなければ、@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{気絶}する。気絶している間、その対象は君の選んだ夢を経験する。

もし少なくとも1分間、睡眠したなら、その対象は呪文の持続時間の残りの間、その夢の利益を得る。

  • @Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.v051JKN0Dj3ve5cF]{洞察の夢} 知力に基づいた技能判定に+1ステータス・ボーナス
  • @Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.MJSoRFfEdM4j5mNG]{魅惑の夢} 魅力に基づいた技能判定に+1ステータス・ボーナス
  • @Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.sE2txm68yZSFMV3v]{旅の夢} 移動速度に+5フィートのステータス・ボーナス

もし君がこの「呪文の発動」を再びするなら、あらゆる、君が発動した、かつての甘き夢の効果は終了する

entries.name: Synaptic Pulse
entries.description:
You emit a pulsating mental blast that penetrates the minds of all enemies in the area. Each creature in the area must attempt a Will save.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 1}.

Failure The creature is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 2}.

Critical Failure The creature is Stunned for 1 round.

entries.name: Synesthesia
entries.description:
The target's senses are suddenly rewired in unexpected ways, causing them to process noises as bursts of color, smells as sounds, and so on. This has three effects, and the target must attempt a Will save. Due to the distraction, the target must succeed at a DC 5 flat check each time it uses a concentrate action, or the action fails and is wasted. The target's difficulty processing visual input makes all creatures and objects @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} from it. The creature has trouble moving, making it @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 3} and giving it a -10-foot status penalty to its Speeds.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target is affected for 1 round.

Failure The target is affected for 1 minute.

Critical Failure As failure, and the target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 2} as it attempts to process the sensory shifts.

増強 (9th) You can target up to five creatures.

entries.name: 苦難促進
entries.description:
誰かが飲み過ぎてしまった際、君は苦難の最悪の部分を通り過ぎるように事態を早めるか、惨めな状態を激化させることが出来る。この呪文は対象に影響を与えている病気の苦難、毒の苦難、あるいは継続毒ダメージを進展させようとする。もしその対象がこれらのうち2つ以上に影響を受けているのなら、君は自分が知っている状態の中から一つを選ぶことが出来る；あるいは、GMがランダムに選ぶ。同意しないクリーチャーはこの効果を無効化するために意志セーヴを試みることが出来る。

この呪文の効果は、君が苦難や継続毒ダメージを終わらせようとしているのか、対象の回復を助ける、あるいは妨害しようとしているのかどうかによって変わる。

  • 苦難 対象は即座に苦難に対する次のセーヴィング・スローを試みる。君は選んだクリーチャーにその苦難へのセーヴィング・スローに対して@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.nHXKK4pRXAzrLdEP]{+2のステータス・ボーナス} か @Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.R27azQfzeFuFc48G]{-2のステータス・ペナルティ}を与えることが出来る。
  • 継続毒ダメージ 君はこの「呪文の発動」の際に、対象に継続毒ダメージを即座に受けさせることをが出来る（対象が次の手番に受けるものに加えて）。君がそうしたかどうかに関わらず、対象は継続毒ダメージに対して1回の追加の平目判定を行う。君はその平目判定の通常のDCの代わりに、DCを5か20に設定することが出来る。

増強（7レベル） 君は対象の適切な苦難と継続毒ダメージを、好きな数だけ進展させることが出来る。

entries.name: Talking Corpse
entries.description:
You grant the target corpse a semblance of life, which it uses to speak the answers to three questions posed to it. This spell calls on the physical body's latent memories rather than summoning back the deceased's spirit, so the corpse must be mostly intact for the spell to function. The more damage the corpse has taken, the more inaccurate or patchwork its answers are, and it must have a throat and mouth to speak at all. If anyone has previously cast this spell on the corpse in the last week, the spell automatically fails. The corpse can attempt a Will save to resist answering the questions using the statistics of the original creature at its time of death, with the following effects.

Critical Success The target can lie or refuse to answer your questions, and the target's spirit haunts you for 24 hours, bothering you and causing you to be unable to gain any rest for that time.

Success The target can provide false information or refuse to answer your questions.

Failure The target must answer truthfully, but its answers can be brief, cryptic, and repetitive. It can still mislead you or attempt to stall so that the spell's duration runs out before you can ask all your questions.

Critical Failure As failure, but the target's answers are more direct and less repetitive, though still cryptic. It takes a -2 status penalty to Deception checks to deceive or mislead you.

entries.name: テイム
entries.description:
対象　1体の敵対的でない家畜化された動物

心地よい音やジェスチャーをしながら、君は、警戒心と自信を兼ね備えた友好的な態度で対象に接近する。対象が意志セーヴに成功しない限り、呪文の持続時間中、対象の君に対する態度を1段階（非友好的→中立、中立→友好的、友好的→協力的）上昇させる。その後、対象は1日の間、一時的完全耐性を持つ。

この呪文は家畜化された動物にのみ機能する；例えば、守衛犬や迷い犬に使うことは出来るが、野生の犬や狼に使うことは出来ない。もし、動物が社会化されているかどうか疑問なら、判断はGMに委ねられる。

増強 (3rd) 持続時間は10分になる

増強 (6th) 持続時間は1時間になる

entries.name: Tangling Creepers
entries.description: Dense, twitching creepers sprout from every surface and fill any bodies of water in the area. Any creature moving on the land, or Climbing or Swimming within the creepers, takes a -10- foot circumstance penalty to its Speeds while in the area. Once per round, you can make a vine lash out from any square within the expanse of creepers by using a single action, which has the concentrate trait. This vine has a 15-foot reach. Make a melee spell attack roll against the target; on a success, the vine pulls the target into the creepers and makes it @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized} for 1 round or until the creature Escapes (against your spell DC), whichever comes first.

entries.name: Tattoo Whispers
entries.description:
You carefully tattoo the same design upon each secondary caster. The tattoo can be of any shape or symbol, but it must include a mouth. The tattoo fades naturally over the course of 1 month.

Critical Success The tattoos on the secondary casters are all magically linked for 1 week, providing a semi-telepathic bond. Each secondary caster can communicate secretly with any other secondary casters at any time by mouthing words but making no sound. The person receiving a message must be within 120 feet of the sender, must be within the sender's line of sight, and must have their tattoo uncovered. The mouth of the tattoo moves to match the words, which the tattoo whispers, but only the tattoo's bearer can hear it.

Success As critical success, but the effect lasts for 1 day.

Failure The ritual has no effect.

Critical Failure The ritual has no effect and creates a backlash of persistent mental static. All casters are @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 1} for 1 day.

entries.name: Telekinetic Haul
entries.description: You move the target up to 20 feet, potentially suspending it in midair. When you Sustain the Spell, you can do so again, or you can choose a different eligible target to move.

entries.name: テレキネティック・マニューバ
entries.description: 念動力で突き上げることによって、君は敵か敵が持ち運んでいるものを移動させる。君は〈軽業〉判定の代わりに呪文攻撃ロールを用いて「武器落とし」、「押しやり」、「足払い」を試みることが出来る。

entries.name: Telepathic Bond
entries.description: The targets can communicate telepathically with any or all of the other targets from any point on the same planet.

entries.name: Telepathic Demand
entries.description: You send the target a message of 25 words or fewer, and it can respond immediately with its own message of 25 words or fewer. Your message is insidious and has the effect of @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.qwlh6aDgi86U3Q7H]{Suggestion}, with the message substituting for the spoken suggestion. On a successful save, the target is temporarily immune for 1 day, and on a critical success, the target is temporarily immune for 1 month. You can target a creature only if you have previously been in telepathic contact with it before, such as via the telepathy spell.

entries.name: Telepathy
entries.description:
You can communicate telepathically with creatures within 30 feet. Once you establish a connection by communicating with a creature, the communication is two-way. You can communicate only with creatures that share a language with you.

増強 (6th) Telepathy loses the linguistic trait. You can communicate telepathically with creatures using shared mental imagery even if you don't share a language.

entries.name: Teleport
entries.description:
You and the targets are instantly transported to any location within range, as long as you can identify the location precisely both by its position relative to your starting position and by its appearance (or other identifying features). Incorrect knowledge of the location's appearance usually causes the spell to fail, but it could instead lead to teleporting to an unwanted location or some other unusual mishap determined by the GM. Teleport is not precise over great distances. The targets appear at a distance from the intended destination equal to roughly 1 percent of the total distance traveled, in a direction determined by the GM. For short journeys, this lack of precision is irrelevant, but for long distances this could be up to 1 mile.

増強 (7th) You and the other targets can travel to any location within 1,000 miles.

増強 (8th) You and the other targets can travel to any location on the same planet. If you travel more than 1,000 miles, you arrive only 10 miles off target.

増強 (9th) You and the other targets can travel to any location on another planet within the same solar system. Assuming you have accurate knowledge of the location's position and appearance, you arrive on the new planet 100 miles off target.

増強 (10th) As the 9th-level version, but you and the other targets can travel to any planet within the same galaxy.

entries.name: Teleportation Circle
entries.description:
You create a 10-foot-diameter circle on the ground, which acts as a portal to a destination determined at the time of the ritual. You designate the destination of the teleportation as part of the ritual. This destination can't be changed. The destination must be a location within 1,000 miles and be on the same plane as the teleportation circle. You must be able to identify the location precisely both by its position relative to the location where you create the teleportation circle and by the destination's appearance (or other identifying features). The destination must also be a 10-foot-diameter circle that doesn't overlap with any solid structures, but it can be a place that is harmful or dangerous.

A secondary caster attempting a Survival check for this ritual can be located at the exact site of the destination, instead of with you at the point of origin. If the secondary succeeds at their check at the destination and you roll a success, the ritual is a critical success instead.

While the circle is active, any creature that moves to be fully within the circle is instantly teleported to the destination. A creature that is unwilling to be teleported can attempt a Will save to resist the effect. If it remains in the circle, the creature must attempt this save again at the end of each of its turns.

The teleportation circle normally goes only in one direction, though you can double the Cost to make the teleportation work in both directions.

Critical Success You create the teleportation circle, and it's extremely precise, regardless of the distance traveled. Travelers arrive exactly at the designated point.

Success As a critical success, but the destination of the teleportation circle is slightly inaccurate, and is off target by roughly 1 percent of the distance traveled, to a maximum of 10 miles off target.

Failure The teleportation circle doesn't function.

Critical Failure The teleportation circle is wildly inaccurate. It leads to a random destination roughly the same distance from the origin point, and the chances of some other unusual mishap are much greater.

増強 (9th) The cost increases to 2,000 gp, the duration increases to 1 month, and the destination can be anywhere on the same planet.

増強 (10th) The cost increases to 10,000 gp, the duration is unlimited, and the destination can be anywhere on the same planet.

entries.name: 嵐の姿
entries.description:
君の肉体は周囲によりよく適合するために、流体になる。

君が「呪文の発動」をした際、風、水、霧のどれになるか選ぶ。この呪文は、風か霧を選んだなら風の特性を、水か霧を選んだなら水の特性を得る。

君と君の防具は不定形になる。君はACへのあらゆるアイテム・ボーナスを失い、ACを決めるのに生身の習熟ボーナスを用いる。君はまた、物理ダメージへの抵抗10を経て、精密ダメージに対して完全耐性を得る。君は小さな裂け目を通り抜けることが出来て、息をする必要がない。君は呪文の発動、アイテムの起動、攻撃あるいは操作の特性を持つアクションを使うことが出来ない。君はまた、姿に基づいた下記の効果を得る。

  • @Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.b5OyBdc0bolgWZZT]{風}
    • 君は20フィートの飛行速度を得て、大気中にいる間、@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{不可視状態}になる。
    • 君は操作の特性を持つ2アクションの連続行動として自分の接敵面から@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.g8QqHpv2CWDwmIm1]{ガスト・オヴ・ウィンド}の効果を作り出す。
  • @Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.HDKJAUXMbtxnBdgR]{霧}
    • 君は20フィートの飛行速度を得て、君を見通すのは難しくなる。
    • 反対側にいるクリーチャーによって対象にされた、君の接敵面の片側にいるクリーチャーは、対象にしているクリーチャーにとって@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{視認困難}である。
  • @Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.C3RdbEQTvawqKAhw]{水}
    • 君は20フィートの水泳速度を得て、水中にいる間、@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{不可視状態}になる。
    • 君は単発アクションで自分に電気を蓄積することが出来る。このアクションは操作の特性を持つ。そうしたなら、君は位置を示す電気によってもはや水中で不可視状態ではない。だが、君に対して近接攻撃を行うすべてのクリーチャーは[[/r {1d6}[電撃]]]{1d6点の電撃ダメージ}を受ける。もしそのクリーチャーが君に触れたなら、そのダメージは君の上級の呪いのダメージと累積する。

増強（+2） 抵抗を5点増やし、水形態の蓄積による電撃ダメージを1点増やす。

entries.name: 嵐の活性
entries.description:
君は暴力的な風、ゆがんだ雲、そして弾ける雷の渦巻く嵐で敵を囲む。嵐は1d12の電撃ダメージを与える。対象は基本反応セーヴを試みなくてはならない。失敗時、対象は1ラウンド、@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{もたつき2}になり、[[/r {1}[継続、電気]]]点の@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{継続電撃ダメージ}を受ける。

増強（+1） 初期ダメージが1d12上昇し、失敗時の継続電気ダメージが1点増える

entries.name: 嵐の接触
entries.description:
君の接触は対象に絡みつきながら荒れ狂う大量の氷水を頼りに、1d4点の殴打ダメージと1d4点の氷雪ダメージを与える。対象は頑健セーヴを試みなくてはならない。

クリティカル 対象は影響を受けない

成功 対象は半分のダメージを受け、君の次の手番の終了時まで速度に-5フィートの状況ペナルティを受ける

失敗 対象は完全のダメージを受け、君の次の手番の終了時まで速度に-10フィートの状況ペナルティを受ける

ファンブル 失敗と同じだが、対象は2倍のダメージを受ける

増強(+1) 殴打ダメージと氷雪ダメージはそれぞれ、1d4点ずつ増える

entries.name: Tempest of Shades
entries.description:
You channel the forces of undeath to briefly call forth an amalgam of the vengeful dead slain by your enemies and allies alike. This amalgam manifests as a large tornado of insubstantial, howling faces. It occupies the space of a Huge creature and has a Speed of 60 feet.

Arrive (negative) Vortex of Death Each enemy creature within a 60-foot emanation must attempt a Fortitude save with the following effects.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected

Success The creature is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 1}.

Failure The creature is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 2}.

Critical Failure The creature is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 3}.

Depart (emotion, fear, mental) Howl of Eternity The vengeful dead lets out an anguished scream. All your enemies within a 100-foot emanation must attempt Will saves with the following effects.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1}.

Failure The creature is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 3}.

Critical Failure The creature is frightened 3. It's also @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.sDPxOjQ9kx2RZE8D]{Fleeing} for 1 round or until it's no longer frightened, whichever comes first.

entries.name: Temporal Ward
entries.description:
You ward a target doorway or container with a temporal trap that rewinds the personal timeline of creatures trying to open it. A creature attempting to open a warded doorway or container must attempt a Will save with the below results.

You can set a password for the ward. Any creature that attempts to open the target container, or to open or pass through the target doorway without speaking the password must attempt a save as normal.

The ward vanishes automatically once the spell's duration ends, but can be removed before then as if it were a magical trap, using your spell DC for both the Perception check to notice it and Thievery check to disable it. Both checks require the creature attempting them to have expert proficiency in order to succeed.

You can Dismiss temporal ward. The maximum number of temporal wards you can have active at a time is equal to your spellcasting ability modifier.

CriticalSuccess The creature is unaffected and opens the doorway or the container as normal.

Success The creature experiences a brief moment of déjà-vu in which they're convinced they already opened the door. They must use an additional action to open the door. If they can't or don't want to do so, the action or activity they used to open the door or container is wasted, and the door or container remains closed.

Failure The creature is thrown briefly backwards in time. The action or activity they used to open the door or container is wasted and they're returned to the position they were located at during the start of their turn. Their turn then ends.

Critical Failure As failure, but the temporal displacement also causes the creature to lose their bearings, making them @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{Confused} for 1 minute.

増強 (10th) The temporal ward has an unlimited duration, until it is counteracted, Dismissed, or @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Dt6B1slsBy8ipJu9]{Disarmed}

entries.name: Temporary Glyph
entries.description:
Area 5-foot square

You temporarily bind a hostile spell into a symbol. While Casting this Spell, you also Cast a Spell of a lower spell level to store in the glyph. The stored spell must take 2 actions or fewer to Cast, have a hostile effect, and target one creature or have an area. Any creature that enters temporary glyph's area activates the glyph, releasing the harmful spell within. You can set a password for the glyph. Speaking it when entering the spell's area prevents the glyph from triggering. You can also set a more specific trigger to limit which types of creatures set off the glyph.

Once a spell is stored in the glyph, the glyph gains all the traits of that spell. If the stored spell can target one or more creatures, it targets the creature that set off the glyph. If it has an area, that area is centered on the creature that set off the glyph. Temporary glyph's duration ends when the glyph is triggered. The glyph is a magical trap, using your spell DC for both the Perception check to notice it and the Thievery check to disable it; both checks require the creature attempting them to be trained in order to succeed.

You can Dismiss temporary glyph.

entries.name: テンポラリー・ツール
entries.description: 君はショベルやロープといった単純な間に合わせの道具を手の中に呼び出す。これは、一つの連続行動に使われるまでか1分間の、どちらか最初に来たタイミングまで持続し、その後、消える。この道具は明らかに一時的に呼び出されたものであるため、売ることや、本物のアイテムであるかのようにごまかすことは出来ない。

entries.name: 運命操作
entries.description:
トリガー 君か範囲内の味方一体がセーヴィング・スローを試みる

君は、一瞬を悲惨なものか、何の変哲もないものか、中間といったもののない状態にするために運命の力を捻じ曲げる。

対象はトリガーとなったセーヴィング・スローに+1ステータス・ボーナスを得る。もしそのセーヴィング・スローの結果が成功なら、クリティカルになる。もし失敗なら、ファンブルになる。そしてファンブルは、身かわし強化のような、通常、ファンブルを減少させるような能力によって減少させることが出来ない。

もし、トリガーとなった能力がクリティカルとファンブルの状態両方を持ったないものであるなら、運命操作は失敗するが、君はこの「呪文の発動」のための集中点を消費しない。

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.AJkRUIdYLnt4QOOg]{呪文効果: 運命操作}

増強（8レベル） セーヴィング・スローへのボーナスは+2になる。

entries.name: 触手の四肢
entries.description:
君の腕は長く、しなやかな触手に変化し、接触の距離の呪文と腕での素手打撃（拳と爪の「打撃」など）を行う際に間合いが10フィートに伸びる。これによって君の近接武器攻撃の間合いが伸びることはない。持続時間の間、君が「呪文の発動」をする際、君はその呪文発動に追加のアクションを一つ追加して、一時的にその呪文を伝達するための間合いを20フィートに伸ばすことが出来る。

増強 (+2) 君が一時的に間合いを伸ばすために追加のアクションを加える際、その呪文を伝達するための君の間合いは追加で10フィート伸びる。

entries.name: Terminate Bloodline
entries.description:
Mighty drow noble houses, including House Shraen, use this ritual to stamp out fledgling noble houses before they rise to power. At the ritual's completion, you place a contagious wasting disease upon the target creature with the intention of ending their familial bloodline.

The ritual is easiest to cast on a subdued target, typically a low-ranking member of the targeted family bloodline who is kidnapped and has their memory wiped. If the target is conscious when the ritual is cast, the target attempts a Fortitude save against the ritual's DC; on a success, the ritual fails. Otherwise, the target is automatically affected by the dying bloodline disease.

Dying Bloodline (curse, disease) Failing or critically failing this disease's Fortitude save causes the disease to progress to the next stage as normal; however, succeeding or critically succeeding at the save has no effect. The disease can be removed only by first successfully counteracting the curse and then counteracting the disease;

Level equal to twice the ritual's level;

Stage 1 carrier with no effect (1 month);

Stage 2 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{Fatigued} (1 week);

Stage 3 fatigued and @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 1} (1 day);

Stage 4 fatigued and @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 3} (1 day);

Stage 5 death.

Every member of an infected creature's immediate family (blood relationship or parent or child) that comes into physical contact with that infected creature must attempt a Fortitude save or contract the disease.

Critical Success The creature does not contract the disease and does not need to attempt further saves when coming into physical contact with that particular creature (the creature is not immune to the disease, however, and must attempt a save as normal if it comes into physical contact with a different infected family member).

Success The creature is not affected but must attempt another save the next time they come into physical contact with that particular infected creature.

Failure The creature contracts the disease and can spread it in the same way as the original target.

entries.name: テザー
entries.description:
君は魔法の鎖、蔓、あるいはその他の拘束具を使って対象を君につなぐ。クリーチャーはそれでも@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{「脱出」}を試みることが出来る。そして、クリーチャーや他のクリーチャーは攻撃することによってこの拘束具を破壊することが出来る（拘束具はAC15、10ヒット・ポイントである）。君は繋ぎとめている間、その対象の30フィート以内に留まらなければならない；対象から30フィートより遠くに移動することによって呪文は終了する。対象は反応セーヴを試みなくてはならない。

クリティカル 対象は影響を受けない

成功 対象は君の30フィート以内にいる限り、速度にー5フィートの状況ペナルティを受ける

失敗 対象は「脱出」するか呪文が終了するまで、速度にー10フィートの状況ペナルティを受け、君から30フィートより遠くに離れることが出来ない

ファンブル 対象は「脱出」するか、呪文が終了するまで@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{動けない状態}になる

増強 (+1) 拘束具のACは3上昇し、ヒット・ポイントは10増加する

entries.name: The World's a Stage
entries.description:
This famous ritual is a sophisticated example of symbolic magic, binding fate and fortune to follow a prepared script. To conduct the ritual, you and the secondary casters must put on a long-form, multi-person, plot-based performance that's usually a play or opera, though more unusual performances have been known. You take the role of the director, while the secondary casters are either actors (Performance) or significant backstage figures, such as set or costume designers (Crafting). The casting time of the ritual includes both preparations and rehearsals of various sorts and the actual performance, which must be at least an hour long.

The performance presents current events and offers a particular vision on how they resolve, often in metaphorical or allegorical format (proposing the overthrow of a tyrant by referring to a different, legendary tyrant who was overthrown, or suggesting that a murderous secret might be uncovered by presenting an allegory of truth defeating murder). This performance must be presented to an audience of at least a hundred people, a majority of whom must both be connected, at least peripherally, to the events in question (the people of the tyrant's city, or the residents of the village where the murder occurred) and who must understand what the metaphor or allegory actually refers to. For the magic to spark, the performance must declare its purpose loudly and clearly to the parties most concerned. If a major antagonist featured in the performance is in the audience and the ritual is a success, you get a critical success instead.

Critical Success Something sublime sparks between performance and audience, and destiny conspires to push events in the right direction. You and each secondary caster can reroll up to three skill checks at any point during the duration of the ritual after determining the results, as long as the skill check is connected to ensuring the topic of the performance comes true (to sneak past the tyrant's guards or find the murder weapon, for instance).

Success As critical success except the sparks of destiny are weaker, so each caster can reroll only a single skill check.

Failure The ritual has no effect.

Critical Failure The performance is a dramatic and horrendous botch, and fate strikes out at the casters. You and each secondary caster are @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv]{Doomed 1} for the next month, and this condition can't be removed by anything less than a wish or similarly powerful magic.

entries.name: スリーフォールド・アスペクト
entries.description:
この呪文は、年齢の異なる3つのバージョンの自分の間で変化することが出来るようにしてくれる：乙女（若い成人）、母（成人）、あるいは家長（高齢）である。@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]{「呪文の発動」}をする際に、1つを選ぶ。呪文が続く間、君は自分の本来の年齢か、3つの年齢のどれかに単発アクションで変わることが出来る。このアクションは精神集中の特性を持つ。君の姿は常に、年齢に関わらず、君に見える。君を知っているクリーチャーは、君を認識し、君の年齢が違うのだと見分けることが出来る。T

スリーフォールド・アスペクトは、君の様々な年齢の本来の姿を提示するために、身体的特徴と正確を変える。これによって、君は選んだ年齢になりきるための〈欺瞞〉判定に+4ステータス・ボーナスを得る。また、たとえ未修得であってもこれらの判定に習熟ボーナスとして自分のレベルを加えることが出来るのである。更に、クリーチャーが特に@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{「捜す」}アクションをするか、注意深く君を調べるのでなければ、君が本来の年齢でないことに気がつく機会すらない。君はこの呪文を@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.AjLSHZSWQ90exdLo]{「解除」}することが出来る。

entries.name: 雷の破裂
entries.description:
君は力強い大気の爆発と大きな雷のとどろきを作り出し、2d6点の殴打ダメージと2d6点の音波ダメージを与える。範囲内のそれぞれのクリーチャーは頑健セーヴを試みなくてはならない。

クリティカル クリーチャーは影響を受けない.

成功 クリーチャーは半分のダメージを受ける

失敗 クリーチャーは全部のダメージを受け、1分間、@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.9PR9y0bi4JPKnHPR]{聴覚喪失}になる

ファンブル クリーチャーは2倍のダメージを受け、1時間、聴覚喪失になる

増強（+2） それぞれの種別のダメージを2d6点増やし、範囲を5フィート増やす。

entries.name: サンダリング・ドミナンス
entries.description:
君は対象を強力な捕食のオーラで包み込み、その発声を強化する。対象は〈威圧〉判定に+1ステータス・ボーナスを得る。この呪文の持続時間の間、対象は@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.6SAdjml3OZw0BZnn]{「雷の如き唸り」}のアクションを得る。

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.81TfqzTfIqkQA4Dy]{呪文効果: 雷の如き唸り}

増強 (+2) 威圧〉判定へのステータス・ボーナスは1上昇し（8レベル呪文の+4ステータス・ボーナスが最大値である）、唸りのダメージは2d8点、上昇する。

entries.name: 雷の如き打撃
entries.description:
君は大きな武器を振り回し、クリーチャーを転ばせる音波の振動波を作り出す。君の両手武器で近接「打撃」を行うこと。君から15フィート円錐内にいるそれぞれのクリーチャーは、君の呪文DCに対する基本頑健セーヴに成功しなければ、2点の音波ダメージを受ける。ファンブルした際、クリーチャーは@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{伏せ状態}になる。「打撃」の対象が円錐内にいないなら、効果は失敗する。

増強(+1) ダメージは1点、上昇する

メモ: 混成呪文は「呪文撃」をリチャージする

entries.name: 満ち引きの活性
entries.description:
君は水の中にいるか、地面にいる対象を移動させるために途方もない大きさの波を呼び起こす。対象は頑健セーヴを試みなくてはならない。

失敗 君は対象を地面に沿って好きな方向に5フィートまでか、水中を好きな方向に10フィートまで移動させる。

ファンブル 君は対象を地面に沿って好きな方向に10フィートまでか、水中を好きな方向に20フィートまで移動させる。

entries.name: Time Beacon
entries.description: You create a beacon in time, intending to return to it if things go wrong. You can cast time beacon on only your turn. Keep careful track of everything that happens this turn after you cast time beacon. At the end of your turn, you can choose to rewind time back to just after you cast time beacon, removing all effects of your turn since then. Curses, traps, and other harmful effects that happen during your turn might prevent you from returning to the beacon if they are powerful enough. If you suffered any harmful effects during your turn after casting time beacon, to return to your beacon, time beacon attempts a counteract check against each such effect. If it fails at any of these checks, you can't return. After returning to the time beacon, the spell ends.

entries.name: タイム・ジャンプ
entries.description:
君は数秒間の時間を跳躍し、戦場を瞬きの間に横断する。君は2アクションを得るが、これは「跳躍」、「立ち上がる」、「ステップ」、「歩行」のどれかに使わなければならない。君が適切な速度を持っているのなら、このリストに@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.H6v1VgowHaKHnVlG]{「掘り進み」}、 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.pprgrYQ1QnIDGZiy]{「登攀」}、 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.A2JfEKe6BZcTG1S8]{「飛行」}、 あるいは @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.c8TGiZ48ygoSPofx]{「水泳」}を追加することが出来る。

君がこれらのアクションを取っている間、時間は停止する。他の全てのクリーチャーは完全に君のアクションに気付かず、発話することが出来ず、君の移動によってトリガーを引き起こされるであろうアクションを使うことが出来ない。これらのアクションを取っている間、君は、移動アクションによってトリガーを引き起こされるであろうアクションを含めて、あらゆるその他のアクションを取ることが出来ない。ひとたびこのアクションが完了したなら、時間は再び開始し、傍観者には、君が移動した距離を突然、テレポートしたように見えるだろう。時間を飛び越えることは混乱をもたらすため、この呪文を使ってから1分以内に再びタイム・ジャンプを使ったなら、君は1分間、@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{知性低下4}になる。

entries.name: Time Stop
entries.description:
You temporarily stop time for everything but yourself, allowing you to use several actions in what appears to others to be no time at all. Immediately after casting time stop, you can use up to 9 actions in 3 sets of up to 3 actions each.

After each set of actions, 1 round passes, but only for you, effects specifically targeting or affecting you, and effects you create during the stoppage. All other creatures and objects are invulnerable to your attacks, and you can't target or affect them with anything.

Once you have finished your actions, time begins to flow again for the rest of the world. If you created an effect with a duration that extends beyond the time stop's duration, such as wall of fire, it immediately affects others again, but it doesn't have any of the effects that happen only when you first cast the spell.

entries.name: タイムリー・チューター
entries.description:
君は自分の幻獣や使い魔とアカシック・レコード――包括的な精神の図書館を構成するデミプレーン――の間にあるアストラルの繋がりとして従事し、それから、クリーチャーに助言を与える。もし、君がこの呪文を使い魔に発動しているなら、使い魔は君が選んだ〈伝承〉技能での「知識を思い出す」に、〈軽業〉や〈隠密〉と同じように、君の呪文発動能力修正値を追加する。君の使い魔は学んだ全ての情報を君と共有するために、発話の使い魔能力を持っていなくてはならない。もし、君が幻獣にこの呪文を発動するなら、代わりに幻獣は〈伝承〉に修得になる。

もし、君が対象と精神的な繋がりを失ったなら、そのアカシック・レコードとの繋がりは切断され、タイムリー・チューターは即座に終了する。

entries.name: Tireless Worker
entries.description: You suppress your choice of one of the following conditions that's affecting the target: @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy}, @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.D5mg6Tc7Jzrj6ro7]{Encumbered}, @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled}, or @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{Fatigued}. If you don't remove the effect that caused the condition, the condition returns after the spell's duration expires.

entries.name: Tongues
entries.description:
The target can understand all words regardless of language and also speak the languages of other creatures. When in a mixed group of creatures, each time the target speaks, it can choose a creature and speak in a language that creature understands, even if the target doesn't know what language that is.

増強 (7th) The duration is 8 hours.

entries.name: Tortoise and the Hare
entries.description:
You prove that slow and steady doesn't always win the race by turning a foe into a proverbial tortoise and yourself or an ally into a hare, siphoning some of the foe's speed and granting it to the other target. The effects depend on the foe's Fortitude save.

Critical Success The targets are unaffected.

Success The foe is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} for 1 round, and the other target is unaffected.

Failure The foe is slowed 1 for 3 rounds and the other target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{Quickened} for 1 round. It can use the extra action to Step, Stride, or Strike.

Critical Failure The foe is slowed 1 for 3 minutes and the other target is quickened for 1 minute. It can use the extra action to Step, Stride, or Strike.

entries.name: Touch of Corruption
entries.description:
You infuse the target with negative energy. If the target is living, this deals 1d6 negative negative damage (basic Fortitude save); on a failed save, the target also takes a -2 status penalty to AC for 1 round.

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.GhNVAYtoF5hK3AlD]{Spell Effect: Touch of Corruption}

If the target is a willing undead creature, the target instead regains 6 Hit Points, and if you are the undead target, you also gain a +2 status bonus to damage rolls for 1 round.

@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.ekGHLJSHGgWMUwkY]{Touch of Corruption (Healing)}

増強 (+1) Increase the damage dealt to a living creature by 1d6 or increase the Hit Points regained by undead by 6.

entries.name: Touch of Corruption (Healing)
entries.description:
You infuse the target with negative energy. If the target is living, this deals 1d6 negative negative damage (basic Fortitude save); on a failed save, the target also takes a -2 status penalty to AC for 1 round.

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.GhNVAYtoF5hK3AlD]{Spell Effect: Touch of Corruption}

If the target is a willing undead creature, the target instead regains 6 Hit Points, and if you are the undead target, you also gain a +2 status bonus to damage rolls for 1 round.

増強 (+1) Increase the damage dealt to a living creature by 1d6 or increase the Hit Points regained by undead by 6.

entries.name: タッチ・オヴ・イディオシー
entries.description:
対象　1体の生きているクリーチャー

君は対象の精神を鈍化させる；対象は意志セーヴを試みなくてはならない。

成功 対象は影響を受けない

失敗 対象は@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{知性低下2}である

ファンブル 対象は@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{知性低下4}である

entries.name: 服従の接触
entries.description:
君の横柄な接触は対象の意志の力を腐食させ、支配しやすくする。対象は意志セーヴを試みる。

クリティカル 対象は影響を受けない。

成功 対象は君の現在の手番の終了時まで、知性低下1になる

失敗 対象は君の次の手番の終了時まで、@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{知性低下1}になる

ファンブル 対象は1分間、@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{知性低下1}になる

entries.name: 不死の接触
entries.description:
君は対象の生命力を不死の力で攻撃し、1d6の負のエネルギーダメージを与える。対象は頑健セーヴを試みなくてはならない。

クリティカル 対象は影響を受けない

成功 対象は半分のダメージを受ける

失敗 対象は完全なダメージを受け、正のエネルギーの効果は1ラウンド、通常の半分しか対象を治癒しない

ファンブル 対象は2倍のダメージを受け、正のエネルギーの効果は1分間、通常の半分しか対象を治癒しない

増強（+1） ダメージは1d6上昇する

entries.name: 月の接触
entries.description:
君が対象に触れた際、月の印がその額に現れ、柔らかな月光で輝く。対象は20フィート半径を薄暗い光で照らす。また、対象は月の相に基づいた利益をも得る。これは、新月から始まり、手番の終了時に次の相に変化する。

  • 新月 対象は利益を受けない
  • 上弦の月 対象は攻撃ロールに+1ステータス・ボーナス、ダメージ・ロールに+4ステータス・ボーナスを得る
  • 満月 T対象は攻撃ロール、AC、セーヴィング・スローに+1ステータス・ボーナス、ダメージ・ロールに+4ステータス・ボーナスを得る
  • 下弦の月n 対象はＡＣとセーヴィング・スローに+1ステータス・ボーナスを得る。この相の後、新月に戻る

entries.name: Transcribe Moment
entries.description: You instantly create a small, permanent scroll that contains a magically precise written description of your current surroundings in every direction. Any creature who spends 1 minute to read the scroll-written in a language of your choice that you know-immediately sees and experiences your surroundings during the moment that you recorded (including whatever events transpired that round) exactly as you experienced it. This depiction records only what you can sense yourself. For example, if you can't see invisible creatures, the depiction doesn't reveal them even to a reader who could normally see them; a reader can't use their Perception to notice details you missed, but they can attempt a check to Recall Knowledge based on what they just experienced if they have knowledge that you lack. You can have multiple scrolls from transcribe moment in existence at the same time, up to a number equal to your Intelligence modifier. If you Cast the Spell again while already at the maximum number of scrolls, choose one of the current scrolls to lose its magic, then create the new one.

entries.name: Transmute Rock And Mud
entries.description:
You warp the structure of earthen material, turning rock into mud or mud into rock. Choose one of these two options when you @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]{Cast the Spell}.

•Rock to Mud You transform non-magical, unworked, and unattended stone in the area into an equal volume of mud. If you Cast this Spell on a stone floor, it becomes difficult terrain; if the resulting mud is at least 3 feet deep, it is greater difficult terrain, or the creature can try to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.c8TGiZ48ygoSPofx]{Swim} through it (DC 10 Athletics). If the mud is deep enough that a creature can't reach the bottom, the creature must Swim to move through it. If you Cast this Spell on a ceiling, the falling mud deals [[/r {8d6}[bludgeoning]]]{8d6 bludgeoning damage} (basic Reflex save) and spreads out, creating difficult terrain in an area 10 feet larger in radius than the original spell's area. Once the rock is transformed into mud, the mud is non-magical and remains until natural conditions cause it to dry out or otherwise disperse.

•Mud to Rock Mud in the area turns into unworked stone. If creatures are in the mud when it is transformed to stone, they must attempt a Reflex saving throw.

Critical Success The creature escapes the mud and is atop the stone, unaffected.

Success The creature climbs out of the mud as it turns to rock and is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone} atop the stone.

Failure The creature is partially stuck in the mud and is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed} for 1 round or until it @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escapes}, whichever comes first.

Critical Failure The creature is entirely stuck. It is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Restrained} for 1 round or until it Escapes, whichever comes first.

増強 (+2) Add an additional 10-foot cube to the area, adjacent to at least one of the other cubes.

entries.name: 旅の渡り
entries.description:
与え、簡単に水泳や壁登りが出来るようにする。

君がこの呪文を発動した際、君は登攀速度か水泳速度のどちらかを得る。この速度は君の地上速度に等しい。

増強（5レベル） 君は飛行速度を得ることを選ぶことが出

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.N1EM3jRyT8PCG1Py]{呪文効果: 旅の渡り (登攀)}

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.0R42NyuEZMVALjQs]{呪文効果: 旅の渡り (水泳)}

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.cTBYHfiXDOA09G4b]{呪文効果: 旅の渡り (飛行)}

entries.name: ツリー・シェイプ
entries.description: 君は大型の樹木に変化する。知覚判定によって君の本性が暴かれることはないが、君の呪文DCに対する〈自然〉や〈生存〉に成功することよって君はその地域に奇妙なほど新しい樹木であるように見えてしまう。樹木形態である間、君は周辺にある全てを見ることが出来るが、精神集中の特性を持つ単発アクションで呪文と自分の手番を終了させること以外のアクションを取ることは出来ない。樹木である君のACは20、ステータス・ボーナス、ステータス・ペナルティ、状況ボーナス、状況ペナルティだけが君に影響を与える。君が反応セーヴでロールした全ての成功とクリティカルは失敗になる。

entries.name: Tree Stride
entries.description:
You step into a living tree with a trunk big enough for you to fit inside it and instantly teleport to any tree of the same species within 5 miles that also has a sufficiently large trunk. Once you enter the first tree, you instantly know the rough locations of other sufficiently large trees of the same species within range and can exit from the original tree, if you prefer. You can't carry extradimensional spaces with you; if you attempt to do so, the spell fails.

増強 (6th) The tree you exit can be up to 50 miles away.

増強 (8th) The tree you exit can be up to 500 miles away.

増強 (9th) The tree you exit can be anywhere on the same planet.

entries.name: トリックスターの替え玉
entries.description:
君はめったに、ただ一つの場所に落ち着いていることはない。対象が目視することの出来る、対象の100フィート以内の場所を選ぶこと。君は、その対象だけが見ることが出来て、全ての君の行動を真似する自分自身の幻術を作る。対象は意志セーヴを試みなくてはならない。

クリティカル 対象は影響を受けない

成功 対象は君が指定した場所にいると信じており、君の実際の場所を見ることが出来ない。対象は幻影の位置では有り得ないようなアクションを君が使うか、その対象が攻撃するか、触るか、「捜す」か、そうでなくともその幻影と係わったなら、自動的に幻影を見破る。もし、君が対象に敵対的なアクションを取ったなら、その呪文は終了する。

失敗 成功と同じだが、対象は記載された出来事が起こった際に、幻影を見破るために意志セーヴに成功しなくてはならない。.

ファンブル 成功と同じだが、対象は記載された出来事が起こった際に、幻影を見破るために意志セーヴにクリティカルしなくてはならない。

entries.name: True Seeing
entries.description: You see things within 60 feet as they actually are. The GM rolls a secret counteract check against any illusion or transmutation in the area, but only for the purpose of determining whether you see through it (for instance, if the check succeeds against a polymorph spell, you can see the creature's true form, but you don't end the polymorph spell).

entries.name: True Target
entries.description: You delve into the possible futures of the next few seconds to understand all the ways your foe might avoid harm, then cast out a vision of that future to those around you. Designate a creature. The first time each target makes an attack roll against that creature during true target's duration, the attacker rolls twice and uses the better result. The attacker also ignores circumstance penalties to the attack roll and any flat check required due to the designated creature being @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} or @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden}.

entries.name: アンブラル・エキストラクション
entries.description:
君は自分の敵から呪文を盗み、それらを敵の影から引き剥がし、影界の幾何学的な空間に保管する準備をする。君は一時的な呪文スロットを1つ、得る。それに、君は敵の術者から呪文を盗むことによってのみ、呪文を入れることが出来るのである。アンブラル・エキストラクションの持続時間の間、君は、アイテムではなく敵の準備済み呪文あるいは未使用の任意発動呪文1つを盗もうとするための「盗む」アクションを使うことが出来る。君はまた、「盗む」試み1回を、アンブラル・エキストラクションの「発動」の一部として行うことが出来る。君は呪文を奪い去られたことによって作り出される霊魂の空虚という精神の痛手として、盗まれた呪文のレベルごとに1d4点の精神ダメージを対象に与える。そして、君は盗んだ呪文を自分の一時的呪文スロットに入れる。その呪文は、一時的スロットから発動される際、影の特性を得る。

アンブラル・エキストラクションよりも1レベル、レベルの低い呪文から対象の呪文をランダムに選び、盗まれた呪文を決定する。あるいは、クリティカルならばアンブラル・エキストラクションと同じレベルの呪文からランダムに選ぶ。もし、対象がそのレベルに呪文を盛っていないなら、呪文スロットを持っている中で最高レベルから選ぶ（もし、対象に適用可能な呪文がないなら、君は何も得ない。だが、君は残りの持続時間で呪文を「盗む」試みを続けて良い）。もし、対象が準備型の術者なら、準備済みの呪文から1つをランダムに選ぶ。対象が任意発動型の術者なら、君は代わりに適切なレベルの未使用の呪文スロットを盗み、そのレベルの対象が知っている呪文からランダムに1つを選ぶ。君は対象の生来の呪文、集中呪文、キャントリップを盗むことは出来ない。君は、盗んですぐにその呪文が何であるかを知る。君の一時的呪文スロットは、君が盗んだ呪文と同じレベルのスロットになる。

通常通り、君は間合い内の対象からのみ「盗む」ことが出来る。ひとたび、一時的呪文スロットに呪文を入れたなら、君はもっと多くの呪文を「盗む」試みが出来る。もし、〈窃盗〉判定に成功したなら、君は盗んだ呪文を取らなければならない。もし、任意発動型の術者ではないとしても、君は一時的呪文スロットを盗んだ呪文の発動のためにだけ使い、盗んだ呪文を一時的呪文スロットを使うことによってのみ発動することが出来る。アンブラル・エキストラクションが終了した際、君は一時的呪文スロットと、そこに保管されているあらゆる呪文を失う。君がアンブラル・エキストラクションを発動した際、現在、君に影響を与えている全てのアンブラル・エキストラクションは終了する。

entries.name: Umbral Graft
entries.description:
You reflect a spell into a shadowy version of itself, in the process depleting the power of the initial spell. During umbral graft's duration, you can use the Steal action to attempt to abscond with spells affecting a foe instead of stealing an item. You can also make one attempt to Steal as part of Casting umbral graft. If you succeed at your check to Steal a spell, randomly determine a spell affecting the foe that has a target entry. That spell ceases to affect the target, and you can either cause the spell to affect you or store it in your shadow. If your attempt to Steal was a critical success, you automatically steal the spell if its level is equal to or lower than umbral graft. If it was a success, you automatically steal it if its level is lower than umbral graft. If you succeeded, but the spell's level was too high to steal automatically, you must attempt a counteract check to see if you steal the spell. You know what the spell is as soon as you steal it. If you store it, you can transfer it to a willing creature as a single action that has the manipulate trait. The spell lasts for its remaining duration, to a maximum of 1 minute, and any time you keep it stored subtracts from its duration normally. The spell gains the shadow trait.

You can't steal constant innate spells that are always active on a creature, such as a choral angel's constant tongues, or innate spells that have special restrictions that remove their ability to target other creatures, such as an imp's invisibility. At the GM's discretion, you might not be able to steal innate spells with other unusual modifications to the base spell.

As normal, you can Steal only from a target within your reach. Once you've stolen a spell, you can't attempt to Steal more spells, nor can you choose not to take a spell if you succeed at your Thievery check. When you cast umbral graft, any spells you stole with a previous umbral graft end even if their duration hasn't elapsed. If you're affected by both umbral graft and umbral extraction, you make the choice whether to steal a spell slot, an active spell, or an item each time you Steal.

entries.name: Unblinking Flame Revelation
entries.description: You light your foe with revealing flame. The GM attempts a secret counteract check against each illusion affecting the creature; on a success, you suppress the illusion for the duration, rather than end the effect.

entries.name: Unbreaking Wave Advance
entries.description:
You unleash a mighty wave from your hand that buffets back your foes. Each creature in the area must attempt a Fortitude saving throw. If a creature pushed by unbreaking wave advance would be pushed into a solid barrier or another creature, it stops at that point and takes 3d6 damage.

Success The creature is unaffected.

Failure The creature is pushed 10 feet.

Critical Failure The creature is pushed 20 feet.

増強 (+1) The damage for pushing a creature into a solid barrier increases by 1d6.

entries.name: Uncontrollable Dance
entries.description:
The target is overcome with an all-consuming urge to dance. For the duration of the spell, the target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} and can't use reactions. While affected, the creature can't use actions with the move trait except to dance, using the Stride action to move up to half its Speed.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The spell's duration is 3 rounds, and the target must spend at least 1 action each turn dancing.

Failure The spell's duration is 1 minute, and the target must spend at least 2 actions each turn dancing.

Critical Failure The spell's duration is 1 minute, and the target must spend all its actions each turn dancing.

entries.name: 不死の祝福
entries.description:
君は墓地の接触をクリーチャーに植え付ける。持続時間の間、@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.wdA52JJnsuQWeyqz]{ハーム}呪文はそのクリーチャーをアンデッドとして取り扱い、@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs]{ヒール}呪文はそのクリーチャーを生きているクリーチャーとして扱う。さらに、ハーム呪文は対象を回復するヒット・ポイントに+2のステータス・ボーナスを得る。

もし対象がこの呪文を避けたいと望むなら、この効果を減じるための意志セーヴを試みることが出来る。

クリティカル 対象は影響を受けない

成功 対象は1ラウンド、ヒール呪文から半分の回復を受け、ハームから半分のダメージを受ける

失敗 文章に記載されているとおりの効果を受ける

増強 (+1) 回復するヒット・ポイントへのステータス・ボーナスは2上昇する

entries.name: Undermine Reality
entries.description:
You lash a target with tendrils of shadow that steal some of its substance, making it quasi-real. As long as it is quasi-real, its Strikes deal half damage, it can't critically succeed at any skill check, and creatures attempting saving throws against its spells and effects get a result one degree of success better than they rolled. The target must attempt a Will saving throw.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target is quasi-real until the end of its next turn.

Failure The target is quasi-real for 1 minute. At the end of each of its turns, it can attempt another Will save, ending the spell on a success.

Critical Failure The target is quasi-real for an unlimited duration.

entries.name: アンディテクタブル・アラインメント
entries.description:
対象　1体のクリーチャーあるいは物体

君は属性を隠す防護でクリーチャーを包む。対象は属性を探知するはずの全ての効果に対して中立に見える。

entries.name: Unexpected Transposition
entries.description:
Trigger You are targeted with an enemy's Strike.

When attacked, you attempt to quickly swap your own position with that of another creature. A creature that is unwilling to swap places with you must attempt a Will save. Willing creatures automatically fail. If you successfully switch places with the target, the triggering attack is resolved against that creature as if it had been the original target of the attack. After the swap, you and the target are both temporarily immune to unexpected transposition spells for 1 minute. You automatically switch places if the target is willing. If it's unwilling, it can attempt a Will save. Neither of you teleports if the target succeeds at its save.

entries.name: Unfathomable Song
entries.description:
Fleeting notes of a strange and unnatural song fill the air, overtaking the mind. Each target must attempt a Will save when you cast the spell, and again the first time you Sustain this Spell each round. A creature needs to attempt only one save against the song each round, and you have to keep the same targets when you Sustain the Spell.

Critical Success The target is unaffected, can't be affected on subsequent rounds, and is temporarily immune for 1 minute.

Success The target is unaffected this round, but it can be affected on subsequent rounds.

Failure Roll 1d4 on the table below.

Critical Failure Roll 1d4+1 on the table below.

Result Effect
1 The target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 2}
2 The target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{Confused} for 1 round
3 The target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 4} for 1 round
4 The target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Blinded} for 1 round
5 The target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned} for 1 round and @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 1} for an unlimited duration

entries.name: 自由な幻獣
entries.description: 君は自分と幻獣の間の繋がりを緩め、短い間、自分から遠くに幻獣が旅することが出来るようにする。この呪文が起動している間、幻獣は無制限に君から離れて移動することが出来る。呪文終了の際に、幻獣が君から100フィートより遠くに離れているなら、顕現解除する。

entries.name: Unfettered Pack
entries.description:
You free those who travel alongside you from environmental hindrances. Targets don't take circumstance penalties to Speed from vegetation, rubble, winds, or other properties of the environment, whether or not the environment is magical, and they ignore difficult terrain from such environmental properties.

増強 (9th) The targets also ignore greater difficult terrain from environmental properties.

entries.name: Unfolding Wind Rush
entries.description:
You travel on a rushing wind. Move two times: two Strides, two Steps, or one Stride and one Step (in either order). You can Stride or Step into the air during this movement, moving upward at a 45-degree angle at most; if you end your movement in the air, you fall after taking one action or when your turn ends, whichever comes first. A @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.it4ZsAi6XgvGcodc]{Wall of Wind} appears in all the spaces you left during this movement, lasting for 1 round.

増強 (5th) The wall of wind lasts 3 rounds.

entries.name: 止まらぬ歩み
entries.description: 何も君を留めておくことは出来ない。その効果のレベルが君の止まらぬ歩みより高いのでない限り、君は即座に、君を@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{動けない状態} や @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{つかまれた状態}にしている全ての魔法の効果から脱出する。君はそれから、「歩行」する。この移動の間、君は移動困難な地形と、君の速度へのあらゆる状況及びステータス・ペナルティを無視する。

entries.name: 一心同体
entries.description:
トリガー 君と、距離内にいる1体以上の味方がセーヴィング・スロー可能な呪文か能力の対象となる

君は連携した防御を組む。それぞれの味方はトリガーとなった呪文に対して自分のものの代わりに君のセーヴィング・スロー修正値を使うことが出来る。それぞれの味方が個々にどの修正値を使うかを決定する。

entries.name: Unrelenting Observation
entries.description:
This spell grants perfect sight based on scrying, allowing several willing targets to track the exact movements or position of one creature or object. Choose one target creature or object in the area to be tracked. It becomes the sensor for the spell. Up to five willing creatures of your choice in the area can see a ghostly image of this creature or object when it's out of their sight. They can perceive the creature or object perfectly, allowing them to ignore the @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} or @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Invisible} condition, though physical barriers still provide cover.

The tracking creatures can see the tracked creature or object through all barriers other than lead or running water, which block their vision. Distance doesn't matter, though the creature or object might move so far away it becomes too small to perceive. The tracking creatures don't see any of the environment around the target, though they do see any gear a creature is wearing or holding, and they can tell if it removes objects from its person.

If the target to be tracked is willing, the duration is 1 hour. If you try to track an unwilling creature, the target must attempt a Will save.

Critical Success The creature or object is unaffected.

Success As described, and the duration is 1 minute.

Failure As described, and the duration is 1 hour.

entries.name: アンシーズナブル・スコール
entries.description:
君は突発的な風の爆発を起こし、その中心から外側に向かって波を放つ。この風は小さな、魔法のものではない炎を消火し、霧や靄を吹き散らし、軽重量以下のバルクの物体を散乱させ、この呪文の発動した点から5フィート離れた場所に、1バルク以下の固定されていない物体を押しやる。君が「呪文の発動」をした際に範囲内にいた中型以下のクリーチャーや、呪文の範囲に入ってきた中型以下のクリーチャーは、頑健セーヴィング・スローを試みなくてはならない。

成功 クリーチャーは影響を受けない

失敗 クリーチャーは@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{伏せ}状態になる。もしクリーチャーが「飛行」しているのなら、そのクリーチャーは代わりにファンブルする

ファンブル クリーチャーは爆発の中心から30フィート離れ、2d6点の殴打ダメージを受ける

entries.name: Unseen Custodians
entries.description:
You create a site-bound, long-lasting @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.xqmHD8JIjak15lRk]{Unseen Servant} spell effect, forming entities of pure force to carry out basic tasks at a fixed location.

Critical Success The ritual creates six unseen servants. You don't need to concentrate on them, and they aren't summoned minions. You can spend an action, which has the concentrate trait, to command one to perform a basic task; it continues to perform the task until commanded again.

Success As critical success, but the ritual creates three unseen servants.

Failure The ritual fails to create any servants.

Critical Failure The ritual creates six unseen servants, but these creatures are hostile and capable of making fist @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.VjxZFuUXrCU94MWR]{Strikes} with an attack bonus equal to your skill modifier for the primary skill check, dealing [[/r {1d6}[force]]]{1d6 force damage}. They attack you and your allies and attempt to break objects belonging to you and your allies within the area.

増強 (6th) If destroyed, the unseen servants reform the next morning. The cost increases to 30 gp.

entries.name: Unspeakable Shadow
entries.description:
You alter a creature's shadow, transforming it into a terrifying monster out to devour the creature. The creature must attempt a Will save. A creature that has the frightened condition from unspeakable shadow must spend at least one of its actions each turn to either attack its shadow (making a Strike ineffectually) or flee from its shadow (using one action to move away as though it had the fleeing condition).

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 2}.

Failure The target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 3}. It can't reduce its frightened value below 1 for 1 minute.

Critical Failure The target is so afraid, it might instantly die. It must succeed at a Fortitude save or die; this saving throw has the incapacitation trait. If it succeeds at its save, the target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 4} and can't reduce its frightened value below 1 for 1 minute.

entries.name: Untwisting Iron Buffer
entries.description:
You send currents of protective ki to the surface of your body that protect you from harm, at least until your enemies dissipate them. You gain 15 temporary Hit Points, which last for up to 3 rounds.

増強 (+1) The temporary Hit Points increase by 5.

entries.name: 怪異なる構造
entries.description:
君は自分の肉と臓器を、てらてらと光る皮膚、粗い鱗、毛むくじゃら、そして腫瘍めいたこぶの奇異な合成物に変容させる。これには三つの効果がある：

  • 君は自分の肉と臓器を、てらてらと光る皮膚、粗い鱗、毛むくじゃら、そして腫瘍めいたこぶの奇異な合成物に変容させる。これには三つの効果がある：
  • 君は暗視を得る。
  • 酸が君の皮膚から滲み出る。君を素手打撃か間合いの無い近接武器で命中させたクリーチャーは2d6の強酸ダメージを受ける。

増強 (+2) The resistances increase by 5, and the acid damage increases by 1d6.

@Compendi抵抗は5増加し、強酸ダメージは1d6増加するum[pf2e.spell-effects.LMzFBnOEPzDGzHg4]{呪文効果: 怪異なる構造}

entries.name: Updraft
entries.description:
A powerful blast of wind erupts from the ground, launching the target into the air and sending it crashing back down. The collision deals 2d6 bludgeoning damage with a basic Reflex save. On a failure, the target is knocked @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone}.

増強 (+1) Increase the damage by 2d6.

entries.name: Upheaval
entries.description:
The ground in the area shudders and crumbles as huge pillars of stone erupt into the air, rending the terrain around them.

The GM might add additional effects in certain areas. Cliffs might collapse, causing creatures to fall, or a river might be blocked and flood the surrounding area.

  • Stone Debris The area becomes difficult terrain.
  • Rising Pillars Pillars of smooth stone rise from your chosen number of 10-foot squares on a surface in the area, ascending up to 60 feet in height. Each pillar stops when it hits a structure or ceiling unless that structure collapses (see below). The DC to Climb or Grab an Edge on a pillar is 30. Each creature on a pillar after it rises must succeed at a Reflex saving throw or fall off the nearest edge (the creature can choose which edge, if several are equally close). A creature on a pillar that is stopped by a structure falls without attempting a save.
  • Structural Collapse Structures and ceilings might collapse. The GM rolls a flat check for each (DC 14 for a sturdy structure, DC 9 for an average structure and most natural formations, all adjusted higher or lower as the GM sees fit). In general, shoddy structures automatically collapse. A collapse deals 11d6 bludgeoning damage to creatures beneath it; each creature caught in a collapse must attempt a Reflex save to avoid it. If the creature is forced to attempt a Reflex save because it was on a rising pillar, it uses the same result.

Critical Success The creature takes half collapse damage.

Success The creature takes half the collapse damage and falls @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone}.

Failure The creature takes the full collapse damage and falls prone.

Critical Failure The creature takes the full collapse damage and is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Restrained} by debris until it successfully Escapes (DC equal to the spell's save DC).

entries.name: Vampiric Exsanguination
entries.description:
You draw in the blood and life force of other creatures through your outstretched arms. You deal 12d6 negative damage to living creatures in the area. You gain temporary Hit Points equal to half the damage a single creature takes from this spell; calculate these temporary Hit Points using the creature that took the most damage. You lose any remaining temporary Hit Points after 1 minute.

増強 (+1) The damage increases by 2d6.

entries.name: Vampiric Maiden
entries.description:
A ghostly iron maiden snaps shut on the target and drains its vitality for your gain. This deals [[/r {4d4}[piercing]]]{4d4 piercing damage} and [[/r {4d4}[negative]]]{4d4 negative damage}, and the target must attempt a Fortitude save. You gain temporary HP equal to the negative damage the target takes (after applying resistances, weaknesses, and the like). You lose any remaining temporary HP after 1 minute.

Critical Success: The target is unaffected.

Success: The target takes half damage.

Failure The target is briefly trapped within the vampiric maiden. The target takes full damage and is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized} by the iron maiden for 1 round or until it uses an @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.pvQ5rY2zrtPI614F]{Interact} action to extricate itself, whichever comes first.

Critical Failure: The target takes double damage and is Immobilized by the vampiric maiden for 1 round or until it @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escapes}(the DC is your spell DC), whichever comes first.

増強 (+1) The piercing and negative damage increase by [[/r 1d4]] each.

entries.name: ヴァンピリック・タッチ
entries.description:
君の接触は、自分を強化するために対象から生き血を搾り取る。君は対象に6d6点の負のエネルギーダメージを与える。君は対象が受けた負のエネルギーダメージの半分に等しい一時的ヒットポイントを得る（抵抗その他を適用した後の）。君は1分間後に残っている一時的ヒットポイントをすべて失う。

増強 (+1) ダメージは2d6点上昇する

entries.name: Variable Gravity
entries.description:
You can adjust how strongly gravity grips you, changing between low gravity, normal gravity, and high gravity with ease. Choose one type of gravity when you cast the spell. While the spell lasts, you can change the type of gravity with a single action, which has the concentrate trait. The spell doesn't alter your physical appearance, so it's impossible to what type of gravity you're subjected to by casual observation.

  • Low Gravity You can jump double the normal distance when you Long Jump or Leap, though still to a maximum of your Speed. When you High Jump, you can use the calculation for a Long Jump but don't double the distance. Rather than the normal calculation for falling damage, when you fall, you take no damage for the first 10 feet and then take bludgeoning damage equal to a quarter of the remaining distance you fell. Abilities that adjust how much falling damage you take still apply.
  • High Gravity You become encumbered. You gain a +2 status bonus to your saving throws and DCs to resist forced movement and attempts to knock you @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone}. You reduce the distance forced movement moves you by half or 10 feet, whichever is more. You can only jump half as high and far. Rather than the normal calculation for falling damage, you take bludgeoning damage equal to the distance you fall. Abilities that adjust how much falling damage you take still apply. @Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.28NvrpZmELvyrHUt]{Spell Effect: Variable Gravity (High Gravity)}

増強 (6th) The duration increases to 1 hour

entries.name: Veil
entries.description:
You disguise the targets as other creatures of the same body shape and roughly similar height (within 6 inches) and weight (within 50 pounds). The disguise can hide the targets' identities or let them appear to be of another ancestry, but it's not precise enough to impersonate specific individuals. The spell doesn't change voice, scent, or mannerisms. You choose the disguise for each target; for example, you could make one target appear to be a dwarf and another an elf. Casting veil counts as setting up a disguise for the purpose of the Impersonate action. It allows the target to ignore any circumstance penalties they might take for being disguised as dissimilar creatures, and it gives the targets a +4 status bonus to Deception checks to prevent others from seeing through their disguises, and add their level even if untrained. You can Dismiss any or all of these disguises.

増強 (5th) The spell also disguises the targets' voices and scents; it gains the auditory and olfactory traits.

増強 (7th) The targets can appear as any creature of the same size, even specific individuals. You must have seen an individual to reproduce their appearance. The spell also disguises the targets' voices and scents; it gains the auditory and olfactory traits.

entries.name: 自信のヴェール
entries.description: 君は自分を自信のヴェールで包む。現在の恐れ状態を1減少させ、君が持続時間の間に@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{恐れ}になるであろう時はいつでも、その値を1減少させる。もし君が恐れに対するセーヴにファンブルしたなら、自信のヴェールは即座に終了し、減少させるのではなく、ファンブルで得た恐れ状態を1増加させること。

entries.name: 夢のとばり
entries.description:
君は、白昼夢やだるさを引き起こす、眠気の状態に対象を引き込む。対象は意志セーヴを試みなくてはならない。

クリティカル: 対象は影響を受けない

成功: 対象は知覚、攻撃ロール、意志セーヴに－１ステータス・ペナルティを受ける。このペナルティは、睡眠効果に対する意志セーヴについては－2になる

失敗: 成功と同じだが、対象が精神集中アクションを使う際、いつでも、DC5の平目判定に成功しなければ、そのアクションは妨害される

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.hkLhZsH3T6jc9S1y]{呪文効果: 夢のとばり}

entries.name: Vibrant Pattern
entries.description:
You create a pattern of lights that pulses with intensity. Creatures are @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Dazzled} while inside the pattern. In addition, a creature must attempt a Will saving throw if it's inside the pattern when you cast it, enters the pattern, ends its turn within the pattern, or uses a Seek or Interact action on the pattern. A creature currently @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Blinded} by the pattern doesn't need to attempt new saving throws.

Success The creature is unaffected.

Failure The creature is Blinded by the pattern. If it exits the pattern, it can attempt a new save to recover from the Blinded condition at the end of each of its turns, to a maximum duration of 1 minute.

Critical Failure The creature is Blinded for 1 minute.

entries.name: Vibrant Thorns
entries.description:
Your body sprouts a coat of brambly thorns that harm those that strike you and thrive on life magic. Adjacent creatures that hit you with a melee attack, as well as creatures that hit you with unarmed attacks, take 1 piercing damage each time they do. Anytime you cast a positive spell, the damage from your thorns increases to 1d6 until the start of your next turn.

増強 (+1) The damage increases by 1, or 1d6 after you cast a positive spell.

entries.name: 警戒のまなざし
entries.description: 君は@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.zvKWclOZ7A53DObE]{クレールヴォヤンス}と同じように@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{不可視}の眼球の感覚器官を作り出す。作り出された際、眼球は君の視線上にいなければならない。呪文の持続時間が終了した際、君はフリー・アクションとして1集中点を消費し、もう1時間、持続時間を延長することが出来るが、通常通り、君の次の一日の準備の間にこの持続時間は即座に終了する。

entries.name: 弱点看破
entries.description:
君は集中してクリーチャーを凝視し、その本質について信仰の洞察を一瞬、得る。 もしそのクリーチャーに弱点があるなら、君はその弱点とどのセーヴィング・スロー修正値が最も低いのかを知ることが出来る。

君はまた、その移動手段に関する固有の理解を得て、その敵に対して君の手番の終了時より前に行う次の攻撃ロール（あるいはア攻撃アクションの一部として行われる技能判定）に+2ステータス・ボーナスを得る。

対象はそれから、1日、弱点看破に完全耐性を持つ。

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.70qdCBokXBvKIUIQ]{呪文効果: 弱点看破}

entries.name: Visions of Danger
entries.description:
An illusion of horrific creatures fills the spell's area. The creatures look like Tiny swarming monsters with a specific appearance of your choice, such as Hellish flies or animated saw blades. The burst deals 8d8 mental damage (basic Will save) to each creature that's inside the burst when it's created, enters the burst, or starts its turn inside the burst. A creature that critically succeeds at its will save can immediately attempt to disbelieve the illusion. A creature that tries to Interact with the monsters or observes one with a Seek action can attempt to disbelieve the illusion. Creatures that disbelieve the illusion take no damage from the illusion thereafter.

増強 (+1) The mental damage increases by 1d8.

entries.name: Vital Beacon
entries.description:
Vitality radiates outward from you, allowing others to supplicate and receive healing. Once per round, either you or an ally can use an Interact action to supplicate and lay hands upon you to regain Hit Points. Each time the beacon heals someone, it decreases in strength. It restores 4d10 Hit Points to the first creature, 4d8 Hit Points to the second, 4d6 Hit Points to the third, and 4d4 Hit Points to the fourth, after which the spell ends. You can have only one vital beacon active at a time.

増強 (+1) The beacon restores one additional die of Hit Points each time it heals, using the same die size as the others for that step.

entries.name: Volcanic Eruption
entries.description:
The ground opens up, spraying a column of lava high into the air in a vertical cylinder, dealing 14d6 fire damage to creatures in the area. The lava rapidly cools and encases creatures in the area. A creature encased in rock is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1} and takes a -10-foot status penalty to its Speeds. All normal terrain is difficult terrain to a flying creature, and such creatures immediately descend 20 feet the moment they're encased, but they don't take damage from this fall. A creature encased in rock can attempt to Escape against your spell DC to end the effect. Otherwise, the creature remains encased until it takes a total of 50 damage, freeing it from the rock. Additionally, creatures in the area and those within 5 feet of the lava column automatically take 3d6 fire damage from the intense heat, regardless of the results of their saving throws.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature takes half damage.

Failure The creature takes full damage and is encased.

Critical Failure The creature takes double damage and is encased.

増強 (+1) The damage in the area increases by 2d6, and the damage from the intense heat increases by 1d6.

entries.name: ヴォミット・スウォーム
entries.description:
君は魔法の虫で出来たスウォームを吐き出す。君は自分独自の想像からクリーチャーを呼び起こし、形作るため、そのクリーチャーの見た目を変えることが出来る（一般的には毛虫、ゴキブリ、蜂、長虫の混合物）が、この呪文の効果を変えることはない。虫は範囲内の誰もに群がり、その噛みつきと針は[[/r {2d8}[刺突]]]{2d8点の刺突ダメージ}を与える（基本反応セーヴ）。セーヴィング・スローに失敗したクリーチャーは@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{不調1}になる。ひとたび呪文が終了したなら、スウォームは消える。

増強 (+1) ダメージが[[/r {1d8}[刺突]]]{1d8点}ずつ増加する。

entries.name: Voracious Gestalt
entries.description:
You create a powerful spirit entity that grows and builds strength by consuming the spirits of foes you both slay. When you Cast the Spell, the gestalt deals 14d6 negative damage to all living creatures of your choice in the area, with a basic Fortitude save. Creatures you choose that end their turns in the area take [[/r {6d6}[negative]]]{6d6 negative damage} damage, with a basic Fortitude save.

At the end of each of your turns, if you killed a living creature during that turn or if the gestalt's damage killed a creature since the end of your prior turn, you add the slain creature's soul to the gestalt. The emanation's radius increases by 20 feet and the damage dealt by the aura increases by [[/r 1d6#negative]]. (Note that this increase only happens once, even if you killed multiple living creatures that turn.) As normal for determining threat level, the GM determines if a creature is of significant enough threat to empower the gestalt; in general, a creature several levels below you rarely poses a significant threat.

増強 (10th) The initial damage increases to 16d6 and the aura's damage starts at [[/r {6d6}[negative]]].

entries.name: Wail of the Banshee
entries.description:
Your scream chills the souls of enemies that hear it. Each living enemy in the area takes 8d10 negative damage and must attempt a Fortitude save.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature takes full damage.

Failure The creature takes full damage and is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained} [[/r 1d4]].

Critical Failure The creature takes double damage and is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 4}.

entries.name: 醒めて見る悪夢
entries.description:
君はそのクリーチャーの精神を、悪夢から出てきたおぞましい光景で満たす。対象は意志セーヴを試みなくてはならない。もし、君がこの「呪文の発動」をした際に@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{気絶}しているなら、セーヴを試みる前に即座に対象は目覚め、セーヴに失敗したなら、上記に記した効果に加えて1ラウンド、@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.sDPxOjQ9kx2RZE8D]{逃亡状態}を得る。

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1}.

Failure The target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 2}.

Critical Failure The target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 3}.

entries.name: Wall of Fire
entries.description:
You raise a blazing wall that burns creatures passing through it. You create either a 5-foot-thick wall of flame in a straight line up to 60 feet long and 10 feet high, or a 5-foot-thick, 10-foot-radius ring of flame with the same height. The wall stands vertically in either form; if you wish, the wall can be of a shorter length or height. Everything on each side of the wall is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} from creatures on the opposite side. Any creature that crosses the wall or is occupying the wall's area at the start of its turn takes 4d6 fire damage.

増強 (+1) The fire damage increases by 1d6.

entries.name: Wall of Flesh
entries.description:
You craft a 20-foot-tall wall of living flesh in a straight line up to 30 feet long. The wall is 3 feet thick, and each 5-foot-long section has AC 10 and 75 HP. If you wish, the wall can be of a smaller length or height. You must create the wall in an unbroken open space so its edges don't pass through any creatures or objects, or the spell is lost. The wall can't be @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.bT3skovyLUtP22ME]{Repaired} but can be healed by positive energy and healing spells and abilities. When you @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]{Cast the Spell}, choose one of the following features for your wall.

• Mouths The wall has countless toothy mouths along its surface. The mouths Strike any creature that ends its turn within 5 feet of the wall, using your spell attack roll for these Strikes and dealing piercing damage equal to [[/r 1d6]] + your spellcasting ability modifier. The mouths are capable of consuming potions; since the wall is alive, it can recover Hit Points from a @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.2RuepCemJhrpKKao]{Healing Potion}, but it can't benefit from any effect that would give it the ability to move. Otherwise, the GM determines which potions can affect the wall.

• Eyes The wall sprouts hundreds of unblinking eyes. You can see through these eyes, gaining a +2 circumstance bonus to visual Perception checks within the wall's line of sight. You can also use the eyes for determining line of sight for ranged attacks and spells, but you don't have line of effect through the wall.

• Arms The wall is a mass of grasping arms. Any creature that ends its turn within 5 feet of the wall must attempt a Reflex save.

Success The creature is unaffected.
